English Sentences: The former treatise have I made, O Theophilus, of all that Jesus began both to do and teach,
Wolaitta Sentences: Tewofiloosaa, Yesuusi saluwaa biido gallassai gakkanaassi, oottanaunne tamaarissanau doommido ubbabaa taani ta koiro maxaafan xaafaas.

English Sentences: Until the day in which he was taken up, after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen:
Wolaitta Sentences: Saluwaa baanaappe kase i ba dooridi kiittidoogeeta Geeshsha Ayyaanan azaziis.

English Sentences: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs, being seen of them forty days, and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God:
Wolaitta Sentences: I ba kiittidoogeetussi oitamu gallassaa beettiiddinne qassi Xoossaa kawotettaabaa etau yootiiddi, ba waayiyaappe guyyiyan, haiquwaappe denddidoogaa siree bainnan daro ammanttidi, bana eta bessiis.

English Sentences: And, being assembled together with them, commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem, but wait for the promise of the Father, which, saith he, ye have heard of me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etaara issippe de7iiddi, eta hagaadan yaagidi azaziis; "Yerusalaameppe kiyoppite; shin intte taappe siyidoogaa ta Aawai inttessi immana giidoogaa naagite.

English Sentences: For John truly baptized with water; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yohaannisi haattan xammaqiis; shin guutta wodiyaappe guyyiyan, Geeshsha Ayyaanan intte xammaqettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they therefore were come together, they asked of him, saying, Lord, wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Yesuusaara gaittido wode a, "Godau, ha wodiyan Israa7eelatussi kawotettaa zaaruutee?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, It is not for you to know the times or the seasons, which the Father hath put in his own power.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Yesuusi eta, "Ta Aawai ba godatettan keerido aginaanne wodiyaa intte eranaassa gidenna.

English Sentences: But ye shall receive power, after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you: and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem, and in all Judaea, and in Samaria, and unto the uttermost part of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Geeshsha Ayyaanai intte bolli wodhdhiyo wode, wolqqaa intte ekkana; ekkidi Yerusalaameeninne Yihudaa biitta ubban, Samaariyaaninne sa7aa gaxaa gakkanaashinkka taassi markkattiyaageeta gidana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had spoken these things, while they beheld, he was taken up; and a cloud received him out of their sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa giidoogaappe guyyiyan, eti xeellishin, xoqqu xoqqu giiddi, saluwaa bin, eta aifiyaappe shaarai a genttiis.

English Sentences: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up, behold, two men stood by them in white apparel;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi biyo wode, eti saluwaa tishshi oottidi xeellishin, issi bootta maayuwaa maayida naa77u asati sohuwaara eta matan eqqidi,

English Sentences: Which also said, Ye men of Galilee, why stand ye gazing up into heaven? this same Jesus, which is taken up from you into heaven, shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Galiila asatoo, saluwaa xeelliiddi, intte aissi eqqidetii? Ha intteppe saluwaa biida Yesuusi saluwaa biyoogaa intte be7idoogaadankka, simmidi yaana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet, which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day's journey.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Dabira Zaite geetettiya deriyaappe Yerusalaame simmidosona. Dabira Zaitee Yerusalaame matan de7ees.

English Sentences: And when they were come in, they went up into an upper room, where abode both Peter, and James, and John, and Andrew, Philip, and Thomas, Bartholomew, and Matthew, James the son of Alphaeus, and Simon Zelotes, and Judas the brother of James.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Yerusalaame gelidi, bantta de7iyo sohuwaa pooqiyaa pude kiyidosona; kiyidaageeti PHeexiroosa, Yohaannisa, Yaaqooba, Inddiraasa, Piliphphoosa, Toomaasa, Barttalamoosa, Maatiyoosa, Ilppiyoosa na7aa Yaaqooba, ba biittaassi mishettiya Simoonanne Yaaqooba na7aa Yihudaa.

English Sentences: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication, with the women, and Mary the mother of Jesus, and with his brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hageeti ubbati maccaasatuura, Yesuusa aayee Mairaamiiranne Yesuusa ishanttuura ubbai issi wozana gididi, tolidi woossoosona.

English Sentences: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples, and said, (the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty,)
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, PHeexiroosi xeetanne laatamaa gidiya ammaniya asaa shiiquwan issippe de7iya ba ishanttu giddon denddi eqqidi, hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Men and brethren, this scripture must needs have been fulfilled, which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas, which was guide to them that took Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta ishatoo, Yesuusa oiqqidaageeta kaalettida Yihudaabaa Geeshsha Ayyaanai kase Daawita doonan odido Xoossaa maxaafaa qaalai polettanau bessees.

English Sentences: For he was numbered with us, and had obtained part of this ministry.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yihudai nunaara de7ees; qassi nunaara issippe oottanaassi doorettiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity; and falling headlong, he burst asunder in the midst, and all his bowels gushed out.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai ba iita oosuwan demmido miishshan gadiyaa shammiis; sinttau gufannidi kunddin, a uloi gidduwaappe daahettiis; a maraccee muleerakka zaazetti aggiis.

English Sentences: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue, Aceldama, that is to say, The field of blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudaa bolli hanidabaa Yerusalaamen de7iya asai ubbai siyiis; hegaa gishshau, he gadiyaa bantta qaalan Akelddaama giidi xeegidosona; Akelddaama giyoogee suutta gade giyoogaa.

English Sentences: For it is written in the book of Psalms, Let his habitation be desolate, and let no man dwell therein: and his bishoprick let another take.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi yootiiddi, "Aissi giikko, Mazamure Maxaafan, A keettai mela de7o; ooninne hegan de7oppo qassi A sunttatettaakka harai ekko geetettidi xaafettiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, issi asi Godaa Yesuusa dendduwaa markkattanau, nunan gaittana bessees; Yohaannisi xammaqido wodiyaappe doommidi, Yesuusi nuuppe saluwaa biido wode gakkanaas,

English Sentences: Beginning from the baptism of John, unto that same day that he was taken up from us, must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa Yesuusi nunaara hemettido wode ubban i nunaara de7iyaageetuppe issuwaa gidanau bessees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they appointed two, Joseph called Barsabas, who was surnamed Justus, and Matthias.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin ammaniya asai dooruwaassi Yosxxoosa giyo Barssaaba geetettiya Yooseefanne Maatiyaasa naa77aa essidosona.

English Sentences: And they prayed, and said, Thou, Lord, which knowest the hearts of all men, shew whether of these two thou hast chosen,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Xoossaa woossiiddi, "Ubbaa wozanaa eriya Godau,

English Sentences: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship, from which Judas by transgression fell, that he might go to his own place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudai ba sohuwaa baanau yeggi bayido oosuwaanne Yesuusi kiittido oosuwaa sohuwaa ekkanaadan, ha naa77u asatuppe issuwaa neeni dooridoogaa nuna bessa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they gave forth their lots; and the lot fell upon Matthias; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etan saamaa yeggidosona; saamai Maatiyaasa bollan wodhdhin, Maatiyaasi Yesuusi kiittido tammanne isiinetuura qoodettiis.

English Sentences: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come, they were all with one accord in one place.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHenxxaqosxxe giyo gallassai gakkido wode, ammaniyaageeti ubbati issippe gididi, issisaa shiiqidaashin,

English Sentences: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind, and it filled all the house where they were sitting.
Wolaitta Sentences: gagantti yeggiya gotiyaadan guummiya gunttai akeekennan saluwaappe yiidi, eti uttido keettaa ubbaa kumiis.

English Sentences: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire, and it sat upon each of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi tama laco milatiya inxxarssati etassi beettidi, shaahetti shaahettidi, eta ubbaa bolli wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and began to speak with other tongues, as the Spirit gave them utterance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta ubban Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumidi, dumma dumma qaalan haasayana mala, eta danddayissin, haasayaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews, devout men, out of every nation under heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7an de7iya zare ubbaappe yiidi, Xoossaa woosan sheekkida Aihudati Yerusalaamen de7oosona.

English Sentences: Now when this was noised abroad, the multitude came together, and were confounded, because that every man heard them speak in his own language.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha gunttaa siyido wode, asai ubbai shiiqiis; shiiqidi ammaniyaageeti eta qaalan haasayishin siyido gishshau, giyoobaa xayidosona.

English Sentences: And they were all amazed and marvelled, saying one to another, Behold, are not all these which speak Galilaeans?
Wolaitta Sentences: Garamettidi, "Oorattabaa" giidi, "Be7ite; ha haasayiya ubbati Galiila asata gidokkonaayye?

English Sentences: And how hear we every man in our own tongue, wherein we were born?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, nuuni nu yelettido biittaa qaalan eti haasayishin waanidi siyiyoonii?

English Sentences: Parthians, and Medes, and Elamites, and the dwellers in Mesopotamia, and in Judaea, and Cappadocia, in Pontus, and Asia,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni PHartte asati, Meedoona asati, Elaameexe asati, naa77u shaafatuppe gidduwan de7iyaageeti, Yihudan, Qaphphadooqiyan, PHanxxoosan Isiyan,

English Sentences: Phrygia, and Pamphylia, in Egypt, and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene, and strangers of Rome, Jews and proselytes,
Wolaitta Sentences: Pirggiyan, PHinifiliyan, Gibxxen, Qareena baggan de7iya Liibiyaa woradatun de7iyaageeti, Roomeppe yiida imattati, Aihudati, Aihudatettau laamettida nuuppe amaridaageeti,

English Sentences: Cretes and Arabians, we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qarxxeese asatinne, Araba asati, Xoossai oottido gita oosuwaa nu qaalan eti haasayishin siyoos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they were all amazed, and were in doubt, saying one to another, What meaneth this?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaikka garamettidi, yohoi banttau qashettennan ixxin bantta giddon, "Laa hagee woigiyoogee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Others mocking said, These men are full of new wine.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin harati ammaniyaageetun Qilliicciiddi, "Hageeti uyidi mattottidosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter, standing up with the eleven, lifted up his voice, and said unto them, Ye men of Judaea, and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem, be this known unto you, and hearken to my words:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, Yesuusi kiittido hara tammanne isiinetuura denddi eqqidi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, etassi hagaadan yaagidi yootiis; "Aihudatoo, qassi Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbatoo, taani yootiyoogaa ezggite. Hagee intteyyo eretto; intte qoppiyoogaadan, hageeti mattottibookkona.

English Sentences: For these are not drunken, as ye suppose, seeing it is but the third hour of the day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, wonttaappe biron heezzu saate gidees.

English Sentences: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin hagee hananabaa yootiya Yuu7eeli haasayidoogaa.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass in the last days, saith God, I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh: and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy, and your young men shall see visions, and your old men shall dream dreams:
Wolaitta Sentences: "I haasayiiddi, Xoossai hagaadan yaagees; wodiyaa wurssettan hagaadan hanana. Taani asa ubbaa bolli ta Ayyaanaa gussana. Intte attuma naatinne intte macca naati hananabaa yootana. Intte wodalla naatikka ajjuutaa be7ana; intte cimatikka aimuwaa aimottana.

English Sentences: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit; and they shall prophesy:
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassatun ta attuma ashkkaratu bollinne ta macca ashkkaratu bolli taani ta Ayyaanaa gussana. Gussin eti hananabaa yootana.

English Sentences: And I will shew wonders in heaven above, and signs in the earth beneath; blood, and fire, and vapour of smoke:
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi taani bolla saluwan oorattabaa, garssa sa7ankka malaataa bessana. Suuttai, tamainne shaaraadan gorddida cuwai de7ana.

English Sentences: The sun shall be turned into darkness, and the moon into blood, before that great and notable day of the Lord come:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gitanne bonchcho gidida Godaa gallassai gakkanaappe kase awai xumana; aginaikka suutta milatana.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode hagaadan hanana; Godaa sunttaa xeesiya ooninne attana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Ye men of Israel, hear these words; Jesus of Nazareth, a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs, which God did by him in the midst of you, as ye yourselves also know:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asatoo, ha qaalaa siyite; Naazireeta Yesuusi intte giddon Xoossai banan oottido wolqqaama oosuwan, oorattabaaninne malaatan intteyyo qonccissido asa; hegaa inttekka ereeta.

English Sentences: Him, being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God, ye have taken, and by wicked hands have crucified and slain:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi inttessi imettana mala, Xoossai kase ba sheniyaaninne ba eran ba qofaa qachchi wottiis; yaatin, a intte nagaranchchatu kushiyan masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishissidi, kaqissi worideta.

English Sentences: Whom God hath raised up, having loosed the pains of death: because it was not possible that he should be holden of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin haiqoi Yesuusa oiqqanau danddayibeenna gishshau, Xoossai haiquwaa seelaa appe xaissidi, a denttiis.

English Sentences: For David speaketh concerning him, I foresaw the Lord always before my face, for he is on my right hand, that I should not be moved:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Daawiti Yesuusabaa hagaadan yaagees; Taani metootennaadan, Godai ta ushachchan de7iyo gishshau, taani ubba wode Godaa ta matan be7ais.

English Sentences: Therefore did my heart rejoice, and my tongue was glad; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, ta wozanai ufaittiis; ta inxxarssankka ufaissai kumiis. Qassi ta bollaikka lo77o de7ana giidi, ufaissan naagees.

English Sentences: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell, neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta shemppuwaa Si7ooliyan aggakka. Qassi ne Geeshsha Na7aa ahaakka musissakka.

English Sentences: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni tana de7uwaa ogiyaa erissadasa. Neeni tanaara de7iyoogan taani daro ufaittais yaagees.

English Sentences: Men and brethren, let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David, that he is both dead and buried, and his sepulchre is with us unto this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ishatoo, nu aawatu halaqaa Daawitabaa taani intteyyo geeshshada odanau bessees; Daawiti haiqqidi moogettiis; a duufoi hachchi gakkanaassikka nu matan de7ees.

English Sentences: Therefore being a prophet, and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him, that of the fruit of his loins, according to the flesh, he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne;
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti hananabaa yootiyaagaa gidido gishshaunne Xoossai a naatu zerettaappe issuwaa a kawotaa araatan utissanau ayyo caaqqidoogaa erido gishshau,

English Sentences: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ, that his soul was not left in hell, neither his flesh did see corruption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosa dendduwaa sinttau xeellidi, A shemppoi Si7ooliyan attibeenna; a bollaikka musibeenna giidi yootiis.

English Sentences: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossai ha Yesuusa haiquwaappe denttidoogaassi nuuni ubbai markka.

English Sentences: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted, and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost, he hath shed forth this, which ye now see and hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai baappe ushachcha baggan a xoqqu xoqqu oottidi, ayyo Geeshsha Ayyaanaa immana giidoogaadan, Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidi, hagaa intte ha77i be7iyoogaanne siyiyoogaa nu bolli gussiis.

English Sentences: For David is not ascended into the heavens: but he saith himself, The Lord said unto my Lord, Sit thou on my right hand,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Daawiti ba huuphen saluwaa kiyibeenna; shin yaagiis; Godai ta godaa;

English Sentences: Until I make thy foes thy footstool.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ne morkketa neeni tohuwan yedhdha eqqiyoobaa oottana gakkanaassi hagan taappe ushachcha baggaara utta" giis yaagiis.

English Sentences: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly, that God hath made that same Jesus, whom ye have crucified, both Lord and Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan ha intte xishidi kaqqido Yesuusa Godanne Kiristtoosa oottidoogaa Israa7eela zare ubbai tumaappe ero" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when they heard this, they were pricked in their heart, and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles, Men and brethren, what shall we do?
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai PHeexiroosi giidoogaa siyido wode, asau wozanai maashin, PHeexiroosanne Yesuusi kiittido harata, "Ishanttoo, yaanin nuuni ai oottanee?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then Peter said unto them, Repent, and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins, and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi eta, "Intte nagarai atto geetettana mala, nagaraappe simmidi, intte huuphiyan huuphiyan Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan xammaqettite. Xoossai immiyo Geeshsha Ayyaanaa intte ekkana.

English Sentences: For the promise is unto you, and to your children, and to all that are afar off, even as many as the LORD our God shall call.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai immana giido qaalai inttessa intte naatussanne Godai nu Xoossai baakko xeesiyo haahuwan de7iyaageetu ubbaassa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And with many other words did he testify and exhort, saying, Save yourselves from this untoward generation.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi etassi qaalaa haraakka gujji markkattidi, "Ha wodiyaa geella asaappe intte huuphiyaa ashshite" yaagidi zoriis.

English Sentences: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized: and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi yootidoogaa ekkidaageeti xammaqettidosona; he gallassi heezzu sha7u gidiya asai ammaniis.

English Sentences: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles' doctrine and fellowship, and in breaking of bread, and in prayers.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusi kiittidoogeetu timirttiyan, issippetettan oittaa mentti miyoogaaninne Xoossaa woosan genccoosona.

English Sentences: And fear came upon every soul: and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetu kushiyan daro oorattabainne malaatai oosettin, asa ubbaa yashshai oiqqiis.

English Sentences: And all that believed were together, and had all things common;
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammanida ubbati issippe de7oosona; qassi banttau de7iyaabaa ubbaakka issippe shaakkidosona.

English Sentences: And sold their possessions and goods, and parted them to all men, as every man had need.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti bantta biittaanne banttassi de7iyaabaa baizzi baizzidi, oonanne koshshido keena miishshaa ubbaassi shaakkidosona.

English Sentences: And they, continuing daily with one accord in the temple, and breaking bread from house to house, did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi ubba gallassi, issi wozana gididi, Beeta Maqidasiyan paccennan gaittidi, bantta keettaa keettaa xeesettidi ufaissaaninne pashkka wozanan qumaa moosona.

English Sentences: Praising God, and having favour with all the people. And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa galatiiddi, asa ubban sabettidosona. Qassi Godai attiyaageeta gallassi gallassikka eta bolli gujjees.

English Sentences: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer, being the ninth hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi, PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi Xoossaa woossanau uddufun saatiyan Beeta Maqidasiyaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And a certain man lame from his mother's womb was carried, whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful, to ask alms of them that entered into the temple;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yelettoosappe doommidi, wobbe gididi de7iya issi bitanee Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliya asaappe miishshaa woossanau, ubba gallassi daro lo77o giyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggiyan wottiyoogee de7ees.

English Sentences: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wobbe bitanee, PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelana hanishin be7idi, miishsha eta woossiis.

English Sentences: And Peter, fastening his eyes upon him with John, said, Look on us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woossin PHeexiroosi Yohaannisaara a tishshi ootti xeellidi, "Nuukko haa xeella" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he gave heed unto them, expecting to receive something of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wobbe bitanee etappe aibakko ekkanau qaaqqatidi, etakko xeelliis.

English Sentences: Then Peter said, Silver and gold have I none; but such as I have give I thee: In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi a, "Tau miishshi baawa; shin taassi de7iyaabaa taani neessi immana; Naazireeta Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan denddada hemetta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he took him by the right hand, and lifted him up: and immediately his feet and ankle bones received strength.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi, wobbe bitaniyaa ba ushachcha kushiyan oiqqidi, pude denttiis; sohuwaarakka a tohoinne meeshi meqettai minni aggiis.

English Sentences: And he leaping up stood, and walked, and entered with them into the temple, walking, and leaping, and praising God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee pude guppidi, denddi eqqiis; yaanne haanne hemetaa doommiis. Hegaappe guyyiyan hemettiiddi, guppiiddinne Xoossaa galatiiddi, etaara issippe Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis.

English Sentences: And all the people saw him walking and praising God:
Wolaitta Sentences: I hemetettishiininne Xoossaa galatishin, asai ubbai a be7iis.

English Sentences: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple: and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7idi, miishsha woossanau daro lo77o giyo Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggen uttidaagee a gididoogaa akeekiis; i hanidobaa be7idi garamettiis.

English Sentences: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John, all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon's, greatly wondering.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitanee PHeexiroosanne Yohaannisa oiqqi uttidaashin, asai ubbai garamettidi, Solomona baranddaa giyoosan issippe etakko woxxiis.

English Sentences: And when Peter saw it, he answered unto the people, Ye men of Israel, why marvel ye at this? or why look ye so earnestly on us, as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi asaa be7ido wode asaassi yaagiis; "Israa7eela asatoo, aissi hagau garametteetii? Woi aissi nuna tishshi ootti xeelleetii? Nuuni nu huuphe wolqqan woi Xoossaa milatiyoogan ha bitaniyaa hemetissidobaa intteyyo misatii?

English Sentences: The God of Abraham, and of Isaac, and of Jacob, the God of our fathers, hath glorified his Son Jesus; whom ye delivered up, and denied him in the presence of Pilate, when he was determined to let him go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Abrahaama Xoossai, Yisaaqa Xoossai, Yaaqooba Xoossai, nu aawatu Xoossai, intte aatti immidoogaa PHilaaxoosi birshshanau qoppi uttidaashin, intte a sinttan, Nuuni a erokko giido ba Na7aa Yesuusa bonchchiis.

English Sentences: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just, and desired a murderer to be granted unto you;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte geeshshaanne xilluwaa, Nuuni a erokko giidi, shemppuwaa woridaagaa a gishshaa inttessi birshshanau PHilaaxoosa woossideta.

English Sentences: And killed the Prince of life, whom God hath raised from the dead; whereof we are witnesses.
Wolaitta Sentences: De7uwaa immiyaagaa intte worideta; shin Xoossai haiquwaappe a denttiis; denttidoogaassi nuuni markka.

English Sentences: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong, whom ye see and know: yea, the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha wobbe bitaniyaa Yesuusa sunttaa wolqqai minttiis; intte be7iyoogeenne eriyoogeekka i a sunttan ammaniyoogan oosettiis; ha intte ubbaa sinttan a hagaadan payya oottidaagee, Yesuusa i ammaniyoogaa.

English Sentences: And now, brethren, I wot that through ignorance ye did it, as did also your rulers.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka ta ishatoo, inttekka inttena kaalettiyaageetuugaadan, erennan oottidoogaa taani erais.

English Sentences: But those things, which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets, that Christ should suffer, he hath so fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai hananabaa beni yootiya ubbatu doonan, Kiristtoosi waayettana bessees yaagidi yootiis; ba yootidoogaakka hegaadan poliis.

English Sentences: Repent ye therefore, and be converted, that your sins may be blotted out, when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord;
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi Xoossai intte nagaraa xaissanaadan,

English Sentences: And he shall send Jesus Christ, which before was preached unto you:
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa matappe ayyaanaa minotettaa wodee intteyyo yaanaadaaninne Xoossai Yesuus Kiristtoosa kase intteyyo doorettidaagaa yeddanaadan, intte nagaraappe Xoossaakko simmite.

English Sentences: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things, which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai hananabaa yootiya ba geeshshatu doonan benippe doommidi haasayidoogaadan, ubbabai ooraxxiyo wodee gakkanaassi, Yesuusi saluwan gam77anau bessees.

English Sentences: For Moses truly said unto the fathers, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee, Godai Xoossai tana denttidoogaadan, intte zariyaa giddoppe intteyyo hananabaa yootiyaagaa denttana; intte i giyoogaa ubbaa siyite.

English Sentences: And it shall come to pass, that every soul, which will not hear that prophet, shall be destroyed from among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: He hananabaa yootiyaagee odiyoogaa siyenna asi ooninne asaa giddoppe shaahettidi xayo yaagiis.

English Sentences: Yea, and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after, as many as have spoken, have likewise foretold of these days.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qassi Sameelappe doommidi, appe guyyiyan hananabaa yootiyaageeti ubbati, ha wodiyaabaa yootidosona.

English Sentences: Ye are the children of the prophets, and of the covenant which God made with our fathers, saying unto Abraham, And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte hananabaa yootiyaageetu naata; qassi Xoossai Abrahaamassi, Sa7an de7iya asaa ubbaa taani ne zerettaa bagaara anjjana yaagidi nu aawatuura maacettido maachchaa naata.

English Sentences: Unto you first God, having raised up his Son Jesus, sent him to bless you, in turning away every one of you from his iniquities.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai inttena ubbata intte iita ogiyaappe guyye zaaridi anjjana mala, ba ashkkaraa denttidi, intteyyo koiro yeddiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And as they spake unto the people, the priests, and the captain of the temple, and the Sadducees , came upon them,
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi asaassi yootishin, qeese halaqati, Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageenne Saaduqaaweti,

English Sentences: Being grieved that they taught the people, and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: eti asaa tamaarissiyo gishshaunne harati haiquwaappe denddanaagau markka gidana mala, Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaa yootido gishshau, daro yiillotidi, etakko yiidosona.

English Sentences: And they laid hands on them, and put them in hold unto the next day: for it was now eventide.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yiidi eta oiqqidi, Sa7ai omariichchido gishshau wonttanaassi qasho keettaa gelissidosona.

English Sentences: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed; and the number of the men was about five thousand.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qaalaa siyidaageetuppe daroti ammanidosona; ammanida attumaasaa qoodai ichchashu sha7aa keeni gidiis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass on the morrow, that their rulers, and elders, and scribes,
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi, eta haariyaageeti, cimati, higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeti, qeese ubbatu halaqai Haanni, Qayaafi,

English Sentences: And Annas the high priest, and Caiaphas, and John, and Alexander, and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest, were gathered together at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi Iskkinddirinne qeese ubbatu halaqaa dabboti ubbai Yerusalaamen yaa7idosona.

English Sentences: And when they had set them in the midst, they asked, By what power, or by what name, have ye done this?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta bantta gidduwan essidi, "Ai wolqqan woi o sunttan hagaa intte oottidetii?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: Then Peter, filled with the Holy Ghost, said unto them, Ye rulers of the people, and elders of Israel,
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode PHeexiroosi banan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Deriyaa haariyaageetoo, cimatoo,

English Sentences: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man, by what means he is made whole;
Wolaitta Sentences: hachchi ha wobbe bitaniyaassi oosettida lo77o oosuwaabaanne i waani paxidaakko, intte nuna oichchikko,

English Sentences: Be it known unto you all, and to all the people of Israel, that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth, whom ye crucified, whom God raised from the dead, even by him doth this man stand here before you whole.
Wolaitta Sentences: masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan intte xishidi kaqqin, Xoossai haiquwaappe denttido Naazireeta Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan ha bitanee paxidi, intte sinttan eqqidoogee intte ubbaassinne Israa7eela asa ubbaassi eretto.

English Sentences: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders, which is become the head of the corner.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gimbbiyaageeti intte karidi ixxido shuchchai, godaa xaphuwaa minttiya, ubbaappe aadhdhiya shuchcha gidiis; he shuchchai Yesuusa.

English Sentences: Neither is there salvation in any other: for there is none other name under heaven given among men, whereby we must be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asi atotettaa Yesuusa baggaara demmanaappe attin, hara o baggaaranne demmenna; nuuni a sunttan attanau bessees; aissi giikko, Xoossai saluwaappe garssan asassi immido hara suntti baawa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John, and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men, they marvelled; and they took knowledge of them, that they had been with Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7aa asai PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi xalido xalaa be7ido wode, eti tamaaribeenna coo asa gididoogaa akeekidi garamettidosona; qassi eti Yesuusaara de7iyoogaa eridosona.

English Sentences: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them, they could say nothing against it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi paxida bitanee PHeexiroosaaranne Yohaannisaara eqqidaagaa asai be7idi, giyoobaa xayiis.

English Sentences: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council, they conferred among themselves,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi yaa7aappe kare kiyana mala asai azazidi, ba giddon zorettiiddi,

English Sentences: Saying, What shall we do to these men? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem; and we cannot deny it.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha asata ai oottanee? Aissi giikko, eta kushiyan oosettida gita malaatai Yerusalaamen de7iya ubbaassi beettiis. Nuuni hegaa erokko gaanau danddayokko.

English Sentences: But that it spread no further among the people, let us straitly threaten them, that they speak henceforth to no man in this name.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin yohoi asau laalettenna mala, hagaappe sinttan ha asati Yesuusa sunttaa ooyyoonne denttennaadan, minttidi eta, Inttena erite goos" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta xeesidi, Yesuusa sunttaa mulekka denttennaadaaninne abaa tamaarissennaadan azazidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter and John answered and said unto them, Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God, judge ye.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi zaaridi, "Xoossau azazettiyoogaa aggidi, intteyyo azazettiyoogee Xoossaa sinttan lo77okkonne ane intte pirddite.

English Sentences: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, nuuni be7idobaanne siyidobaa yootennan agganau danddayokko" yaagidi yaa7au odidosona.

English Sentences: So when they had further threatened them, they let them go, finding nothing how they might punish them, because of the people: for all men glorified God for that which was done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7ai eta qaxxayanau gaasottiyoobi xayin, naa77anttuwaa keehi manddidi, hanidabau asai ubbai Xoossaa galatiyo gishshau, eta birshshi yeddidosona.

English Sentences: For the man was above forty years old, on whom this miracle of healing was shewed.
Wolaitta Sentences: He harggiyaappe pattiyo malaatai oosettido bitanee yelettoosappe laittai au oitamaappe aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: And being let go, they went to their own company, and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi birshshettidi, bantta dabbotukko biidi, qeese halaqatinne cimati banttana giidobaa ubbaa etassi odidosona.

English Sentences: And when they heard that, they lifted up their voice to God with one accord, and said, Lord, thou art God, which hast made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and all that in them is:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode, issi wozana gididi, Xoossaa hagaadan yaagidi woossidosona; "Ubbaa Haariya Godau, saluwaa, sa7aa, abbaanne eta giddon de7iya ubbabaa medhdhidaagoo,

English Sentences: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said, Why did the heathen rage, and the people imagine vain things?
Wolaitta Sentences: neeni ne ashkkaraa nu aawaa Daawita doonan Geeshsha Ayyaanan haasayaidda, Aihuda gidenna asai aissi yiillotidee? Qassi asai aissi pattennabau maqettidee?

English Sentences: The kings of the earth stood up, and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord, and against his Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7aa kawoti giigettidosona; deriyaa haariyaageeti Godaa bollinne i tiyido Kiristtoosa bolli issippe denddidosona yaagada haasayadasa.

English Sentences: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus, whom thou hast anointed, both Herod, and Pontius Pilate, with the Gentiles, and the people of Israel, were gathered together,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi giikko, Heeroodisinne PHenxxeniyaa PHilaaxoosi Aihuda gidenna asaaranne Israa7eela asaara, neeni tiyido Kiristtoosa ne geeshsha Na7aa Yesuusa bolli denddanau, ha kataman shiiqidoogee tuma.

English Sentences: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi neeni ne wolqqaaninne ne sheniyan hanana gaada qoppa uttidobaa ubbaa oottanau shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And now, Lord, behold their threatenings: and grant unto thy servants, that with all boldness they may speak thy word,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77ikka Godau, eta manddettaa xeella; nuuni ne ashkkarati, ne qaalaa kumetta xalan yootanaadan, nuna danddayissa.

English Sentences: By stretching forth thine hand to heal; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Pattanau ne wolqqaa bessa; qassi ne geeshsha Na7aa Yesuusa sunttan oorattabaanne malaataa ootissa" giidi woossidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had prayed, the place was shaken where they were assembled together; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost, and they spake the word of God with boldness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Xoossaa woossidoogaappe guyyiyan, he eti shiiqidosai qaaxxiis. Eta ubban Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin, Xoossaa qaalaa xalan yootidosona.

English Sentences: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul: neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own; but they had all things common.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniyaageeti ubbati qofaaninne wozanan issuwaa gididosona. Eta mehee ubbai issippe de7iyoorippe attin, baassi de7idabaa ooninne babaa gibeenna.

English Sentences: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus: and great grace was upon them all.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Godaa Yesuusi haiquwaappe denddidoogaa gita wolqqan markkattoosona; qassi Xoossai eta ubbau aaro kehatettaa darissidi immiis.

English Sentences: Neither was there any among them that lacked: for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them, and brought the prices of the things that were sold,
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniyaageetu giddon metootanchchi issoinne baawa; aissi giikko, biittai woi keettai de7iyoogeeti ubbati baizzi baizzidi, ekkido miishshaa ehiidi,

English Sentences: And laid them down at the apostles' feet: and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi immoosona; he miishshai asau koshshiyoogaadan shaahettidi, huuphiyan huuphiyan imettees.

English Sentences: And Joses, who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas, (which is, being interpreted, The son of consolation,) a Levite, and of the country of Cyprus,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qophphiroosa giyo haruuruwan yelettida Yooseefa giyo Leewa zare issoi de7ees; a sunttaa Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Barnnaabaasa giidosona. Hegaa birshshettai "Minttettiya Na7aa" giyoogaa.

English Sentences: Having land, sold it, and brought the money, and laid it at the apostles' feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Barnnaabaasi baassi de7iya biittaa baizzidi, miishshaa ehiidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi immiis.

English Sentences: But a certain man named Ananias, with Sapphira his wife, sold a possession,
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi Hanaaniyaa giyo bitanee ba maccaasee Saphphiiro giyooriira gade baizziis.

English Sentences: And kept back part of the price, his wife also being privy to it, and brought a certain part, and laid it at the apostles' feet.
Wolaitta Sentences: He baizzido miishshaappe ba maccaasiyaa erishin ashshidi, baggaa ehiidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi immiis.

English Sentences: But Peter said, Ananias, why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost, and to keep back part of the price of the land?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi Hanaaniyaa, "Neeni Geeshsha Ayyaanaa cimmada ne gadiyaa baizzido miishshaappe shaakkada ashshana mala, xalahee ne wozanan aissi kumidee?

English Sentences: Whiles it remained, was it not thine own? and after it was sold, was it not in thine own power? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart? thou hast not lied unto men, but unto God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni baizzanaappe kase gadee nebaa gidenneeyye? Qassi neeni baizza simminkka miishshai neessa gidenneeyye? Yaatin, hagaa malabaa oottanau aissi ne wozanan qoppadii? Neeni Xoossau worddotidoogaappe attin, asau worddotabaakka" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Ananias hearing these words fell down, and gave up the ghost: and great fear came on all them that heard these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanaanee he qaalaa siyidosaarakka kunddidi haiqqi aggiis; hegaa siyida ubbai daro yayyiis.

English Sentences: And the young men arose, wound him up, and carried him out, and buried him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodalla asati soo gelidi, a ahaa xaaxidi, gade kessidi a moogidosona.

English Sentences: And it was about the space of three hours after, when his wife, not knowing what was done, came in.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzu saate heerappe guyyiyan, Hanaaniyaa maccaasiyaa hegaa erennan de7aidda PHeexiroosi de7iyoosaa gelaasu.

English Sentences: And Peter answered unto her, Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much? And she said, Yea, for so much.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gelin PHeexiroosi o, "Intte gadiyaa hanni keena miishshen baizzidetii? Ane tau oda" yaagiis. A, "Ee hanni keena miishshen baizzida" yaagaasu.

English Sentences: Then Peter said unto her, How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord? behold, the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door, and shall carry thee out.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi maccaasiyo, "Neeninne ne azinai Godaa Ayyaanaa paaccanau aissi zorettidetii? Be7a; ne azinaa moogida asati karen de7oosona; nenakka eti kare kessana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then fell she down straightway at his feet, and yielded up the ghost: and the young men came in, and found her dead, and, carrying her forth, buried her by her husband.
Wolaitta Sentences: Maccaasiyaa sohuwaarakka PHeexiroosa tohuwaa matan kunddada haiqqa aggaasu; wodalla asati geliyo wode haiqqidaaro demmidi, kare kessidi, i azinaa lanqqiyan moogidosona.

English Sentences: And great fear came upon all the church, and upon as many as heard these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woosa keettaa asai ubbainne hegaa siyida hara asai ubbai daro yashshaa yayyiis.

English Sentences: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people; (and they were all with one accord in Solomon's porch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti daro malaataanne oorattabaa asaa giddon oottoosona; ammaniya ubbati Solomona baranddaa giyoosan issippe gaittidosona.

English Sentences: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them: but the people magnified them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hara asappe etaara gaittanau harai atto issoinne xalibeenna; shin asai eta bonchchees.

English Sentences: And believers were the more added to the Lord, multitudes both of men and women.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniya maccaasainne attumaasai kaseegaappe daroi Godaassi gujettees.

English Sentences: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets, and laid them on beds and couches, that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asai hargganchchata halaaninne saleenan tookkidi, PHeexiroosi hegaara aadhdhiyo wode harai atto, au eeshoikkonne etappe issuwaa issuwaa bollaara aadhdhana mala, katamaa ogetu dooni kessidi wottees.

English Sentences: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem, bringing sick folks, and them which were vexed with unclean spirits: and they were healed every one.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi daro asai Yerusalaame matan de7iya katamatuppe hargganchchatanne tuna ayyaanan ohettida asata ekki yees; ubbatikka paxidosona.

English Sentences: Then the high priest rose up, and all they that were with him, (which is the sect of the Sadducees ,) and were filled with indignation,
Wolaitta Sentences: Paxin qeese ubbatu halaqainne aara de7iya Saaduqaaweti ubbati Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta daro qanaatidi, eta bolli denddidosona.

English Sentences: And laid their hands on the apostles, and put them in the common prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta oiqqidi, dere asaa qachchiyo keettan yeggidosona.

English Sentences: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors, and brought them forth, and said,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Godaa kiitanchchai qammi qasho keettaa penggiyaa dooyidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta kare kessidi,

English Sentences: Go, stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte biidi, Beeta Maqidasiyan eqqidi, ha ooratta de7uwaa qaalaa ubba asau yootite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they heard that, they entered into the temple early in the morning, and taught. But the high priest came, and they that were with him, and called the council together, and all the senate of the children of Israel, and sent to the prison to have them brought.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegaa siyido wode, guuraara Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelidi, tamaarissanau doommidosona. Qassi qeese ubbatu halaqainne aara de7iyaageeti yiidi, yaa7aanne Israa7eela cimata ubbata issippe xeegidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta bantta sintti ehaana mala, wotaaddarata qasho keettau kiittidosona.

English Sentences: But when the officers came, and found them not in the prison, they returned, and told,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin wotaaddarati qasho keettaa biidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta demmibookkona; guyye simmidi yaa7au, "Nuuni biyo wode qasho keettaa kariyaa daro mintti gorddin, naagiyaageetikka penggen eqqidaageeta demmida;

English Sentences: Saying, The prison truly found we shut with all safety, and the keepers standing without before the doors: but when we had opened, we found no man within.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin nuuni kariyaa dooyiyo wode, giddon harai atto issi asinne baawa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things, they doubted of them whereunto this would grow.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaageenne qeese halaqati hegaa siyido wode, "Hagee waanidee? Qassi digin waananee?" yaagidi hirggidosona.

English Sentences: Then came one and told them, saying, Behold, the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple, and teaching the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, issi bitanee etakko yiidi, "Be7ite; qasho keettan intte yeggido asati Beeta Maqidasiyan eqqidi, asaa tamaarissoosona" yaagidi etau odiis.

English Sentences: Then went the captain with the officers, and brought them without violence: for they feared the people, lest they should have been stoned.
Wolaitta Sentences: Odin, Beeta Maqidasiyaa wotaaddarata azaziyaagee wotaaddaratuura biidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta ehiis; shin eti banttana asai shuchchan caddana giidi yayyido gishshau, eta loddan ehiidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had brought them, they set them before the council: and the high priest asked them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta ehiidi, yaa7aa sinttan essin, qeese ubbatu halaqai eta,

English Sentences: Saying, Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name? and, behold, ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine, and intend to bring this man's blood upon us.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Inttena nuuni he bitaniyaa sunttan tamaarissenna mala minttidi azazibookkonii? Be7ite; intte timirttiyaa Yerusalaame katamaa muleera gattideta; qassi he bitaniyaa shemppuwan nuna oittanau qoppeeta!" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said, We ought to obey God rather than men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin PHeexiroosinne Yesuusi kiittido harati zaaridi yaagidosona; "Nuuni asau azazettanaappe Xoossau azazettanau bessees.

English Sentences: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus, whom ye slew and hanged on a tree.
Wolaitta Sentences: Masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishi kaqqidi, intte worido Yesuusa nu aawatu Xoossai haiquwaappe denttiis;

English Sentences: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour, for to give repentance to Israel, and forgiveness of sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelatussi nagaraappe simuwaanne nagaraa atto geettaa Yesuusi immana mala, Xoossai haariyaagaanne ashshiyaagaa a oottidi, baappe ushachcha baggan xoqqu xoqqu oottiis.

English Sentences: And we are his witnesses of these things; and so is also the Holy Ghost, whom God hath given to them that obey him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaassi nuuni markka; qassi Xoossai baassi azazettiyaageetussi immido Geeshsha Ayyaanaikka markka" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: When they heard that, they were cut to the heart, and took counsel to slay them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7aa asai hegaa siyido wode, daro yiillotidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta woranau qoppidosona.

English Sentences: Then stood there up one in the council, a Pharisee, named Gamaliel, a doctor of the law, had in reputation among all the people, and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin asa ubban daro bonchchettida Gamaaliyaala giyoogee, higgiyaa tamaarissiya issi Parisaawee, yaa7an denddi eqqidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta guutta wodiyaa kare kessana mala azaziis.

English Sentences: And said unto them, Ye men of Israel, take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azazidi yaa7aa hagaadan yaagiis; "Israa7eela asatoo, intte ha asata oottana qoppiyooban inttena naagite.

English Sentences: For before these days rose up Theudas, boasting himself to be somebody; to whom a number of men, about four hundred, joined themselves: who was slain; and all, as many as obeyed him, were scattered, and brought to nought.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, hagaappe kase wodiyan Tewodaasi bana gita giidi denddiis; denddin oiddu xeetu gidiya asati aara gaittidosona; shin a worin, a kaallida ubbatikka laalettidi, pattenna asa gididi attidosona.

English Sentences: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing, and drew away much people after him: he also perished; and all, even as many as obeyed him, were dispersed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, asai qoodettiyo wode, Galiila Yihudai denddidi, daro asaa panggayidi kaalettiis; shin akka worin, a kaallida asai ubbaikka laalettiis.

English Sentences: And now I say unto you, Refrain from these men, and let them alone: for if this counsel or this work be of men, it will come to nought:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka taani intteyyo odais; ha asatuppe shaahettite; eta bochchoppite. Aissi giikko, ha qofainne ha oosoi asi oottidobaa gidikko xayana.

English Sentences: But if it be of God, ye cannot overthrow it; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ha qofainne ha oosoi Xoossaappe yiidabaa gidikko, intte eta xaissanau danddayekketa; geelladan yaaniiddi Xoossaara intte iitettananne" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And to him they agreed: and when they had called the apostles, and beaten them, they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus, and let them go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin yaa7ai Gamaaliyaala zoriyaa ekkidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta soo xeesidi, lissuwan garafissiis; hegaappe guyyiyan eta, "Yesuusa sunttaa naa77anttuwaa mulekka denttoppite" giidi birshshi yeddiis.

English Sentences: And they departed from the presence of the council, rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa sunttaa gishshau, eti kauyyanau bessiyoogaa Xoossai qoppido gishshau, yaa7aappe ufaittiiddi kiyidosona.

English Sentences: And daily in the temple, and in every house, they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubba gallassi Beeta Maqidasiyaaninne asa son Yesuusi Xoossai tiyido Kiristtoosa gididoogaa tamaarissiyoogaanne yootiyoogaa yaa gujjidosona.

English Sentences: And in those days, when the number of the disciples was multiplied, there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews, because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, kaalliyaageetu qoodai dari dari biishin, Giriike qaalaa haasayiya Aihudatinne Yihudan de7iya Aihudati ooyettidosona; aissi giikko, Giriike qaalaa haasayiya Aihudati, "Ubba gallassi yeziyo quman nu am77eti naaqettoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them, and said, It is not reason that we should leave the word of God, and serve tables.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittido tammanne naa77ati woosa keettaa asa ubbaa xeegidi, hagaadan yaagidosona; "Nuuni Xoossaa qaalaa yootiyoogaa aggidi, quma yezanau nuussi bessenna.

English Sentences: Wherefore, brethren, look ye out among you seven men of honest report, full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom, whom we may appoint over this business.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishatoo, lo77o geetettiyaageeta Geeshsha Ayyaanainne aadhdhida eratettai kumido laappun asata intte giddoppe doorite; nuuni qassi eta ha oosuwaassi sunttana.

English Sentences: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer, and to the ministry of the word.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin nuuni Xoossaa woosaaninne qaalaa yootuwan minnana" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the saying pleased the whole multitude: and they chose Stephen, a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost, and Philip, and Prochorus, and Nicanor, and Timon, and Parmenas, and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti haasayido haasayai asa ubbaa ufaissiis; ufaissin, ammanoinne Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumido Isxxifaanoosa, Piliphphoosa, PHirokoroosa, Niqaaroona, Ximoona, PHarmmeenanne Aihudatu ammanuwan gelida Anxxookiyaa Niiqolaawoosa dooridosona.

English Sentences: Whom they set before the apostles: and when they had prayed, they laid their hands on them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooridi Yesuusi kiittidoogeetu sinttan eta essin, Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Xoossaa woossidoogaappe guyyiyan, bantta kushiyaa eta bolli wottidosona.

English Sentences: And the word of God increased; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa qaalai aakki aakki biis; kaalliyaageetu qoodainne Yerusalaamen keehi dari dari biis; qassi daro qeesetikka ammanidosona.

English Sentences: And Stephen, full of faith and power, did great wonders and miracles among the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aaro kehatettainne wolqqai kumido Isxxifaanoosi, asaa giddon oorattabaanne gita malaataa oottees.

English Sentences: Then there arose certain of the synagogue, which is called the synagogue of the Libertines, and Cyrenians, and Alexandrians, and of them of Cilicia and of Asia, disputing with Stephen.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ailletettaappe kiyida asaa giyo Aihuda woosa keettaappe, Qareenappe, Iskkinddiriyaa asatuppe, Kilqqiyaappenne Isiyaappe yiida issi issi asati denddidi, Isxxifaanoosaara palamettoosona.

English Sentences: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Isxxifaanoosi aadhdhida eratettaaninne Ayyaanan haasayiyoogaa teqqanau danddayibookkona.

English Sentences: Then they suborned men, which said, We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses, and against God.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode eti, "Muusanne Xoossaa i cayishin siyida" giya worddo asata shammidosona.

English Sentences: And they stirred up the people, and the elders, and the scribes, and came upon him, and caught him, and brought him to the council,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHammidi dere asaa, cimatanne higgiyaa tamaarissiyaageeta hanqetissidosona; Isxxifaanoosakko yiidi a oiqqidi, yaa7aakko ehin,

English Sentences: And set up false witnesses, which said, This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place, and the law:
Wolaitta Sentences: a bolli paidido worddo markkati, "Ha bitanee ha Beeta Maqidasiyaanne Muuse higgiyaa cayiyoogaa audenne aggenna.

English Sentences: For we have heard him say, that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place, and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko i, Hagee Naazireeta Yesuusi ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa qolana; Muusee nuussi immido higgiyaakka laammana yaagishin, nuuni siyida" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And all that sat in the council, looking stedfastly on him, saw his face as it had been the face of an angel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaa7an uttida asai ubbai Isxxifaanoosa akeekidi xeelliyo wode, a som77oi kiitanchchaa som77uwaa milatees.

English Sentences: Then said the high priest, Are these things so?
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese ubbatu halaqai Isxxifaanoosa, "Hagee tumee?" yaagidi oichchiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Men, brethren, and fathers, hearken; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he dwelt in Charran,
Wolaitta Sentences: Oichchin Isxxifaanoosi hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta ishatoo, ta aawatoo, siyite! Nu aawaa Abrahaami biron Kaaraane baanaappe kase Masphphexoomiyan de7ishin, bonchcho Xoossai ayyo beettidi,

English Sentences: And said unto him, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and come into the land which I shall shew thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne biittaappenne ne dabbotuppe shaahettada, taani nena bessiyo biitti ba yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans, and dwelt in Charran: and from thence, when his father was dead, he removed him into this land, wherein ye now dwell.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode Abrahaami Kaladaawetu biittaappe kiyidi, Kaaraanen de7anau biis. A aawai haiqqidoogaappe guyyiyan, Xoossai a ha biittaa intte ha77i de7iyoosaa ehiis.

English Sentences: And he gave him none inheritance in it, no, not so much as to set his foot on: yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession, and to his seed after him, when as yet he had no child.
Wolaitta Sentences: I ha biittaappe harai atto, tohuwan yedhdhiyo sohuwaakka Abrahaamassi immibeenna; shin ayyo na7i xayikkokka, Xoossai a, Taani neeyyoonne neeppe guyyiyan, ne zerettaayyo ha biittaa laata oottada immana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And God spake on this wise, That his seed should sojourn in a strange land; and that they should bring them into bondage, and entreat them evil four hundred years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Abrahaamassi, Ne zareti hara biittan de7ana; yaani oiddu xeetu laittau eti ailletananne naaqettana.

English Sentences: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge, said God: and after that shall they come forth, and serve me in this place.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin taani ne zareta haariya asaa bolli pirddana; hegaappe guyyiyan, eti he deriyaappe kiyidi, hagan tau goinnana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision: and so Abraham begat Isaac, and circumcised him the eighth day; and Isaac begat Jacob; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Abrahaama zaree qaxxarettana mala aara maacettin, Yisaaqa i yelidi, hosppuntta gallassi qaxxariis; Yisaaqi Yaaqooba qaxxarin, qassi Yaaqoobi tammanne naa77u aawatu halaqata qaxxariis.

English Sentences: And the patriarchs, moved with envy, sold Joseph into Egypt: but God was with him,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aawatu halaqati Yooseefa qanaatidi, Gibxxe biittaassi ailletanaadan, a baizzidosona; baizzinkka Xoossai aara issippe de7ees.

English Sentences: And delivered him out of all his afflictions, and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: A waaye ubbaappekka a kessiis; qassi Gibxxe kawuwaa sinttankka nashuwaanne aadhdhida eratettaa ayyo immiis; Gibxxe kawoi Yooseefassi Gibxxe biittaanne ba keetta ubbaa haaranaadan, sunttatettaa immiis.

English Sentences: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan, and great affliction: and our fathers found no sustenance.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Gibxxe biittaaninne Kanaane biittan ubban koshai gelidi, daro asaa tuggayiis; tuggayin nu aawati quma demmibookkona.

English Sentences: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt, he sent out our fathers first.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Gibxxe biittan kattai de7iyoogaa siyidi, nu aawata koiro yaa yeddiis.

English Sentences: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto buussan Yooseefi ba ishanttussi erettiis; qassi Gibxxe kawoikka Yooseefa zariyaa eriis.

English Sentences: Then sent Joseph, and called his father Jacob to him, and all his kindred, threescore and fifteen souls.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefi ba aawaa Yaaqoobinne ba dabbo ubbai muleera laappun tammanne ichchashu asai baakko yaana mala, kiittidi xeegissiis.

English Sentences: So Jacob went down into Egypt, and died, he, and our fathers,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaaqoobi Gibxxe biittaa wodhdhidi haiqqiis; nu aawatikka yaani haiqqidosona.

English Sentences: And were carried over into Sychem, and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta ahai he sohuwaappe Sekeema giyo biittaa toohettidi, yaani Abrahaami Hamoora naatuppe daro biran shammido makkaanan moogettiis.

English Sentences: But when the time of the promise drew nigh, which God had sworn to Abraham, the people grew and multiplied in Egypt,
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Xoossai Abrahaamassi immana giidoogee polettiyo wodee gakkana matin,

English Sentences: Till another king arose, which knew not Joseph.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yooseefa erenna hara kawoi Gibxxe biittan denddana gakkanaassi, asai dari dari biis.

English Sentences: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred, and evil entreated our fathers, so that they cast out their young children, to the end they might not live.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kawoi nu zariyaa cimmidi, guutta naati haiqqana mala, kare eta kessi olanaadan, nu aawata un77ettiis.

English Sentences: In which time Moses was born, and was exceeding fair, and nourished up in his father's house three months:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Muusee yelettidoi he wode; Xoossaa sinttan i daro lo77o na7a gidiis; ba aawaa keettan heezzu agina gakkanaas dicciis.

English Sentences: And when he was cast out, Pharaoh's daughter took him up, and nourished him for her own son.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee wora olettido wode, Gibxxe kawuwaa na7iyaa demmada ba na7adan a dichchaasu.

English Sentences: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians, and was mighty in words and in deeds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee Gibxxetu aadhdhida eratettaa ubbaa tamaaridi, qaalaaninne oosuwan wolqqaama asa gidiis.

English Sentences: And when he was full forty years old, it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin Muuseyyo yelettoosappe laittai oitamaa kumido wode, ba ishantta, Israa7eela asata be7anau ba wozanan qoppiis.

English Sentences: And seeing one of them suffer wrong, he defended him, and avenged him that was oppressed, and smote the Egyptian:
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eelatuppe issuwaa Gibxxe issoi naaqqishin be7idi, he Israa7eeliyaa maaddiis; he naaqqida Gibxxe bitaniyaa woridi, a haluwaa kessiis.

English Sentences: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them: but they understood not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee ba ishantta ba baggaara Xoossai ashshana haniyoogaa eti akeekidosona giidi qoppiis; shin eti akeekibookkona.

English Sentences: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove, and would have set them at one again, saying, Sirs, ye are brethren; why do ye wrong one to another?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Wonttetta gallassi naa77u Israa7eela asati issoi issuwaara warettiyaageeta demmidi, eta sigettanau koyidi, Asatoo, Ishantti intte aissi issoi issuwaa naaqqeetii? yaagiis.

English Sentences: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us?
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin he ba shooruwaa naaqqiyaagee Muusa, Nena nu bolli haariyaagaanne daanna oottidi, sunttidai oonee?

English Sentences: Wilt thou kill me, as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni zine Gibxxe bitaniyaa woridoogaadan, tanakka woranau koyaiyye? yaagidi, Muusa gaxi sugi yeggiis.

English Sentences: Then fled Moses at this saying, and was a stranger in the land of Madian, where he begat two sons.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee hegaa siyido wode Gibxxeppe baqatidi, Midiyaama biittan bete gididi de7iiddi, naa77u attuma naata yaani yeliis.

English Sentences: And when forty years were expired, there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Godaa kiitanchchai oitamu laittaappe guyyiyan, Siinaa Deriyaa matan de7iya bazzuwaa buuran eexxiya tamaa lacuwaa giddon Muusessi beettiis.

English Sentences: When Moses saw it, he wondered at the sight: and as he drew near to behold it, the voice of the LORD came unto him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Muusee ba be7idoogau garamettidi, akeeki xeellanau buuraa mati i shiiqidaashin,

English Sentences: Saying, I am the God of thy fathers, the God of Abraham, and the God of Isaac, and the God of Jacob. Then Moses trembled, and durst not behold.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa qaalai, Taani ne aawatu Xoossaa, Abrahaama Xoossaa, Yisaaqa Xoossaa, Yaaqooba Xoossaa yaagidi Muusekko yiis. Muusee yashshaa kokkoridi, xeellanau xalibeenna.

English Sentences: Then said the Lord to him, Put off thy shoes from thy feet: for the place where thou standest is holy ground.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Godai Muusa, Neeni eqqido biittai geeshsha gidiyo gishshau, ne tohuwan de7iya caammaa kessa.

English Sentences: I have seen, I have seen the affliction of my people which is in Egypt, and I have heard their groaning, and am come down to deliver them. And now come, I will send thee into Egypt.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani Gibxxen de7iya ta asaa waayiyaa geeshsha be7ada, qassi eta ooliyaakka siyada, eta ashshanau wodhdhaas. Ha77i haa ya. Taani nena Gibxxe kiittana yaagiis.

English Sentences: This Moses whom they refused, saying, Who made thee a ruler and a judge? the same did God send to be a ruler and a deliverer by the hand of the angel which appeared to him in the bush.
Wolaitta Sentences: "He Muusa Israa7eelati; Nena nuna haariyaagaanne daanna oottidi sunttidai oonee? yaagidi ixxidosona; ixxin buuraa giddon ayyo beettida kiitanchchan haariyaagaanne ashshiyaagaa gidana mala, Xoossai a kiittiis.

English Sentences: He brought them out, after that he had shewed wonders and signs in the land of Egypt, and in the Red sea, and in the wilderness forty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: He Muusee Israa7eelata Gibxxe biittan Zo7o Abbaaninne bazzuwan, oitamu laittau oorattabaanne Xoossai oottiyo malaataa oottiiddi, Gibxxeppe kaalettiis.

English Sentences: This is that Moses, which said unto the children of Israel, A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren, like unto me; him shall ye hear.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Israa7eela asaassi, Xoossai tana denttidoogaadan, intte zariyaa giddoppe ta mala hananabaa yootiyaagaa intteyyo denttana yaagidai he Muusa.

English Sentences: This is he, that was in the church in the wilderness with the angel which spake to him in the mount Sina, and with our fathers: who received the lively oracles to give unto us:
Wolaitta Sentences: I Israa7eela asaa maabaraara issippe bazzuwan de7idaagaa; i nu aawatuuranne Siinaa Deriyaa bollan baassi haasayida kiitanchchaara issippe de7iis. Yaatidi Xoossaappe de7uwaa qaalaa nuussi immanau ekkiis.

English Sentences: To whom our fathers would not obey, but thrust him from them, and in their hearts turned back again into Egypt,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Muusessi nu aawati azazettanau dosibookkona; shin gede a sugi olidi, guyye gibxxe simmanau amottidosona.

English Sentences: Saying unto Aaron, Make us gods to go before us: for as for this Moses, which brought us out of the land of Egypt, we wot not what is become of him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Aaroona, Nuna kaalettiya xoossata nuussi ootta; aissi giikko, ha nuna Gibxxeppe ehiida Muusee waanidaakkonne nuuni erokko yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they made a calf in those days, and offered sacrifice unto the idol, and rejoiced in the works of their own hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mara milatissidi, he wode eeqaa oottidosona; he eeqaassi yarshshuwaa yarshshidi, bantta kushee oottido oosuwan ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: Then God turned, and gave them up to worship the host of heaven; as it is written in the book of the prophets, O ye house of Israel, have ye offered to me slain beasts and sacrifices by the space of forty years in the wilderness?
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai etau zokkuwaa zaariis; eti saluwaa xoolinttiyaassi goinnanaadan, eta yeggi bayiis; hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafan, Israa7eela asatoo, oitamu laittaa bazzon shukkido mehiyaanne yarshshuwaa taassi yarshshidetii?

English Sentences: Yea, ye took up the tabernacle of Moloch, and the star of your god Remphan, figures which ye made to worship them: and I will carry you away beyond Babylon.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte intteyyo goinnanau oottido eeqata, Molooka dunkkaaniyaanne Refaana giyo intte xoossaa xoolinttiyaa tookkideta. Taani inttena Baabilooneppe hini baggi yeddana geetettidi xaafettiis.

English Sentences: Our fathers had the tabernacle of witness in the wilderness, as he had appointed, speaking unto Moses, that he should make it according to the fashion that he had seen.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Muusee ba be7idoogaa milatissidi, Godai ayyo odidoogaadan oottido markka dunkkaanee nu aawatussi bazzuwan de7ees.

English Sentences: Which also our fathers that came after brought in with Jesus into the possession of the Gentiles, whom God drave out before the face of our fathers, unto the days of David;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi nu aawati dunkkaaniyaa bantta aawatuppe kayan ekkidi, Xoossai kase yedettido Aihuda gidenna asaa biittaa oiqqido wode, Yaasuura gelissidosona; he dunkkaanee Daawiti de7iyo wodee gakkanaassikka he sohuwan de7iis.

English Sentences: Who found favour before God, and desired to find a tabernacle for the God of Jacob.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawiti Xoossan sabettiis; qassi Yaaqooba Godai de7ana keettaa keexxanau Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: But Solomon built him an house.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ayyo keettaa keexxidai Solomona.

English Sentences: Howbeit the most High dwelleth not in temples made with hands; as saith the prophet,
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin hananabaa yootiyaagee,

English Sentences: Heaven is my throne, and earth is my footstool: what house will ye build me? saith the Lord: or what is the place of my rest?
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai, "Saloi ta kawotaa araataa; sa7aikka ta tohoi yedhdhiyoosaa. Yaatin, taayyo ai mala keetta keexxuuteetii? Woi taani shemppanasai awaanee?

English Sentences: Hath not my hand made all these things?
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha ubbabaa ta kushiyan oottabeikkinaa?" yaagees giidoogaadan, Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossai asi keexxido keettan de7enna.

English Sentences: Ye stiffnecked and uncircumcised in heart and ears, ye do always resist the Holy Ghost: as your fathers did, so do ye.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Intte aiba morgge zozzida asee? Intte wozanai Xoossaa qaalaa ekkanau aiba dammidee? Intte haittaikka aiba tullidee? Ubba wode Geeshsha Ayyaanaassi azazettennan ixxeeta.

English Sentences: Which of the prophets have not your fathers persecuted? and they have slain them which shewed before of the coming of the Just One; of whom ye have been now the betrayers and murderers:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaageetun intte aawati waissibeennai oonee? Xoossaa Na7ai Xilloi yaanaagaa kasetidi yootidaageetakka woridosona.

English Sentences: Who have received the law by the disposition of angels, and have not kept it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i inttekka kiitanchchatu kushiyaappe Xoossaa higgiyaa ekkidi azazettibeennaageeti, Xilluwaa aatti immidi worideta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they heard these things, they were cut to the heart, and they gnashed on him with their teeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode, bantta wozanan Isxxifaanoosassi daro yiillotidi, bantta menttershshaa sa77idi manddidosona.

English Sentences: But he, being full of the Holy Ghost, looked up stedfastly into heaven, and saw the glory of God, and Jesus standing on the right hand of God,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Isxxifaanoosi banan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin, saluwaa pude tishshi ootti xeellidi, Xoossaa bonchchuwaanne Yesuusi Xoossaappe ushachcha baggan eqqidaagaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And said, Behold, I see the heavens opened, and the Son of man standing on the right hand of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7idi, "Xeellite, taani saloi dooyettin, Asa Na7ai Xoossaappe ushachcha baggan eqqidaagaa be7ais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then they cried out with a loud voice, and stopped their ears, and ran upon him with one accord,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qaalaa xoqqu oottidi wocamiiddi, bantta haittaa tuccidi, issippe akko wottaa shoddidosona.

English Sentences: And cast him out of the city, and stoned him: and the witnesses laid down their clothes at a young man's feet, whose name was Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Katamaappe gaxaa a kessidi, shuchchan caddidosona. Markkati bantta maayuwaa issi Saa7oola giyo wodallaa matan wottidosona.

English Sentences: And they stoned Stephen, calling upon God, and saying, Lord Jesus, receive my spirit.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isxxifaanoosi, "Ta Godaa Yesuusaa, ta shemppuwaa ekka" yaagidi xeesishin, eti shuchchan a caddoosona.

English Sentences: And he kneeled down, and cried with a loud voice, Lord, lay not this sin to their charge. And when he had said this, he fell asleep.
Wolaitta Sentences: Caddishin gulbbatidi, ba qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Ta Godau, ha nagaraa etau atto ga" yaagiis. Hegaa yaaginnee haiqqi aggiis. Saa7oolikka Isxxifaanoosa woriyoogaa ufaittiis.

English Sentences: And Saul was consenting unto his death. And at that time there was a great persecution against the church which was at Jerusalem; and they were all scattered abroad throughout the regions of Judaea and Samaria, except the apostles.
Wolaitta Sentences: He gallassi Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keettan gita yedetai denddiis; denddin Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuppe attin, ammaniyaageeti ubbati Yihudaa biittaaninne Samaariyaa biittan laalettidosona.

English Sentences: And devout men carried Stephen to his burial, and made great lamentation over him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossaa woosan sheekkida asati Isxxifaanoosa moogidosona; qassi au daro yeekkidosona.

English Sentences: As for Saul, he made havock of the church, entering into every house, and haling men and women committed them to prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saa7ooli woosa keettaa xaissees; ubbaa keettaa geli gelidi, attumaasaanne maccaasaa goochchi goochchidi, qasho keettaa yeddees.

English Sentences: Therefore they that were scattered abroad went every where preaching the word.
Wolaitta Sentences: Laalettida ammaniyaageeti qaalaa yootiiddi, ubbasaa biidosona.

English Sentences: Then Philip went down to the city of Samaria, and preached Christ unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi Samaariyaa katamaa wodhdhidi, Kiristtoosabaa asaassi yootiis.

English Sentences: And the people with one accord gave heed unto those things which Philip spake, hearing and seeing the miracles which he did.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro asai Piliphphoosi giidoogaa keehi akeekidi siyiis; i oottiyo malaataakka be7iis.

English Sentences: For unclean spirits, crying with loud voice, came out of many that were possessed with them: and many taken with palsies, and that were lame, were healed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, tuna ayyaanati qaalaa xoqqu oottidi haasayiiddi, daro asaappe kiyidosona; qassi daro silatinne wobbeti paxidosona.

English Sentences: And there was great joy in that city.
Wolaitta Sentences: He kataman asai daro ufaittiis.

English Sentences: But there was a certain man, called Simon, which beforetime in the same city used sorcery, and bewitched the people of Samaria, giving out that himself was some great one:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Simoona giyo issi bitanee kase, bana gita giiddi kaayiiddi, Samaariyaa asaa, "Laa hagee aiba oorattabee" giissiiddinne he kataman de7iis.

English Sentences: To whom they all gave heed, from the least to the greatest, saying, This man is the great power of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Guuttaappe doommidi, gitaa gakkanaashin, asai ubbai, "Xoossaa wolqqai gitai hagaa" giidi abaa ezggees.

English Sentences: And to him they had regard, because that of long time he had bewitched them with sorceries.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro wodiyaappe doommidi, kaayuwan Samaariyaa asaa "Laa hagee aiba oorattabee" giissido gishshau, asai abaa ezggees.

English Sentences: But when they believed Philip preaching the things concerning the kingdom of God, and the name of Jesus Christ, they were baptized, both men and women.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Piliphphoosi Xoossaa kawotettaabaanne Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttaabaa attumaageetussinne maccaageetussi yootin, eti abaa ammanidi xammaqettidosona.

English Sentences: Then Simon himself believed also: and when he was baptized, he continued with Philip, and wondered, beholding the miracles and signs which were done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Simoonikka ba huuphen ammaniis; ammanidi xammaqettidoogaappe guyyiyan, Piliphphoosaara issippe de7iiddi, oosettiya malaataanne Xoossai oottido gita malaataa be7idi garamettiis.

English Sentences: Now when the apostles which were at Jerusalem heard that Samaria had received the word of God, they sent unto them Peter and John:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittido Yerusalaamen de7iyaageeti, Samaariyaa asai Xoossaa qaalaa ekkidoogaa siyido wode, PHeexiroosanne Yohaannisa etakko yeddidosona.

English Sentences: Who, when they were come down, prayed for them, that they might receive the Holy Ghost:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yeddin PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi wodhdhidi, ammaniyaageeti Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkana mala, etau Xoossaa woossidosona;

English Sentences: (For as yet he was fallen upon none of them: only they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus.)
Wolaitta Sentences: aissi giikko, Samaariyaa asati Godaa Yesuusa sunttan xinqqate xalaalaa xammaqettidoogaappe attin, etappe issuwaa bollinne Geeshsha Ayyaanai wodhdhiichchibeenna.
