English Sentences: Then laid they their hands on them, and they received the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi bantta kushiyaa eta bolli wottin, eti Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidosona.

English Sentences: And when Simon saw that through laying on of the apostles' hands the Holy Ghost was given, he offered them money,
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti bantta kushiyaa eta bolli wottin, etassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai imettidoogaa Simooni be7ido wode, PHeexiroosassinne Yohaannisassi miishshaa ehiidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Give me also this power, that on whomsoever I lay hands, he may receive the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taanikka ta kushiyaa wottiyo ubbai Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkana mala, ha godatettaa taukka immerkketii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Peter said unto him, Thy money perish with thee, because thou hast thought that the gift of God may be purchased with money.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi ayyo hagaadan yaagiis; "Neeni Xoossaa imuwaa miishshan shammanau qoppido gishshau, ne miishshai nenaara coo xayo.

English Sentences: Thou hast neither part nor lot in this matter: for thy heart is not right in the sight of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ne wozanai Xoossaa sinttan suure gidenna gishshau, neeyyo hagan oosoi woi sohoi baawa.

English Sentences: Repent therefore of this thy wickedness, and pray God, if perhaps the thought of thine heart may be forgiven thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatada ha ne wozanaa iita qofaa gishshau, nagaraappe simma; geelladan ne wozanan de7iya iita qofaa Xoossai atto gaanaakkonne Xoossaa woossa.

English Sentences: For I perceive that thou art in the gall of bitterness, and in the bond of iniquity.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni daro qanaatiyaa oiqqada nagaraa qashuwan de7iyoogaa taani be7ais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then answered Simon, and said, Pray ye to the LORD for me, that none of these things which ye have spoken come upon me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Simooni PHeexiroosassinne Yohaannisassi zaaridi, "Intte giidobaappe issibainne tana gakkenna mala, intte tau Xoossaa woossite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they, when they had testified and preached the word of the Lord, returned to Jerusalem, and preached the gospel in many villages of the Samaritans.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosinne Yohaannisi markkattidoogaappenne Godaa qaalaa yootidoogaappe guyyiyan, guyye Yerusalaame simmidosona; simmiiddi Samaariyan de7iya daro qeeri katamatun wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootidosona.

English Sentences: And the angel of the Lord spake unto Philip, saying, Arise, and go toward the south unto the way that goeth down from Jerusalem unto Gaza, which is desert.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa kiitanchchai Piliphphoosa, "Denddada Yerusalaameppe Gaaza efiya bazzo ogiyaakko ba; he ogee tohossa baggaara de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he arose and went: and, behold, a man of Ethiopia, an eunuch of great authority under Candace queen of the Ethiopians, who had the charge of all her treasure, and had come to Jerusalem for to worship,
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi denddidi biis. Hinddake giyo Toophphiyaa kaweessi biittaa haariya i miishsha ubbaakka naagiya Toophphiyaa asa issi mureessai de7ees; de7iyaagee goinnanau Yerusalaame biis.

English Sentences: Was returning, and sitting in his chariot read Esaias the prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Parai goochchiyo gaariyan uttidi, Yerusalaameppe guyye simmiiddi, hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasa maxaafaa nabbabees.

English Sentences: Then the Spirit said unto Philip, Go near, and join thyself to this chariot.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha Ayyaanai Piliphphoosa, "He gaariyaakko shiiqada hemetta" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Philip ran thither to him, and heard him read the prophet Esaias, and said, Understandest thou what thou readest?
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Piliphphoosi woxxidi, hananabaa yootiya Isiyaasa maxaafaa mureessai nabbabishin siyidi a, "Neeni nabbabiyoogaa akeekai?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he said, How can I, except some man should guide me? And he desired Philip that he would come up and sit with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Mureessai, "Tau odidi akeekissiya asi bainnan waanidi akeekettii?" yaagiis; qassi banaara gaariyan kiyidi uttana mala, Piliphphoosa woossiis.

English Sentences: The place of the scripture which he read was this, He was led as a sheep to the slaughter; and like a lamb dumb before his shearer, so opened he not his mouth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Mureessai nabbabiyo maxaafaa sohoi hagaadan yaagees; "Dorssadan i shuhettanau laagettiis. Dorssa marai ba ikisiyaa meediyaagaa sinttan co77u giyoogaadan, ikka ba doonaa pogibeenna.

English Sentences: In his humiliation his judgment was taken away: and who shall declare his generation? for his life is taken from the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: I kauyyidoogan au xillo pirddi xayiis. A de7oi ha sa7aappe pude ekettiichchido gishshau, a zariyaabaa oonee yootanai?" yaagees.

English Sentences: And the eunuch answered Philip, and said, I pray thee, of whom speaketh the prophet this? of himself, or of some other man?
Wolaitta Sentences: Mureessai zaaridi Piliphphoosassi, "Hananabaa yootiyaagee hagaa obaa odii? Babaa odiiyye woi hara asabaa odii? Tau odarkkii" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Philip opened his mouth, and began at the same scripture, and preached unto him Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Piliphphoosi zaaridi, Xoossaa maxaafaa i nabbabiyoosaappe doommidi, Yesuusabaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaappe ayyo yootiis.

English Sentences: And as they went on their way, they came unto a certain water: and the eunuch said, See, here is water; what doth hinder me to be baptized?
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ogiyaa oiqqidi biiddi, haattai de7iyoosaa gakkidosona; mureessai, "Haattaa hagaa be7a; xammaqettiyoogaa tana diggiyai aibee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Philip said, If thou believest with all thine heart, thou mayest. And he answered and said, I believe that Jesus Christ is the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi a, "Neeni ne kumetta wozanaappe ammanikko, danddayaasa" yaagiis. Yaagin i zaaridi, "Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossaa Na7a gidiyoogaa taani ammanais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he commanded the chariot to stand still: and they went down both into the water, both Philip and the eunuch; and he baptized him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaaree eqqana mala mureessai azazin, inne Piliphphoosi naa77ai duge wodhdhidi, haattan gelidosona; gelin Piliphphoosi a xammaqiis.

English Sentences: And when they were come up out of the water, the Spirit of the Lord caught away Philip, that the eunuch saw him no more: and he went on his way rejoicing.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti haattaappe gaxaa kiyido wode, Godaa Ayyaanai Piliphphoosa liphphi oottidi, efi aggiis; naa77anttuwaa mureessai Piliphphoosa be7ibeenna; shin ba ogiyaa ufaittiiddi biis.

English Sentences: But Philip was found at Azotus: and passing through he preached in all the cities, till he came to Caesarea.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosi ba huuphiyau Azooxoosan de7iyoogaa eriis; qassi Qiisaariyaa yaana gakkanaassikka, katama ubban yuuyiiddi wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootees.

English Sentences: And Saul, yet breathing out threatenings and slaughter against the disciples of the Lord, went unto the high priest,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saa7ooli Godaa kaalliyaageeta woranau manddiiddi, qeese ubbatu halaqaakko biis.

English Sentences: And desired of him letters to Damascus to the synagogues, that if he found any of this way, whether they were men or women, he might bring them bound unto Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi Godaa ogiyaa kaalliya asata maccaageetanne attumaageeta demmikko, qachchidi Yerusalaame ehaanau, Damasqqon de7iya Aihuda woosa keettatussi dabddaabbiyaa xaafanau a woossiis.

English Sentences: And as he journeyed, he came near Damascus: and suddenly there shined round about him a light from heaven:
Wolaitta Sentences: I biiddi, Damasqqo katamaa gakkana matidaashin, qoppennan saluwaappe wolqqaama poo7oi a yuuyi aadhdhidi poo7iis.

English Sentences: And he fell to the earth, and heard a voice saying unto him, Saul, Saul, why persecutest thou me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Poo7in Saa7ooli sa7an kunddidaashin, "Saa7oolaa Saa7oolaa, aissi tana waissai?" giya qaalaa siyiis.

English Sentences: And he said, Who art thou, Lord? And the Lord said, I am Jesus whom thou persecutest: it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli, "Ta Godau, neeni oonee?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin, "Taani neeni waissiyo Yesuusa. Boorai bana caddiya xam77aa qakkiyoogaadan, neeni qakkikko, nena qohaasa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he trembling and astonished said, Lord, what wilt thou have me to do? And the Lord said unto him, Arise, and go into the city, and it shall be told thee what thou must do.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saa7ooli kokkoriiddinne garamettiiddi, "Ta Godau, taani ai oottanau koyai?" yaagiis. Yaagin Godai a, "Denddada katamaa gela; neeni oottanau bessiyaabai neeyyo yaani odettana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the men which journeyed with him stood speechless, hearing a voice, but seeing no man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7oolaara ogiyan biya asati ainne haasayennan eqqi bayidi, qaalaa siyoosona; shin oonanne be7ibookkona.

English Sentences: And Saul arose from the earth; and when his eyes were opened, he saw no man: but they led him by the hand, and brought him into Damascus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli sa7aappe denddin, a aifee dooyettido wode, ainne xeellanau danddayibeenna; hegaa gishshau, eti a kushiyaa oiqqidi goochchiiddi, Damasqqo gelissidosona.

English Sentences: And he was three days without sight, and neither did eat nor drink.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzu gallassa gakkanaassikka i xeellibeenna; ainne mibeenna; ainnekka uyibeenna.

English Sentences: And there was a certain disciple at Damascus, named Ananias; and to him said the Lord in a vision, Ananias. And he said, Behold, I am here, Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Damasqqon issi Hanaaniyaa giyo kaalliyaagee de7ees; Godai ajjuutan a, "Hanaaniyau" yaagiis. Yaagin Hanaanee, "Ta Godau, hagan de7ais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the Lord said unto him, Arise, and go into the street which is called Straight, and enquire in the house of Judas for one called Saul, of Tarsus: for, behold, he prayeth,
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai a, "Denddada Suure giyo ogiyaa baada, Yihudaa sooni issi Saa7oola giyo Xarsseeseppe yiida bitaniyaa koya; aissi giikko, i woossees.

English Sentences: And hath seen in a vision a man named Ananias coming in, and putting his hand on him, that he might receive his sight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Hanaaniyaa giyo bitanee gelidi, Saa7ooli naa77anttuwaa xeellanaadan, ba kushiyaa a bolli wottiyoogaa ajjuutan be7iis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Ananias answered, Lord, I have heard by many of this man, how much evil he hath done to thy saints at Jerusalem:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanaanee zaaridi, "Ta Godau, Yerusalaamen ne geeshsha asaa bolli he bitanee ai keena iitabaa oottidaakko, taani daro asaappe siyaas.

English Sentences: And here he hath authority from the chief priests to bind all that call on thy name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Damasqqon ne sunttaa xeesiyaageeta ubbaa qachchanau, qeese halaqati au maataa immidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But the Lord said unto him, Go thy way: for he is a chosen vessel unto me, to bear my name before the Gentiles, and kings, and the children of Israel:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Godai a, "Saa7ooli Aihuda gidenna asaa sinttan, kawotu sinttaaninne Israa7eela asaa sinttan, ta sunttaa erissanaunne taassi oottanau doorettida miishsha gidiyo gishshau, neeni ba.

English Sentences: For I will shew him how great things he must suffer for my name's sake.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, ta sunttaa gishshau, i woqqaa waayettanau bessiyaakko, taani a bessana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Ananias went his way, and entered into the house; and putting his hands on him said, Brother Saul, the Lord, even Jesus, that appeared unto thee in the way as thou camest, hath sent me, that thou mightest receive thy sight, and be filled with the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Hanaanee biidi, soo gelidi, ba kushiyaa Saa7oola bolli wottidi, "Ta ishau Saa7oolaa, neeni yiyo ogiyan neessi beettida Yesuusi, neeni xeellana malanne Geeshsha Ayyaanai nenan kumana mala, tana kiittiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And immediately there fell from his eyes as it had been scales: and he received sight forthwith, and arose, and was baptized.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara, aibakko poqo malai Saa7oola aifiyaappe wodhdhin, Saa7ooli naa77anttuwaa xeelliis; qassi denddidi xammaqettiis.

English Sentences: And when he had received meat, he was strengthened. Then was Saul certain days with the disciples which were at Damascus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qumaa miidi gasttidi, Damasqqon de7iya kaalliyaageetuura amarida gallassaa takkiis.

English Sentences: And straightway he preached Christ in the synagogues, that he is the Son of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sohuwaara, "Yesuus Kiristtoosi Xoossaa Na7a" yaagidi, Aihuda woosa keettatun qaalaa yootiis.

English Sentences: But all that heard him were amazed, and said; Is not this he that destroyed them which called on this name in Jerusalem, and came hither for that intent, that he might bring them bound unto the chief priests?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa siyida ubbai garamettidi, "Hagee Yerusalaamen Yesuusa sunttaa xeesiyaageeta xaissiyaagaa gidenneeyye? Qassi eta qachchidi, qeese halaqatu sintti efaanaassi yibeenneeyye?" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Saul increased the more in strength, and confounded the Jews which dwelt at Damascus, proving that this is very Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Saa7ooli qaalaa yootiyo yootoi minni minnidi biis; Yesuusi qassi Kiristtoosa gidiyoogaakka i akeekissidi odido gishshau, Damasqqon de7iya Aihudati ayyo zaariyoobaa xayidosona.

English Sentences: And after that many days were fulfilled, the Jews took counsel to kill him:
Wolaitta Sentences: Daro gallassaappe guyyiyan, Aihudati shiiqidi, Saa7oola woranau zorettidosona.

English Sentences: But their laying await was known of Saul. And they watched the gates day and night to kill him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aihudati bana woranau qoppidoogaa Saa7ooli siyiis; eti a woranau qamminne gallassi katamaa penggiyaa naagoosona.

English Sentences: Then the disciples took him by night, and let him down by the wall in a basket.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i erissiyo ashkkarati a qammi efiidi, dirssaa huuphiyaara keeshiyan duge wottidosona.

English Sentences: And when Saul was come to Jerusalem, he assayed to join himself to the disciples: but they were all afraid of him, and believed not that he was a disciple.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Yerusalaame gakkido wode, erissiyo ashkkaratuura issippe gaittanau shiiqi be7iis; shin kaalliyaagaa i gididoogaa ubbai ammanennan ixxidi, ayyo yayyidosona.

English Sentences: But Barnabas took him, and brought him to the apostles, and declared unto them how he had seen the Lord in the way, and that he had spoken to him, and how he had preached boldly at Damascus in the name of Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Barnnaabaasi Saa7oola Yesuusi kiittidoogeetukko efiis; efiidi ogiyan Godaa i waanidi be7idaakko, ayyo Godai waatidi haasayidaakkonne qassi Saa7ooli Damasqqon Yesuusa sunttan yayyennan waatidi qaalaa yootidaakko, etau geeshshidi odiis.

English Sentences: And he was with them coming in and going out at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Saa7ooli Yerusalaamen yuuyiiddinne Godaa Yesuusa sunttan yayyennan qaalaa yootiiddi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuura issippe de7iis.

English Sentences: And he spake boldly in the name of the Lord Jesus, and disputed against the Grecians: but they went about to slay him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Saa7ooli Giriike qaalaa haasayiya Aihudatuura haasayeesinne palamettees; shin eti a woranau koyidosona.

English Sentences: Which when the brethren knew, they brought him down to Caesarea, and sent him forth to Tarsus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ishantti hegaa siyidi, Saa7oola duge Qiisaariyaa efiidi, Xarsseese yeddidosona.

English Sentences: Then had the churches rest throughout all Judaea and Galilee and Samaria, and were edified; and walking in the fear of the Lord, and in the comfort of the Holy Ghost, were multiplied.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yihudan, Galiilaaninne Samaariyan ubban de7iya woosa keettati sarotettan de7idosona; qassi minnidosona; Godaassi yayyiyoogaaninne Geeshsha Ayyaanaa maaduwan heemettiiddi, qoodankka dari dari biidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as Peter passed throughout all quarters, he came down also to the saints which dwelt at Lydda.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi ubbasan yuuyiiddi, Lidan de7iya geeshsha asatukko qassi wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And there he found a certain man named Aeneas, which had kept his bed eight years, and was sick of the palsy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodhdhidi hegan hosppun laittaasappe silidi, arssan zin77idi de7iya issi Eeniyaa giyo bitaniyaa demmiis.

English Sentences: And Peter said unto him, Aeneas, Jesus Christ maketh thee whole: arise, and make thy bed. And he arose immediately.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Eeniyaa, "Eeniyau, Yesuus Kiristtoosi nena pattees; denddada ne hiixaa yegga" yaagiis. Yaagin sohuwaara denddi eqqiis.

English Sentences: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him, and turned to the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lidaaninne Saaroonan de7iya asai ubbai Eeniyaa be7idi, Godaakko simmiis.

English Sentences: Now there was at Joppa a certain disciple named Tabitha, which by interpretation is called Dorcas: this woman was full of good works and almsdeeds which she did.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yoophphe kataman issi Xaabito giyo ammaniyaara de7ausu; Xaabito giyoogee Giriike qaalan Dorqqo giyoogaa. A ba de7ido wode ubban lo77obaa oottaiddanne hiyyeesaa maaddaidda de7aasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in those days, that she was sick, and died: whom when they had washed, they laid her in an upper chamber.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode a harggada haiqqin, asai i ahaa meeccidi, pooqiyaa pude kessidi zin77issiis.

English Sentences: And forasmuch as Lydda was nigh to Joppa, and the disciples had heard that Peter was there, they sent unto him two men, desiring him that he would not delay to come to them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lidi Yoophphessi mata; kaalliyaageeti PHeexiroosi Lidan de7iyoogaa Yoophphen siyidi, "Hayyanaa nuukko eesuwan yarkkii" yaagiyo kiitaa naa77u asatu bolli akko kiittidosona.

English Sentences: Then Peter arose and went with them. When he was come, they brought him into the upper chamber: and all the widows stood by him weeping, and shewing the coats and garments which Dorcas made, while she was with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin PHeexiroosi denddidi, etaara biidi gakkin, pooqiyaa pude a kessidi, kifiliyaa gelissidosona. Am77e maccaasati ubbai yeekkiiddinne Dorqqa etaara de7iyo wode oottido qamisetanne afalata ubbaa PHeexiroosa bessiiddi, a yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter put them all forth, and kneeled down, and prayed; and turning him to the body said, Tabitha, arise. And she opened her eyes: and when she saw Peter, she sat up.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi eta ubbaa kare kessidi, gulbbatidi Xoossaa woossiis; qassi ahaakko simmidi, "Xaabitee, dendda" yaagiis; yaagin Xaabita ba aifiyaa dooyada PHeexiroosa be7ada, suura uttaasu.

English Sentences: And he gave her his hand, and lifted her up, and when he had called the saints and widows, presented her alive.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi o ba kushiyan maaddidi, dentti essiis; hegaappe guyyiyan, ammaniyaageetanne am77eta xeesidi, paxidaaro etassi immiis.

English Sentences: And it was known throughout all Joppa; and many believed in the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yohoi Yoophphe katama ubban laalettiis; laalettin daro asai Godaa ammaniis.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that he tarried many days in Joppa with one Simon a tanner.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Yoophphen issi Simoona giyo galbbaa qaaciyaagaara daro gallassaa gam77iis.

English Sentences: There was a certain man in Caesarea called Cornelius, a centurion of the band called the Italian band,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiisaariyan Xaaletu Olaasata geetettiya olanchchatuyyo issi mato halaqai Qornneliyoosa giyoogee de7ees.

English Sentences: A devout man, and one that feared God with all his house, which gave much alms to the people, and prayed to God alway.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qornneliyoosi Xoossaa daro ammaniya asanne ba so asa ubbaara issippe Xoossaassi goinniya asa; Aihuda hiyyeesaakka i daro maaddees; qassi Xoossaa ubba wode woossees.

English Sentences: He saw in a vision evidently about the ninth hour of the day an angel of God coming in to him, and saying unto him, Cornelius.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi gallassi uddufun saate heeran, "Qornneliyoosaa" giya Xoossaa kiitanchchai baakko gelishin, Qornneliyoosi ajjuutan geeshshidi be7iis.

English Sentences: And when he looked on him, he was afraid, and said, What is it, Lord? And he said unto him, Thy prayers and thine alms are come up for a memorial before God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qornneliyoosi yayyidi, kiitanchchaa tishshi ootti xeellidi, "Ta Godau, i aibee?" yaagiis. Yaagin kiitanchchai zaaridi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Ne woosainne neeni hiyyeesaa maaddiyoogee Xoossaa sinttan hassayettanau saluwaa biis.

English Sentences: And now send men to Joppa, and call for one Simon, whose surname is Peter:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha77i Yoophphe asaa kiittada, PHeexiroosa giyo Simoona ehiissa.

English Sentences: He lodgeth with one Simon a tanner, whose house is by the sea side: he shall tell thee what thou oughtest to do.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi abbaa doona keettaawaa galbbaa qaaciya Simoona sooni imattatettau uttiis; neeni oottanau bessiyaabaa i neeyyo odana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the angel which spake unto Cornelius was departed, he called two of his household servants, and a devout soldier of them that waited on him continually;
Wolaitta Sentences: Qornneliyoosi baassi yootida kiitanchchai bin, ba ashkkaratuppe naa77atanne Xoossaassi goinniya baappe shaahettenna wotaaddaratuppe issuwaa xeesidi,

English Sentences: And when he had declared all these things unto them, he sent them to Joppa.
Wolaitta Sentences: etau ubbabaa odidi, eta Yoophphe kiittiis.

English Sentences: On the morrow, as they went on their journey, and drew nigh unto the city, Peter went up upon the housetop to pray about the sixth hour:
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi eti biidi, Yoophphe katamaakko matishin, PHeexiroosi usuppun saate heeran keettaa bollan dembbayidi oottidosaa Xoossaa woossanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And he became very hungry, and would have eaten: but while they made ready, he fell into a trance,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi namisettidi, qumaa maanau koyiis; shin qumai ka77ishin, ajjuutaa be7iis.

English Sentences: And saw heaven opened, and a certain vessel descending unto him, as it had been a great sheet knit at the four corners, and let down to the earth:
Wolaitta Sentences: Saloi dooyettin, gita afala milatiyaabai oiddu baggaara ohettidi, sa7an wodhdhishin, PHeexiroosi be7iis.

English Sentences: Wherein were all manner of fourfooted beasts of the earth, and wild beasts, and creeping things, and fowls of the air.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan oiddu tohuwaara de7iya mehee, do7i, shooshshi, zareenne kafoi ubbi de7ees.

English Sentences: And there came a voice to him, Rise, Peter; kill, and eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: "PHeexiroosaa, dendda eqqada shukkada ma" giya qaalai akko yiis.

English Sentences: But Peter said, Not so, Lord; for I have never eaten any thing that is common or unclean.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, "Ta Godau, chii! Taani aibakko tunabaanne sheneyiyaabaa mulekka ma erikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the voice spake unto him again the second time, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi naa77anttuwaa, "Xoossai geeshshidoogaa neeni tuna gooppa" giya qaalai akko yiis.

English Sentences: This was done thrice: and the vessel was received up again into heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heezzutoo hegaadan giis; hegaappe guyyiyan, sohuwaara he gita afala milatiyaagee pude saluwaa eketti aggiis.

English Sentences: Now while Peter doubted in himself what this vision which he had seen should mean, behold, the men which were sent from Cornelius had made enquiry for Simon's house, and stood before the gate,
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi ba be7ido ajjuutaa birshshettai ai gidanddeeshsha? yaagidi, ba wozana giddon, "Laa hagee aibee?" giishin, Qornneliyoosi kiittido asati Simoona keettai de7iyoosaa lal77iiddi, a penggen eqqidosona.

English Sentences: And called, and asked whether Simon, which was surnamed Peter, were lodged there.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "PHeexiroosa geetettiya Simoona giyo imattai hegan de7ii?" yaagidi oichchidosona.

English Sentences: While Peter thought on the vision, the Spirit said unto him, Behold, three men seek thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi ajjuutan be7idobaa akeekanau qofan sheekkidaashin, Geeshsha Ayyaanai a, "Be7a, heezzu asati nena koyoosona;

English Sentences: Arise therefore, and get thee down, and go with them, doubting nothing: for I have sent them.
Wolaitta Sentences: denddada wodhdha; taani eta kiittido gishshau, sirennan etaara ba" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Peter went down to the men which were sent unto him from Cornelius; and said, Behold, I am he whom ye seek: what is the cause wherefore ye are come?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi asatukko wodhdhidi, "Intte koyiyoogee tana. Ai ekkana yiidetii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Cornelius the centurion, a just man, and one that feareth God, and of good report among all the nation of the Jews, was warned from God by an holy angel to send for thee into his house, and to hear words of thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti, "Xoossaassi yayyiya xilloi Aihuda asa ubban daro bonchchettida mato halaqaa Qornneliyoosi, nena ba soo efiissidi, qaalaa neeppe siyana mala, Xoossaa geeshsha kiitanchchai ayyo yootiis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then called he them in, and lodged them. And on the morrow Peter went away with them, and certain brethren from Joppa accompanied him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHeexiroosi asata imattanau soo xeesiis. Wonttetta gallassi, denddidi etaara biis; Yoophphe kataman de7iya ishanttuppe issooti issooti aara issippe biidosona.

English Sentences: And the morrow after they entered into Caesarea. And Cornelius waited for them, and had called together his kinsmen and near friends.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi, qiisaariyaa gakkidosona; Qornneliyoosi ba dabbotanne ba laggeta issippe xeesi shiishshidi, PHeexiroosa naagees.

English Sentences: And as Peter was coming in, Cornelius met him, and fell down at his feet, and worshipped him.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi gelana hanishin, Qornneliyoosi aara gaittidi, a sinttan kunddidi, assi goinniis.

English Sentences: But Peter took him up, saying, Stand up; I myself also am a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi, "Dendda! Taanikka ta huuphen asa" yaagidi a denttiis.

English Sentences: And as he talked with him, he went in, and found many that were come together.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Qornneliyoosaara haasayiiddi, soo geliis; i geliyo wode daro asai shiiqidaagaa demmidi,

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Ye know how that it is an unlawful thing for a man that is a Jew to keep company, or come unto one of another nation; but God hath shewed me that I should not call any man common or unclean.
Wolaitta Sentences: asaa, "Aihuda asi hara zariyaara issippetettan de7anau, woi gaittanau woga gidennaagaa intte huuphen ereeta; shin taani oonanne tuna woi sheneyiyaabaa geenna mala, Xoossai tana bessiis.

English Sentences: Therefore came I unto you without gainsaying, as soon as I was sent for: I ask therefore for what intent ye have sent for me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intte taassi kiittin, palami bainnan yaas. Ha77i, Tana aissi ehiissidetii? yaagada inttena oichchais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Cornelius said, Four days ago I was fasting until this hour; and at the ninth hour I prayed in my house, and, behold, a man stood before me in bright clothing,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qornneliyoosi hagaadan yaagiis; "Taani hachchi oiddu gallassaappe kase ha saaten uddufun saate woosaa ta sooni Xoossaa woossishin, PHooliya maayuwaa maayida asi ta sinttan eqqidi,

English Sentences: And said, Cornelius, thy prayer is heard, and thine alms are had in remembrance in the sight of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: tana, Qornneliyoosaa, Xoossai ne woosaa siyiis; neeni hiyyeesaa maaddiyoogaakka hassayiis.

English Sentences: Send therefore to Joppa, and call hither Simon, whose surname is Peter; he is lodged in the house of one Simon a tanner by the sea side: who, when he cometh, shall speak unto thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi asa Yoophphe kiittada, Simoon PHeexiroosa giyoogaa xeesissa; Simoon PHeexiroosi Simoona giyo galbbaa qaaciya bitaniyaa sooni abbaa doonan imattatettaa uttiis yaagiis.

English Sentences: Immediately therefore I sent to thee; and thou hast well done that thou art come. Now therefore are we all here present before God, to hear all things that are commanded thee of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani neekko sohuwaara kiittaas; neeninne yaada loittadasa; simmi neeni nuuyyo yootanau Xoossai nena azazidobaa ubbaa siyanau ha77i nuuni ubbaikka hagan Xoossaa sinttan de7oos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then Peter opened his mouth, and said, Of a truth I perceive that God is no respecter of persons:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi haasayaa hagaadan yaagidi doommiis; "Xoossai asa som77o xeellenna;

English Sentences: But in every nation he that feareth him, and worketh righteousness, is accepted with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: shin dere ubban baassi yayyiyaagaanne xillo ooso oottiyaagaa galatiyoogaa taani tumu akeekaas.

English Sentences: The word which God sent unto the children of Israel, preaching peace by Jesus Christ: (he is Lord of all:)
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai asa ubbaa Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa baggaara, sarotettaa yootiiddi, ha wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa Israa7eela asaassi kiittidoogaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: That word, I say, ye know, which was published throughout all Judaea, and began from Galilee, after the baptism which John preached;
Wolaitta Sentences: Yohaannisi qaalaa yootido xinqqatiyaappe guyyiyan, Galiilappe doommidi, Yihudaa biitta ubban hanidabaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: How God anointed Jesus of Nazareth with the Holy Ghost and with power: who went about doing good, and healing all that were oppressed of the devil; for God was with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Naazireeta Yesuusa Geeshsha Ayyaanaaninne wolqqan tiyiis; Xoossai aara de7iyo gishshau, lo77obaa i oottiiddinne xalahe halaqaassi haarettida ubbaa pattiiddi yuuyiis.

English Sentences: And we are witnesses of all things which he did both in the land of the Jews, and in Jerusalem; whom they slew and hanged on a tree:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aihuda biittaaninne Yerusalaamen i oottido ubbabaassi nuuni markka. Eti masqqaliyaa bolli misimaariyan xishi kaqqidi, a woridosona.

English Sentences: Him God raised up the third day, and shewed him openly;
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai heezzantto gallassan haiquwaappe a denttidi bessiis.

English Sentences: Not to all the people, but unto witnesses chosen before of God, even to us, who did eat and drink with him after he rose from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai koiro doorido markkata nuna, a bessiisippe attin, asa ubbaa gidenna; haiquwaappe i denddidoogaappe guyyiyan, nuuni aara miidanne uyida.

English Sentences: And he commanded us to preach unto the people, and to testify that it is he which was ordained of God to be the Judge of quick and dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa asaassi nuuni yootanaunne, paxa de7iyaageetu bollaaninne haiqqidaageetu bollan pirddanau i sunttidoogee Yesuusa gididoogaa nuuni markkattanau nuna azaziis.

English Sentences: To him give all the prophets witness, that through his name whosoever believeth in him shall receive remission of sins.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai aani ammaniya ubbaa nagaraa a sunttan atto gaanaagaa hananabaa yootiya ubbati markkattoosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: While Peter yet spake these words, the Holy Ghost fell on all them which heard the word.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi biron he yohuwaa yootishin, qaalaa siyiya ubbaa bolli Geeshsha Ayyaanai wodhdhi aggiis.

English Sentences: And they of the circumcision which believed were astonished, as many as came with Peter, because that on the Gentiles also was poured out the gift of the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosaara Yoophpheppe yiida, ammaniya qaxxarettida Aihuda ubbati Aihuda gidennaageetu bollankka Geeshsha Ayyaanaa imoi gukkido gishshau garamettidosona.

English Sentences: For they heard them speak with tongues, and magnify God. Then answered Peter,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, eti dumma dumma qaalan haasayishiininne Xoossaa gitatettaa sabbishin siyidosona. He wode PHeexiroosi zaaridi,

English Sentences: Can any man forbid water, that these should not be baptized, which have received the Holy Ghost as well as we?
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hageeti qassi nunadan Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidaageeti xammaqettennaadan, haatta eta digganau danddayiyai oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he commanded them to be baptized in the name of the Lord. Then prayed they him to tarry certain days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan xammaqettana mala, eta azaziis; hegaappe guyyiyan, eti banttanaara amarida gallassaa uttana mala, a woossidosona.

English Sentences: And the apostles and brethren that were in Judaea heard that the Gentiles had also received the word of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne Yihudaa ubban de7iya ishantti, Aihuda gidennaageetikka Xoossaa qaalaa ekkidoogaa siyidosona.

English Sentences: And when Peter was come up to Jerusalem, they that were of the circumcision contended with him,
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi Yerusalaame biido wode, qaxxarettida asati aara palamettidi,

English Sentences: Saying, Thou wentest in to men uncircumcised, and didst eat with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: a, "Neeni qaxxarettibeennaageetukko gelada, etaara qumaa maadasa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter rehearsed the matter from the beginning, and expounded it by order unto them, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi hanidabaa koiruwaappe doommidi, maaran maaran hagaadan yaagidi yootiis;

English Sentences: I was in the city of Joppa praying: and in a trance I saw a vision, A certain vessel descend, as it had been a great sheet, let down from heaven by four corners; and it came even to me:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Yoophphe kataman Xoossaa woossishin, tau wozanai dammin, ajjuutaa be7aas; gita afala milatiyaabai oiddu baggaara ohettidi, saluwaappe wodhdhidi, taakko yiis.

English Sentences: Upon the which when I had fastened mine eyes, I considered, and saw fourfooted beasts of the earth, and wild beasts, and creeping things, and fowls of the air.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa giddo taani tishshi oottada xeelliyo wode, oiddu tohoi de7iyo mehiyaa, do7aa, shooshshaa, zariyaanne kafuwaa be7aas.

English Sentences: And I heard a voice saying unto me, Arise, Peter; slay and eat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi, PHeexiroosaa, dendda; shukkada ma giya qaalaa taani siyaas.

English Sentences: But I said, Not so, Lord: for nothing common or unclean hath at any time entered into my mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin taani, Ta Godau, chii! Tunabai woi sheneyiyaabai mulekka ta doonaakko shiiqi erenna gaas.

English Sentences: But the voice answered me again from heaven, What God hath cleansed, that call not thou common.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Qaalai saluwaappe naa77anttuwaakka, Xoossai geeshshidoogaa neeni tuna gooppa yaagidi taassi zaariis.

English Sentences: And this was done three times: and all were drawn up again into heaven.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegee heezzutoo hanin, wurssettan ubbabai saluwaa pude gooshettiis.

English Sentences: And, behold, immediately there were three men already come unto the house where I was, sent from Caesarea unto me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa peeshshankka heezzu asati Qiisaariyaappe taakko kiitettidi, taani de7iyo keettaa gakki aggidosona.

English Sentences: And the Spirit bade me go with them, nothing doubting. Moreover these six brethren accompanied me, and we entered into the man's house:
Wolaitta Sentences: Gakkin taani sirennan etaara baana mala, Ayyaanai taassi yootiis. Qassi ha usuppun ishantti Yoophpheppe tanaara Qiisaariyaa bin, nuuni Qornneliyoosa soo gelida.

English Sentences: And he shewed us how he had seen an angel in his house, which stood and said unto him, Send men to Joppa, and call for Simon, whose surname is Peter;
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai ba sooni eqqidi bana, PHeexiroosa geetettiya Simoona xeesanau asa Yoophphe kiitta;

English Sentences: Who shall tell thee words, whereby thou and all thy house shall be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: neeninne ne keettaa asai ubbai attiyo qaalaa i neeyyo yootana giidoogaa Qornneliyoosi waatidi siyidaakko, nuussi odiis.

English Sentences: And as I began to speak, the Holy Ghost fell on them, as on us at the beginning.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Odin taani haasayanau doommiyoogan Geeshsha Ayyaanai koiro nu bolli wodhdhidoogaadan, eta bollikka wodhdhi aggiis.

English Sentences: Then remembered I the word of the Lord, how that he said, John indeed baptized with water; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai, Yohaannisi haattan xammaqiis; shin intte Geeshsha Ayyaanan xammaqettana yaagido qaalai taassi hassayettiis.

English Sentences: Forasmuch then as God gave them the like gift as he did unto us, who believed on the Lord Jesus Christ; what was I, that I could withstand God?
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai nuussi Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammanidaageetussi immido imuwaa malaa Aihuda gidennaageetussikka qassi immikko, simmi Xoossaa digganau taani oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they heard these things, they held their peace, and glorified God, saying, Then hath God also to the Gentiles granted repentance unto life.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hagaa siyido wode bantta palamaa aggidi, "Yaatin, Xoossai Aihuda gidennaageetikka qassi nagaraappe simmidi de7anaadan, eta qaadiis" yaagidi Xoossaa galatidosona.

English Sentences: Now they which were scattered abroad upon the persecution that arose about Stephen travelled as far as Phenice, and Cyprus, and Antioch, preaching the word to none but unto the Jews only.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isxxifaanoosa bolli gakkida waayiyaa geedon laalettida ammaniyaageeti qaalaa Aihudatu xalaalaappe attin, haraassi issuwaassinne odennan, Pinqqe, Qophphiroosanne Anxxookiyaa gakkanaashin yuuyidosona.

English Sentences: And some of them were men of Cyprus and Cyrene, which, when they were come to Antioch, spake unto the Grecians, preaching the LORD Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Qophphiroosappenne Qareenappe yiida issi issi ammaniya asati Anxxookiyaa biidi, Godaa Yesuusa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi, Giriike asaassikka yootidosona.

English Sentences: And the hand of the Lord was with them: and a great number believed, and turned unto the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa wolqqai etaara de7ees; qassi daro asai ammanidi, Godaakko simmiis.

English Sentences: Then tidings of these things came unto the ears of the church which was in Jerusalem: and they sent forth Barnabas, that he should go as far as Antioch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha yohoi Yerusalaamen de7iya woosa keettaa asaassi siyettin, woosa keettaa asai Barnnaabaasa Anxxookiyaa kiittiis.

English Sentences: Who, when he came, and had seen the grace of God, was glad, and exhorted them all, that with purpose of heart they would cleave unto the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Barnnaabaasi Anxxookiyaa biido wode, Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa oosuwaa be7idi ufaittiis; eti ubbaikka Godan bantta kumetta wozanaappe minnidi de7anaadan, eta zoriis.

English Sentences: or he was a good man, and full of the Holy Ghost and of faith: and much people was added unto the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Barnnaabaasi Geeshsha Ayyaanainne ammanoi kumido lo77o asa; yaanin daro asai Godaa ammaniis.

English Sentences: Then departed Barnabas to Tarsus, for to seek Saul:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Barnnaabaasi Saa7oola koyanau Xarsseese biis.

English Sentences: And when he had found him, he brought him unto Antioch. And it came to pass, that a whole year they assembled themselves with the church, and taught much people. And the disciples were called Christians first in Antioch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi Saa7oola demmido wode, Anxxookiyaa ehiis. Barnnaabaasinne Saa7ooli woosa keettaa asaara issi laitta kumettaa uttidi, daro asaa tamaarissidosona; kaalliyaageeti Anxxookiyan Kiristtaane geetettidi, koiro xeesettidosona.

English Sentences: And in these days came prophets from Jerusalem unto Antioch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaageeti Yerusalaameppe Anxxookiyaa he wode wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And there stood up one of them named Agabus, and signified by the Spirit that there should be great dearth throughout all the world: which came to pass in the days of Claudius Caesar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta giddoppe Agaaboosa giyoogee denddidi, sa7a ubban gita namisai denddanaagaa Ayyaanaa wolqqan hananabaa yootiis; hegee hanidoogee Qalaudeyoosa kawotettaa wodiyaana.

English Sentences: Then the disciples, every man according to his ability, determined to send relief unto the brethren which dwelt in Judaea:
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaalliyaageeti huuphiyan huuphiyan bantta wolqqaa keenaa miishshaa peeridi, Yihudan de7iya bantta ishanttussi maaduwaa yeddanau qofaa qachchidosona.

English Sentences: Which also they did, and sent it to the elders by the hands of Barnabas and Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaadan oottidi, miishshaa Barnnaabaasa bollinne Saa7oola bolli woosa keettaa cimatussi yeddidosona.

English Sentences: Now about that time Herod the king stretched forth his hands to vex certain of the church.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kawoi Heeroodisi he wode woosa keettaa asaappe amaridaageeta waisuwaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And he killed James the brother of John with the sword.
Wolaitta Sentences: Doommidi Yohaannisa ishaa Yaaqooba bisuwan worissiis.

English Sentences: And because he saw it pleased the Jews, he proceeded further to take Peter also. (Then were the days of unleavened bread.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee Aihudata ufaissidoogaa be7idi, gujjidi PHeexiroosakka oiqqiis; hegee Paasikaa Baalaa bonchchiyo gallassatuuna.

English Sentences: And when he had apprehended him, he put him in prison, and delivered him to four quaternions of soldiers to keep him; intending after Easter to bring him forth to the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosa oiqqidi qachchiis. Paasikaa bonchchiyo gallassatuppe guyyiyan, dere asaa sintti aattanau qoppidi, oiddu oiddu wotaaddarati a naaganaadan, tammanne usuppun wotaaddaratussi aattidi immiis.

English Sentences: Peter therefore was kept in prison: but prayer was made without ceasing of the church unto God for him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, PHeexiroosi qasho keettan naagettees; shin woosa keettaa asai ayyo minttidi Xoossaa woossees.

English Sentences: And when Herod would have brought him forth, the same night Peter was sleeping between two soldiers, bound with two chains: and the keepers before the door kept the prison.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi PHeexiroosa asaa sintti aattanau qoppanaappe kase qammi, PHeexiroosi naa77u sanssalatan qashettidi, naa77u wotaaddaratuppe gidduwan xiskkees; naagiyaageetikka qasho keettaa penggen eqqidi naagoosona.

English Sentences: And, behold, the angel of the Lord came upon him, and a light shined in the prison: and he smote Peter on the side, and raised him up, saying, Arise up quickly. And his chains fell off from his hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Akeekennan de7ishin, Godaa kiitanchchai hegan eqqi aggiis; qasho keettankka poo7oi poo7i bayiis. Kiitanchchai PHeexiroosa miyyiyaa dechchi beegotissidi a, "Elle dendda" yaagiis; sohuwaarakka sanssalatai a kushiyaappe wodhdhi aggiis.

English Sentences: And the angel said unto him, Gird thyself, and bind on thy sandals. And so he did. And he saith unto him, Cast thy garment about thee, and follow me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchai a, "Ne suriyaa gixxa; ne caammaakka wotta" yaagin, PHeexiroosi hegaadan oottiis; oottin kiitanchchai, "Ne afalaa maayada tana kaalla" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he went out, and followed him; and wist not that it was true which was done by the angel; but thought he saw a vision.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi qasho keettaappe kiyidi, kiitanchchaa kaalliis; ayyo ajjuutaa be7iyoobaa misatiisippe attin, kiitanchchai oottiyoobai tuma gididoogaa eribeenna.

English Sentences: When they were past the first and the second ward, they came unto the iron gate that leadeth unto the city; which opened to them of his own accord: and they went out, and passed on through one street; and forthwith the angel departed from him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiitanchchainne PHeexiroosi koiro wotaaddaraappenne naa77antto wotaaddaraappe aadhdhidi, katamaa efiya birata penggiyaakko gakkidosona; gakkin penggee etassi barkka dooyetti aggiis; eti kiyidi issi ogiyaara biishin, kiitanchchai sohuwaara PHeexiroosappe shaahetti bayiis.

English Sentences: And when Peter was come to himself, he said, Now I know of a surety, that the LORD hath sent his angel, and hath delivered me out of the hand of Herod, and from all the expectation of the people of the Jews.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHeexiroosi bana gakkidabaa akeekidi, "Tana Godai ba kiitanchchaa kiittidi, Heeroodisa kushiyaappenne Aihuda asai naagi uttido ubbabaappe ashshidoogaa ha77i tumu eraas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had considered the thing, he came to the house of Mary the mother of John, whose surname was Mark; where many were gathered together praying.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegaa akeekido wode, daro asai issippe shiiqidi Xoossaa woossiyoosaa, Marqqoosa giyo Yohaannisa aayee Mairaami soo biis.

English Sentences: And as Peter knocked at the door of the gate, a damsel came to hearken, named Rhoda.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi penggen xeesin, issi Roodo giyo ashkkariyaa dooyanau yaasu.

English Sentences: And when she knew Peter's voice, she opened not the gate for gladness, but ran in, and told how Peter stood before the gate.
Wolaitta Sentences: Rooda PHeexiroosa qaalaa gididoogaa erido wode, bana ufaissin, kariyaa dooyennan guyye woxxada, PHeexiroosi karen eqqidoogaa asaassi odaasu.

English Sentences: And they said unto her, Thou art mad. But she constantly affirmed that it was even so. Then said they, It is his angel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Odin asai o, "Hannee neeni gooyaasa" yaagiis. Rooda PHeexiroosa gididoogaa geeshshada odaasu. Eti, "Hegee a kiitanchchaa" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: But Peter continued knocking: and when they had opened the door, and saw him, they were astonished.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHeexiroosi karen xeegidi aggennan ixxin, asai kariyaa dooyidi, a be7idi garamettiis.

English Sentences: But he, beckoning unto them with the hand to hold their peace, declared unto them how the Lord had brought him out of the prison. And he said, Go shew these things unto James, and to the brethren. And he departed, and went into another place.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti co77u gaana mala, PHeexiroosi ba kushiyan malaatidi, Godai qasho keettaappe a waati kessidaakko, etassi qonccissi yootidi, "Hagaa Yaaqoobassinne ishanttussi yootite" giidi, kiyidi harasaa biis.

English Sentences: Now as soon as it was day, there was no small stir among the soldiers, what was become of Peter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sa7ai wonttido wode, PHeexiroosi au biichchidaakko gin wotaaddaratu giddon daro wocamai kiyiis.

English Sentences: And when Herod had sought for him, and found him not, he examined the keepers, and commanded that they should be put to death. And he went down from Judaea to Caesarea, and there abode.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi PHeexiroosa Lal77issin, i xayido wode, naagiyaageeta qoridi, eta worana mala azaziis; hegaappe guyyiyan, Yihudaappe Qiisaariyaa wodhdhidi, hegan amarida wodiyaa uttiis.

English Sentences: And Herod was highly displeased with them of Tyre and Sidon: but they came with one accord to him, and, having made Blastus the king's chamberlain their friend, desired peace; because their country was nourished by the king's country.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi Xiiroosa asaassinne Sidoona asaassi daro hanqqettiis; hanqqettin eta biittai kattaa Heeroodisa biittaappe demmiyo gishshau, eti issippe gididi, a keettaa halaqaa Bilasxxoosa bantta exa oottidi, sigaa woossanau Heeroodisakko biidosona.

English Sentences: And upon a set day Herod, arrayed in royal apparel, sat upon his throne, and made an oration unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi sunttettido gallassi, ba kawotettaa afalaa maayidi, kawotaa araatan uttidi, asaassi haasayiis.

English Sentences: And the people gave a shout, saying, It is the voice of a god, and not of a man.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai, "Hagee Xoossaa qaala; asa qaala gidenna" yaagidi qaalaa xoqqissidi haasayiis.

English Sentences: And immediately the angel of the Lord smote him, because he gave not God the glory: and he was eaten of worms, and gave up the ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Heeroodisi Xoossaa bonchchibeenna gishshau, sohuwaarakka Godaa kiitanchchai a dechchin, guxuniyan meetettidi, haiqqi bayiis.

English Sentences: But the word of God grew and multiplied.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossaa qaalai dicceesinne dari dari bees.

English Sentences: And Barnabas and Saul returned from Jerusalem, when they had fulfilled their ministry, and took with them John, whose surname was Mark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Barnnaabaasinne Saa7ooli bantta oosuwaa polidi, Marqqoosa giyo Yohaannisa banttanaara ekkidi, Yerusalaameppe simmidosona.

English Sentences: Now there were in the church that was at Antioch certain prophets and teachers; as Barnabas, and Simeon that was called Niger, and Lucius of Cyrene, and Manaen, which had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch, and Saul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Anxxookiyan de7iya woosa keettan hananabaa yootiyaageetinne tamaarissiyaageeti de7oosona; eti Barnnaabaasa, Karetta giyo Simoona, Qareenappe yiida Luqiyoosa, biittaa haariya Heeroodisaara diccida Minaahanne Saa7oola.

English Sentences: As they ministered to the Lord, and fasted, the Holy Ghost said, Separate me Barnabas and Saul for the work whereunto I have called them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Godaassi goinnishiininne xoomishin, Geeshsha Ayyaanai, "Taani xeesido oosuwaassi Barnnaabaasanne Saa7oola tau kessite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they had fasted and prayed, and laid their hands on them, they sent them away.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin eti xoomidoogaappenne woossidoogaappe guyyiyan, bantta kushiyaa Barnnaabaasa bollinne Saa7oola bolli wottidi, eta yeddidosona.

English Sentences: So they, being sent forth by the Holy Ghost, departed unto Seleucia; and from thence they sailed to Cyprus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Geeshsha Ayyaanai eta kiittin, Selewuqiyaa wodhdhidosona; hegaappe markkabiyan gelidi, Qophphiroosa haruuruwaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were at Salamis, they preached the word of God in the synagogues of the Jews: and they had also John to their minister.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Silmmaana gakkidi, Aihuda woosa keettatun Xoossaa qaalaa yootidosona; eta maaddanau Yohaannisi etaara de7ees.

English Sentences: And when they had gone through the isle unto Paphos, they found a certain sorcerer, a false prophet, a Jew, whose name was Barjesus:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Qophphiroosa haruuruwaa muleera PHaafu gakkanaassi yuuyidi, hananabaa yootiya issi worddanchchaa, Aihuda asa Bar-Yesuusa giyo shareechchuwaa demmidosona.

English Sentences: Which was with the deputy of the country, Sergius Paulus, a prudent man; who called for Barnabas and Saul, and desired to hear the word of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: He shareechchoi deriyaa haariya Sarggiyoosa PHauloosa giyo akeekanchcha bitaniyaara de7ees. Sarggiyoosa PHauloosi Barnnaabaasanne Saa7oola baakko xeegidi, Xoossaa qaalaa siyanau koyiis.

English Sentences: But Elymas the sorcerer (for so is his name by interpretation) withstood them, seeking to turn away the deputy from the faith.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin shareechchuwaa Eliimaasi Giriike qaalan hegee a sunttaa deriyaa haariyaagaa ammanuwaa digganau koyidi, eta haasayaa phalqqiis.

English Sentences: Then Saul, (who also is called Paul,) filled with the Holy Ghost, set his eyes on him,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosa giyo Saa7ooli banan Geeshsha Ayyaanai kumin, shareechchuwaa tishshi ootti xeellidi,

English Sentences: And said, O full of all subtilty and all mischief, thou child of the devil, thou enemy of all righteousness, wilt thou not cease to pervert the right ways of the Lord?
Wolaitta Sentences: a, "Laa ha xalahe halaqaa na7au, gene ubbainne iitatetta ubbai kumidoogoo, xillotetta ubbau morkkiyau, Godaa ogiyaa suuriyaa geellayiyoogaa aggikkii?

English Sentences: And now, behold, the hand of the Lord is upon thee, and thou shalt be blind, not seeing the sun for a season. And immediately there fell on him a mist and a darkness; and he went about seeking some to lead him by the hand.
Wolaitta Sentences: Be7a; ha77i Godaa kushee ne bolli de7ees; neeni qooqe gidana; amarida wodee gakkanaashin, awaa poo7uwaa be7akka" yaagiis. Yaagin sohuwaara ciggaarainne xumai a aifiyaa goozin, ba kushiyaa oiqqidi, kaalettiya uraa koyiiddi yuuyiis.

English Sentences: Then the deputy, when he saw what was done, believed, being astonished at the doctrine of the Lord.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode deriyaa haariyaagee hegaa be7ido wode, Godai tamaarissiyoogan garamettidi ammaniis.

English Sentences: Now when Paul and his company loosed from Paphos, they came to Perga in Pamphylia: and John departing from them returned to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne aara de7iyaageeti PHaafuppe denddidi, PHinifiliyan de7iya PHergge markkabiyan biidosona; Yohaannisi etappe shaahettidi, Yerusalaame simmiis.

English Sentences: But when they departed from Perga, they came to Antioch in Pisidia, and went into the synagogue on the sabbath day, and sat down.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti PHerggeppe aadhdhidi, PHisddiyan de7iya Anxxookiyaa gakkidosona; Sambbata gallassan Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi uttidosona.

English Sentences: And after the reading of the law and the prophets the rulers of the synagogue sent unto them, saying, Ye men and brethren, if ye have any word of exhortation for the people, say on.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuse higgeenne hananabaa yootiyaageetu maxaafai nabbabettidoogaappe guyyiyan, Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqati, "Nu ishanttoo asaa minttettiya qaalai inttessi de7ikko, asau haasayerkketii" yaagidi etassi kiittidosona.

English Sentences: Then Paul stood up, and beckoning with his hand said, Men of Israel, and ye that fear God, give audience.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi denddi eqqidi, ba kushiyan malaatidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Israa7eela asatoo, Xoossaassi yayyiyaageetoo siyite.

English Sentences: The God of this people of Israel chose our fathers, and exalted the people when they dwelt as strangers in the land of Egypt, and with an high arm brought he them out of it.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha Israa7eela asaa Xoossai nu aawata dooridi, Gibxxe biittan imattatettan eti de7ishin, eta darissiis; ba gita wolqqankka Gibxxe biittaappe eta kessiis.

English Sentences: And about the time of forty years suffered he their manners in the wilderness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bazzuwan oitamu laitta keenaa nu aawata i danddayiis.

English Sentences: And when he had destroyed seven nations in the land of Chanaan, he divided their land to them by lot.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kanaane giyo biittan Aihuda gidenna laappun zareta xaissidi, eta biittaa ba asaa laatissiis.

English Sentences: And after that he gave unto them judges about the space of four hundred and fifty years, until Samuel the prophet.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, hananabaa yootiya Sameela wodiyaa gakkanaas, oiddu xeetanne ishatamu laitta keenaa daannata etassi immiis.

English Sentences: And afterward they desired a king: and God gave unto them Saul the son of Cis, a man of the tribe of Benjamin, by the space of forty years.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, eti banttassi kawo immana mala woossin, Xoossai Biniyaama zariyaappe Qiisa na7aa Saa7oola oitamu laittau kawotana mala, etassi immiis.

English Sentences: And when he had removed him, he raised up unto them David to be their king; to whom also he gave testimony, and said, I have found David the son of Jesse, a man after mine own heart, which shall fulfil all my will.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Saa7oola shaaridoogaappe guyyiyan, eta bolli Daawiti kawotana mala, a denttiis; Daawitabaa markkattiiddi, Taani koyiyo ubbabaa ta wozanadan oottiya Isseyi na7aa Daawita demmaas yaagiis.

English Sentences: Of this man's seed hath God according to his promise raised unto Israel a Saviour, Jesus:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossai, Taani Daawita zariyaappe Israa7eela asaa ashshiyaagaa ehaana giidoogaadankka, Yesuusa ehiis.

English Sentences: When John had first preached before his coming the baptism of repentance to all the people of Israel.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi yaanaappe kase Israa7eela asai ubbai bantta nagaraappe simmidi xammaqettana mala, Yohaannisi qaalaa yootiis.

English Sentences: And as John fulfilled his course, he said, Whom think ye that I am? I am not he. But, behold, there cometh one after me, whose shoes of his feet I am not worthy to loose.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yohaannisi ba oosuwaa wurssana haniiddi asaa, Tana oona giidi qoppeetii? Taani intte naagiyoogaa gidikke; shin be7ite, a tohuwaa caammaa birshshanaukka taassi bessennaagee taappe guyyeera yees yaagiis.

English Sentences: Men and brethren, children of the stock of Abraham, and whosoever among you feareth God, to you is the word of this salvation sent.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta ishatoo, Abrahaama zaretoo, qassi hagan Aihuda gidennaageetoo Xoossaassi yayyiyaageetoo, ha atotettaa qaalai nuussi kiitettiis.

English Sentences: For they that dwell at Jerusalem, and their rulers, because they knew him not, nor yet the voices of the prophets which are read every sabbath day, they have fulfilled them in condemning him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yerusalaamen de7iya asainne eta halaqati Yesuusanne Sambbata gallassa ubban nabbabettiya hananabaa yootiyaageetu qaalaa akeekibeenna gishshau, a bolli pirddidi, hananabaa yootiyaageetu qaalaa polidosona.

English Sentences: And though they found no cause of death in him, yet desired they Pilate that he should be slain.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusa worissanau issi gaasoikka etau beettennan ixxin, PHilaaxoosi a worana mala woossidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had fulfilled all that was written of him, they took him down from the tree, and laid him in a sepulchre.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Eti Yesuusabai Xoossaa maxaafan xaafettidaagaa ubbaa polido wode, masqqaliyaappe a wottidi moogidosona.

English Sentences: But God raised him from the dead:
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai haiquwaappe Yesuusa denttiis.

English Sentences: And he was seen many days of them which came up with him from Galilee to Jerusalem, who are his witnesses unto the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Denttin i banaara Galiilappe Yerusalaame yiidaageetussi darotoo beettiis eti ha77i abaa asaassi markkattoosona.

English Sentences: And we declare unto you glad tidings, how that the promise which was made unto the fathers,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xoossai nu aawatussi immana giido wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa nuuni inttessi yootoos.

English Sentences: God hath fulfilled the same unto us their children, in that he hath raised up Jesus again; as it is also written in the second psalm, Thou art my Son, this day have I begotten thee.
Wolaitta Sentences: Daawita Mazamuriyaa Maxaafan naa77antto miraafiyan, Neeni ta Na7aa. Hachchi taani ne Aawaa gidaas geetettidi xaafettidoogaadan, Xoossai Yesuusa denttidi, nu aawatussi immana giidoogaa nuussi eta naatussi poliis.

English Sentences: And as concerning that he raised him up from the dead, now no more to return to corruption, he said on this wise, I will give you the sure mercies of David.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77anttuwaa i haiqqenna mala, haiquwaappe a denttidoogaassi Xoossai, Taani Daawitayyo immana giido ammanettida geeshsha anjjuwaa inttessi immana yaagidi haasayiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore he saith also in another psalm, Thou shalt not suffer thine Holy One to see corruption.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Mazamure Maxaafan harasan qassi, Ne Geeshsha Na7aa ahaakka musissakka yaagees.

English Sentences: For David, after he had served his own generation by the will of God, fell on sleep, and was laid unto his fathers, and saw corruption:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Daawiti ba wodiyan Xoossaa qofaa oottidoogaappe guyyiyan haiqqidi, ba aawatuura moogettidi musiis.

English Sentences: But he, whom God raised again, saw no corruption.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Xoossai haiquwaappe denttidoogee musibeenna.

English Sentences: Be it known unto you therefore, men and brethren, that through this man is preached unto you the forgiveness of sins:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, ta ishatoo, nagara atto geettai intteyyo Yesuusa baggaara odettidoogeenne,

English Sentences: And by him all that believe are justified from all things, from which ye could not be justified by the law of Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: Muuse higgiyan xillanau intteyyo danddayettenna ubbabaappe aani ammaniya ubbai xillanaagee intteyyo eretto.

English Sentences: Beware therefore, lest that come upon you, which is spoken of in the prophets;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, hananabaa yootiyaageeti giidoogee intte bolli gakkenna mala naagettite;

English Sentences: Behold, ye despisers, and wonder, and perish: for I work a work in your days, a work which ye shall in no wise believe, though a man declare it unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: giidobaa qilliicciyaageetoo, be7ite; harai atto issi urai inttessi yootiyaakkokka, intte ammanenna oosuwaa taani intte wodiyan oottiyo gishshau, poora giite; haiqqite yaagidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when the Jews were gone out of the synagogue, the Gentiles besought that these words might be preached to them the next sabbath.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi Aihuda woosa keettaappe kiyishin, asai eta naa77antto Sambbatankka hegaa gujjidi yootana mala woossiis.

English Sentences: Now when the congregation was broken up, many of the Jews and religious proselytes followed Paul and Barnabas: who, speaking to them, persuaded them to continue in the grace of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqoi laalettidoogaappe guyyiyan, daro Aihudatinne Aihudatu ammanuwan gelidi Xoossau yayyiya daroti, PHauloosanne Barnnaabaasa kaallidosona; kaallin Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti Xoossaa aaro kehatettan minnidi de7ana mala, etau yootidi minttettidosona.

English Sentences: And the next sabbath day came almost the whole city together to hear the word of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Naa77antto Sambbatan amarida asatuppe attin, katamaa asai ubbai Xoossaa qaalaa siyanau shiiqiis.

English Sentences: But when the Jews saw the multitudes, they were filled with envy, and spake against those things which were spoken by Paul, contradicting and blaspheming.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aihudati daro asaa be7ido wode, PHauloosa qanaatidosona; a haasayaa PHalqqidi, a cayidosona.

English Sentences: Then Paul and Barnabas waxed bold, and said, It was necessary that the word of God should first have been spoken to you: but seeing ye put it from you, and judge yourselves unworthy of everlasting life, lo, we turn to the Gentiles.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi xalidi, "Xoossaa qaalai kasetidi intteyyo odettanau koshshees; shin qaalaa intte ixxido gishshaunne merinaa de7uwaa ekkanau inttessi bessenna giidi, intte intte huuphiyan pirddido gishshau, be7ite, nuuni Aihuda gidennaageetukko simmeettees.

English Sentences: For so hath the Lord commanded us, saying, I have set thee to be a light of the Gentiles, that thou shouldest be for salvation unto the ends of the earth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Godai nuna, Asai ubbai intte baggaara attana mala, inttena taani Aihuda gidennaageetussi poo7o oottaas yaagidi azaziis" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And when the Gentiles heard this, they were glad, and glorified the word of the Lord: and as many as were ordained to eternal life believed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda gidennaageeti hegaa siyido wode, ufaittidi Xoossaa qaalaa bonchchidosona; qassi merinaa de7uwaassi doorettida ubbaikka ammanidosona.

English Sentences: And the word of the Lord was published throughout all the region.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa qaalai he biitta ubbaa gakkiis.

English Sentences: But the Jews stirred up the devout and honourable women, and the chief men of the city, and raised persecution against Paul and Barnabas, and expelled them out of their coasts.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aihudati Xoossau goinniya bonchchettida maccaasatanne kataman de7iya gita asata PHauloosa bollinne Barnnaabaasa bolli denttettin, asati eta yedetaa doommidi, bantta biittaappe kessidosona.

English Sentences: But they shook off the dust of their feet against them, and came unto Iconium.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti eta ixxiyoogaassi malaata gidana mala, bantta tohuwaappe baanaa shocidi, Iqooniyoone katamaa biidosona.

English Sentences: And the disciples were filled with joy, and with the Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Anxxookiyan de7iya kaalliyaageetunkka Geeshsha Ayyaanainne ufaissai kumees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass in Iconium, that they went both together into the synagogue of the Jews, and so spake, that a great multitude both of the Jews and also of the Greeks believed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kaseegaadankka PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi Iqooniyoonen Aihudatu woosa keettaa gelidi, qaalaa yootidosona; yootin daro Aihudatinne Aihuda gidennaageeti ammanidosona.

English Sentences: But the unbelieving Jews stirred up the Gentiles, and made their minds evil affected against the brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ammanibeenna Aihudati Aihuda gidennaageetu wozanaa laammidi, ishanttu bolli hanqetissidosona.

English Sentences: Long time therefore abode they speaking boldly in the Lord, which gave testimony unto the word of his grace, and granted signs and wonders to be done by their hands.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegan daro wodiyaa gam77idosona; eti Godaabaa yayyennan yootidosona; yootin Godai malaataanne oorattabaa eti oottana mala, etau wolqqaa immidoogan ba aaro kehatettaa qaalaabai tuma gididoogaa markkattiis.

English Sentences: But the multitude of the city was divided: and part held with the Jews, and part with the apostles.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin katamaa asai shaahettidi, baggai Aihudatukko, baggai Yesuusi kiittidoogeetukko simmiis.

English Sentences: And when there was an assault made both of the Gentiles, and also of the Jews with their rulers, to use them despitefully, and to stone them,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda gidennaageetinne Aihudati bantta halaqatuura issippe Yesuusi kiittidoogeeta qohanaunne shuchchan caddanau qoppido wode,

English Sentences: They were ware of it, and fled unto Lystra and Derbe, cities of Lycaonia, and unto the region that lieth round about:
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegaa eridi, Lisxxiranne Daribe giyo Liqaa7ooniyaa katamatanne eta heeran de7iya biittaa baqatidosona;

English Sentences: And there they preached the gospel.
Wolaitta Sentences: baqatidi, hegan wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootoosona.

English Sentences: And there sat a certain man at Lystra, impotent in his feet, being a cripple from his mother's womb, who never had walked:
Wolaitta Sentences: Ba aayee uluwaappe yelettoosappe doommidi, naa77u tohoi silin, mulekka hemettenna issi bitanee Lisxxiran de7ees.

English Sentences: The same heard Paul speak: who stedfastly beholding him, and perceiving that he had faith to be healed,
Wolaitta Sentences: He bitanee PHauloosi yootishin siyees; PHauloosi a tishshi ootti xeelliyo wode, paxanau ayyo ammanoi de7iyoogaa be7idi,

English Sentences: Said with a loud voice, Stand upright on thy feet. And he leaped and walked.
Wolaitta Sentences: qaalaa xoqqissidi a, "Sitti gaada ne tohuwan eqqa" yaagiis; yaagin guppi denddidi, hemetaa doommiis.

English Sentences: And when the people saw what Paul had done, they lifted up their voices, saying in the speech of Lycaonia, The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi oottidoogaa asai be7idi, ba qaalaa Liqaa7ooniyaa qaalan xoqqu oottidi, "Xoossati asa milatidi nuukko wodhdhidosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they called Barnabas, Jupiter; and Paul, Mercurius, because he was the chief speaker.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai Barnnaabaasa, "Diyaa" giidi, PHauloosi haasayaassi waannatiyo gishshau, a, "Hermmeesa" giidi sunttiis.

English Sentences: Then the priest of Jupiter, which was before their city, brought oxen and garlands unto the gates, and would have done sacrifice with the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeta Maqidasee katamaa matan de7iyo Diyaa qeeseenne asai korimatanne alleeqo ciishshata Yesuusi kiittidoogeetussi yarshshuwaa yarshshanau koyidi, pengge ehiidosona.

English Sentences: Which when the apostles, Barnabas and Paul, heard of, they rent their clothes, and ran in among the people, crying out,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Yesuusi kiittido Barnnaabaasinne PHauloosi hegaa siyido wode bantta maayuwaa pooshshidi, asaa giddo woxxiiddi,

English Sentences: And saying, Sirs, why do ye these things? We also are men of like passions with you, and preach unto you that ye should turn from these vanities unto the living God, which made heaven, and earth, and the sea, and all things that are therein:
Wolaitta Sentences: bantta qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, hagaadan yaagidosona; "Asau, hagaa aissi ootteetii? Nuunikka inttenadan merettida asa; ha pattenna yohuwaappe saluwaanne sa7aa, abbaanne eta giddon de7iya ubbabaa medhdhida de7o Xoossaakko intte simmana mala, inttessi nuuni wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootoos.

English Sentences: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways.
Wolaitta Sentences: I beni asaa zare ubbaa bantta ogiyaa baana mala yeddi bayiis.

English Sentences: Nevertheless he left not himself without witness, in that he did good, and gave us rain from heaven, and fruitful seasons, filling our hearts with food and gladness.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intteyyo iraa saluwaappe bukissees; kattaakka i wodiyan immees; qassi qumaa immidi, inttena daro ufaissees; yaatidi intteyyo lo77obaa oottiiddi, ubba wodekka bau markka xayibeenna" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And with these sayings scarce restrained they the people, that they had not done sacrifice unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeeti hegaa giidi, banttayyo asai yarshshenna mala, tuggatidi diggidosona.

English Sentences: And there came thither certain Jews from Antioch and Iconium, who persuaded the people, and, having stoned Paul, drew him out of the city, supposing he had been dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Anxxookiyaappenne Iqooniyooneppe yiida Aihudati asaa bantta baggi zaaridi, shuchchan PHauloosa caddidosona; etau haiqqidabaa milatin, katamaappe gaxi a goochchidosona.

English Sentences: Howbeit, as the disciples stood round about him, he rose up, and came into the city: and the next day he departed with Barnabas to Derbe.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin kaalliyaageeti a lanqqiyan yuuyi aadhdhidi eqqidaashin, i denddidi, katamaa geliis. Wonttetta gallassi Barnnaabaasaara issippe Daribe biis.

English Sentences: And when they had preached the gospel to that city, and had taught many, they returned again to Lystra, and to Iconium, and Antioch,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Daribe kataman wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootidi, daro asai Yesuusa ammanana mala oottidoogaappe guyyiyan, Lisxxira, Iqooniyoonenne Anxxookiyaa simmidosona;

English Sentences: Confirming the souls of the disciples, and exhorting them to continue in the faith, and that we must through much tribulation enter into the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: simmidi hegan kaalliyaageeta minttettiiddinne eti ammanuwan minnidi de7ana mala zoriiddi, "Nuuni Xoossaa kawotettaa gelanau daro waayettana bessees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had ordained them elders in every church, and had prayed with fasting, they commended them to the Lord, on whom they believed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi woosa keettatussi huuphiyan huuphiyan cimata dooridi, xoomidoogaappenne woossidoogaappe guyyiyan, eti ammanido Godaassi eta hadaraa immidosona.

English Sentences: And after they had passed throughout Pisidia, they came to Pamphylia.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHisddiyaa biittaappe aadhdhidi, PHinifiliyaa yiidosona;

English Sentences: And when they had preached the word in Perga, they went down into Attalia:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHerggen qaalaa yootidoogaappe guyyiyan, Axaaliyaa wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And thence sailed to Antioch, from whence they had been recommended to the grace of God for the work which they fulfilled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe eti bantta polido oosuwaa gishshau, asai eta hadaraa Xoossaa aaro kehatettau immido Anxxookiyaa Markkabiyan simmidosona.

English Sentences: And when they were come, and had gathered the church together, they rehearsed all that God had done with them, and how he had opened the door of faith unto the Gentiles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmidi Anxxookiyaa gakkido wode woosa keettaa asaa shiishshidi, Xoossai banttanaara issippe oottido ubbabaanne, Aihuda gidenna asai ammanana mala, etau penggiyaa dooyidoogaa, asau yootidosona.

English Sentences: And there they abode long time with the disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi hegan kaalliyaageetuura daro wodiyaa gam77idosona.

English Sentences: And certain men which came down from Judaea taught the brethren, and said, Except ye be circumcised after the manner of Moses, ye cannot be saved.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi issi asati Yihudaappe Anxxookiyaa wodhdhidi, "Muuse wogaadan, intte qaxxarettennabaa gidikko, attanau danddayekketa" yaagidi ishantta tamaarissuwaa doommidosona.

English Sentences: When therefore Paul and Barnabas had no small dissension and disputation with them, they determined that Paul and Barnabas, and certain other of them, should go up to Jerusalem unto the apostles and elders about this question.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi etaara daro ooyettidi palamettin, Anxxookiyan de7iya issi issi hara asati he palamaa gishshau, PHauloosaaranne Barnnaabaasaara Yerusalaame biidi, Yesuusi kiittidoogeetuuranne cimatuura gaittanau qofai qashettiis.

English Sentences: And being brought on their way by the church, they passed through Phenice and Samaria, declaring the conversion of the Gentiles: and they caused great joy unto all the brethren.
Wolaitta Sentences: Woosa keettai ogiyan eta maaddishin, Aihuda gidennaageeti Xoossaakko simmidoogaa yootiiddi, Pinqqeeranne Samaariyaara aadhdhidosona; hegee ishantta ubbaa daro ufaissiis.

English Sentences: And when they were come to Jerusalem, they were received of the church, and of the apostles and elders, and they declared all things that God had done with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Yerusalaame gakkido wode, woosa keettai, Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne cimati eta mokkidosona; mokkin Xoossai banttanan oottidobaa ubbaa odidosona.

English Sentences: But there rose up certain of the sect of the Pharisees which believed, saying, That it was needful to circumcise them, and to command them to keep the law of Moses.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Parisaawetu baggappe ammanida issi issi asati denddi eqqidi, "Intte eta qaxxaranaunne Muuse higgiyaa naagana mala azazanau bessees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the apostles and elders came together for to consider of this matter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne cimati hegaa zorettanau shiiqidosona.

English Sentences: And when there had been much disputing, Peter rose up, and said unto them, Men and brethren, ye know how that a good while ago God made choice among us, that the Gentiles by my mouth should hear the word of the gospel, and believe.
Wolaitta Sentences: Keehi haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan, PHeexiroosi denddi eqqidi, eta hagaadan yaagiis; "Ta ishatoo, Aihuda gidennaageeti wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa qaalaa ta doonaappe siyidi ammanana mala, tana Xoossai intte giddoppe beni dooridoogaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: And God, which knoweth the hearts, bare them witness, giving them the Holy Ghost, even as he did unto us;
Wolaitta Sentences: Asa wozana eriya Xoossai Geeshsha Ayyaanaa nuussi immidoogaadan, etassikka immidi tumayiis.

English Sentences: And put no difference between us and them, purifying their hearts by faith.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ammanido gishshau, i eta wozanaa geeshshidi, nu gidduwaaninne eta gidduwan dummatettaa wottibeenna.

English Sentences: Now therefore why tempt ye God, to put a yoke upon the neck of the disciples, which neither our fathers nor we were able to bear?
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, nu aawatinne nuuni tookkanau danddayibeenna qambbaraa kaalliyaageetu morggiyan wottidi, ha77i intte aissi Xoossaa paacceetii?

English Sentences: But we believe that through the grace of the LORD Jesus Christ we shall be saved, even as they.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa aaro kehatettan eti attidoogaadan, nuunikka attidoogaa ammanoos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then all the multitude kept silence, and gave audience to Barnabas and Paul, declaring what miracles and wonders God had wrought among the Gentiles by them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai ubbai co77u giidi, Barnnaabaasinne PHauloosi Aihuda gidenna asaa giddon bantta baggaara Xoossai oottido malaataanne oorattabaa ubbaa yootishin siyees.

English Sentences: And after they had held their peace, James answered, saying, Men and brethren, hearken unto me:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti haasayaa wurssidoogaappe guyyiyan, Yaaqoobi hagaadan yaagidi zaariis; "Ishatoo, taani giyoogaa siyite.

English Sentences: Simeon hath declared how God at the first did visit the Gentiles, to take out of them a people for his name.
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai Aihuda gidennaageetu giddoppe bau haniya asaa ekkanau Aihuda gidennaageetuyyo koiro waatidi qoppidaakko Simooni yootiis.

English Sentences: And to this agree the words of the prophets; as it is written,
Wolaitta Sentences: Hananabaa yootiyaageetu qaalai hagaara giigees;

English Sentences: After this I will return, and will build again the tabernacle of David, which is fallen down; and I will build again the ruins thereof, and I will set it up:
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai daro wodiyaappe doommidi, asaa hagaa erissidi, Xoossaa maxaafan hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: That the residue of men might seek after the Lord, and all the Gentiles, upon whom my name is called, saith the Lord, who doeth all these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaappe guyyiyan, sa7an de7iya hara asai ubbainne tabaa gidanau taani xeesido Aihuda gidenna asai ubbai Godaa koyana mala, taani simmana.

English Sentences: Known unto God are all his works from the beginning of the world.
