Wolaitta Sentences: Taani kolettidi kunddida keettadan hanida Daawita kawotettaa denttana. Qolettidaagaakka zaarada keexxana; taani naa77anttuwaa a essana yaagiis.

English Sentences: Wherefore my sentence is, that we trouble not them, which from among the Gentiles are turned to God:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, ta qofa gidikko, Aihuda gidennaageetuppe Xoossaakko simmiyaageeta nuuni waissanau koshshenna.

English Sentences: But that we write unto them, that they abstain from pollutions of idols, and from fornication, and from things strangled, and from blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti eeqan tunidabaa meenna mala, shaaramuxenna mala, sulettida mehe asho meenna malanne suutta uyenna mala, etassi nuuni dabddaabbiyaa xaafanau koshshees.

English Sentences: For Moses of old time hath in every city them that preach him, being read in the synagogues every sabbath day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Muuse higgiyaa kase yeletaappe doommidi Sambbatan Sambbatan Aihuda woosa keettatun nabbabiiddi, a qaalaa katamaa ubban yootiyaageeti de7oosona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then pleased it the apostles and elders, with the whole church, to send chosen men of their own company to Antioch with Paul and Barnabas; namely, Judas surnamed Barsabas, and Silas, chief men among the brethren:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne cimati woosa keettaa asa ubbaara issippe bantta giddoppe amarida asata dooridi, PHauloosaaranne Barnnaabaasaara Anxxookiyaa yeddanau qofaa qachchidosona; eti daro bonchchettida naa77u asata Barssaaba geetettiya Yihudaanne Sillaasa dooridosona.

English Sentences: And they wrote letters by them after this manner; The apostles and elders and brethren send greeting unto the brethren which are of the Gentiles in Antioch and Syria and Cilicia:
Wolaitta Sentences: Dooridi hagaadan giya dabddaabbiyaa xaafidi, eta bolli kiittidosona; "Nuuni Yesuusi kiittidoogeetinne cimati intte ishantti, Anxxookiyan, Sooriyaaninne Kilqqiyan de7iya Aihuda bagga gidenna ishanttussi nu sarotaa kiittoos.

English Sentences: Forasmuch as we have heard, that certain which went out from us have troubled you with words, subverting your souls, saying, Ye must be circumcised, and keep the law: to whom we gave no such commandment:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Nuuni azazibeenna asati nu giddoppe biidi, Intte qaxxarettanaunne higgiyaa naaganau bessees giidi, inttena waissidoogaanne yiilloyidoogaa siyidi,

English Sentences: It seemed good unto us, being assembled with one accord, to send chosen men unto you with our beloved Barnabas and Paul,
Wolaitta Sentences: nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttaa gishshau,

English Sentences: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: bantta shemppuwaa olida nuuni siiqiyo Barnnaabaasaaranne PHauloosaara doorettida asata inttekko kiittanau issi wozanan nu qofaa qachchida.

English Sentences: We have sent therefore Judas and Silas, who shall also tell you the same things by mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, nuuni xaafidoogaa eti bantta huuphen bantta doonan inttessi yootana mala, Yihudaanne Sillaasa kiittida.

English Sentences: For it seemed good to the Holy Ghost, and to us, to lay upon you no greater burden than these necessary things;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Aissi giikko, eeqassi yarshshidobaa mooppite; suutta uyoppite; sulettida mehe asho mooppite; shaaramuxoppite.

English Sentences: That ye abstain from meats offered to idols, and from blood, and from things strangled, and from fornication: from which if ye keep yourselves, ye shall do well. Fare ye well.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ha koshshiyaageetuppe attin, hara tooho inttena toossenna mala, nuuninne Geeshsha Ayyaanai yohuwaa maayida; ha ubbabaappe intte huuphiyaa naagikko, intte lo77obaa ootteeta. Simmi saro de7ite" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: So when they were dismissed, they came to Antioch: and when they had gathered the multitude together, they delivered the epistle:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, kiitettidaageeti moisettidi, Anxxookiyaa wodhdhidi, ammaniya asaa shiishshidi, dabddaabbiyaa asaassi immidosona.

English Sentences: Which when they had read, they rejoiced for the consolation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti he minttettiya dabddaabbiyaa nabbabido wode, ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: And Judas and Silas, being prophets also themselves, exhorted the brethren with many words, and confirmed them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Yihudainne Sillaasi bantta huuphen hananabaa yootiyaageeta gidiyo gishshau, ishantta keehi zoridi minttettidosona.

English Sentences: And after they had tarried there a space, they were let go in peace from the brethren unto the apostles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Anxxookiyan amarida gallassaa uttidoogaappe guyyiyan, ishantti sarotettan moissin, banttana kiittidaageetukko simmidosona.

English Sentences: Notwithstanding it pleased Silas to abide there still.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Sillaasee yaani attanau ba qofaa qachchiis.

English Sentences: Paul also and Barnabas continued in Antioch, teaching and preaching the word of the Lord, with many others also.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi PHauloosinne Barnnaabaasi hara daro asatuura issippe Godaa qaalaa tamaarissiiddinne wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiiddi, Anxxookiyan uttidosona.

English Sentences: And some days after Paul said unto Barnabas, Let us go again and visit our brethren in every city where we have preached the word of the LORD, and see how they do.
Wolaitta Sentences: Amarida gallassaappe guyyiyan, PHauloosi Barnnaabaasa, "Nuuni Godaa qaalaa yootido katama ubban nu ishantti waanidi de7iyaakko, guyye simmidi, xomoosi be7oos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And Barnabas determined to take with them John, whose surname was Mark.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin Barnnaabaasi Marqqoosa geetettiya Yohaannisa banttanaara efaanau koyiis.

English Sentences: But Paul thought not good to take him with them, who departed from them from Pamphylia, and went not with them to the work.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi Marqqoosa banttanaara efaanau koyibeenna; aissi giikko, i etappe PHinifiliyan shaahettiis; qassi etaara oosuwau bibeenna.

English Sentences: And the contention was so sharp between them, that they departed asunder one from the other: and so Barnabas took Mark, and sailed unto Cyprus;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta gidduwan pala ooshshai kiyin, issoi issuwaappe shaahettidosona; Barnnaabaasi Marqqoosa ekkidi, markkabiyan Qophphiroosa biis.

English Sentences: And Paul chose Silas, and departed, being recommended by the brethren unto the grace of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi Sillaasa doorin, ishantti a hadaraa Xoossaa aaro kehatettau immidoogaappe guyyiyan biis.

English Sentences: And he went through Syria and Cilicia, confirming the churches.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi woosa keettata minttettiiddi, Sooriyaaranne Kilqqiyaara aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: Then came he to Derbe and Lystra: and, behold, a certain disciple was there, named Timotheus, the son of a certain woman, which was a Jewess, and believed; but his father was a Greek:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi qassi Daribenne Lisxxira biis; hegan Ximootiyoosa giyo kaalliyaagee, issi ammaniya Aihuda maccaasee na7ai de7ees; a aawai Giriike asa.

English Sentences: Which was well reported of by the brethren that were at Lystra and Iconium.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lisxxiraaninne Iqooniyoonen de7iya ishantti Ximootiyoosabaa loittidi markkattidosona.

English Sentences: Him would Paul have to go forth with him; and took and circumcised him because of the Jews which were in those quarters: for they knew all that his father was a Greek.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi Ximootiyoosa banaara efaanau koyidi, a aawai Giriike asa gididoogaa he sohuwan de7iya Aihuda ubbai eriyo gishshau, a oiqqidi qaxxariis.

English Sentences: And as they went through the cities, they delivered them the decrees for to keep, that were ordained of the apostles and elders which were at Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti katamatuura biiddi, Yesuusi kiittido Yerusalaamen de7iyaageetinne cimati wottido higgiyaa ammaniyaageeti naagana mala, etassi yootiiddi aadhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And so were the churches established in the faith, and increased in number daily.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, woosa keettati ammanuwan minnidi, qoodankka gallassappe gallassan dari dari biidosona.

English Sentences: Now when they had gone throughout Phrygia and the region of Galatia, and were forbidden of the Holy Ghost to preach the word in Asia,
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyan qaalaa yootenna mala, Geeshsha Ayyaanai eta diggido gishshau, Pirggiyaa biittaaranne Galaatiyaa biittaara aadhdhidosona.

English Sentences: After they were come to Mysia, they assayed to go into Bithynia: but the Spirit suffered them not.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Miisiyaa zawaa gakkido wode, Biitaaniyaa baanau koyidosona; shin Yesuusa Ayyaanai eta diggiis.

English Sentences: And they passing by Mysia came down to Troas.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, eti Miisiyaa mataara aadhdhidi, Xiro7aada wodhdhidosona.

English Sentences: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night; There stood a man of Macedonia, and prayed him, saying, Come over into Macedonia, and help us.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi qammi ajjuutan issi Maqidooniyaa asi bana, "Maqidooniyaa pinnada nuna maaddarkkii" yaagiiddi eqqidi woossishin be7iis.

English Sentences: And after he had seen the vision, immediately we endeavoured to go into Macedonia, assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ajjuutaa i be7idoogaappe guyyiyan, nuuni sohuwaara Maqidooniyaa baanau koyida; aissi giikko, wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yaani de7iya asaassi yootanau, Xoossai nuna xeesidobaa nuuyyo milatiis.

English Sentences: Therefore loosing from Troas, we came with a straight course to Samothracia, and the next day to Neapolis;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xiro7aadappe denddidi, sitti giidi markkabiyan Saamootiraaqe biida; wonttetta gallassi Naaphphule biida.

English Sentences: And from thence to Philippi, which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia, and a colony: and we were in that city abiding certain days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe Piliphphisiyuusa biida; Piliphphisiyuusi Maqidooniyaa biittau waanna katama; qassi Roome asai de7iyo katama; nuuni he kataman amarida gallassaa uttida.

English Sentences: And on the sabbath we went out of the city by a river side, where prayer was wont to be made; and we sat down, and spake unto the women which resorted thither.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sambbata gallassi, katamaappe gaxan shaafaa doonan Aihudati Xoossaa woossiyo sohoi de7iyoogaa akeekidi biida; biidi uttidi hegan shiiqida maccaasaassi qaalaa yootida.

English Sentences: And a certain woman named Lydia, a seller of purple, of the city of Thyatira, which worshipped God, heard us: whose heart the Lord opened, that she attended unto the things which were spoken of Paul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Issi Lidiyaa giyoora, Tiyaaxiroona katamaappe yaada Xoossaa ammaniyaara, zo7o afalaa baizziya maccaasiyaa, nuuni yootiyoogaa siyausu; PHauloosi yootiyoogaakka a siyana mala Xoossai i wozanaa dooyiis.

English Sentences: And when she was baptized, and her household, she besought us, saying, If ye have judged me to be faithful to the Lord, come into my house, and abide there. And she constrained us.
Wolaitta Sentences: Lidiyaa ba so asaara issippe xammaqettidoogaappe guyyiyan nuna, "Intte tana Godaa tumu ammanausu giidi qoppikko, ta sooni takkite" gaada woossaasu; minttada shoobbaasu.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, as we went to prayer, a certain damsel possessed with a spirit of divination met us, which brought her masters much gain by soothsaying:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Xoossaa woossiyoosaa biishin, iita ayyaanai i bolli de7idi kaayissiyo issi aille na7iyaa nunaara gaittaasu; he na7iyaa kaayada daro miishshaa ba godatussi demmaasu.

English Sentences: The same followed Paul and us, and cried, saying, These men are the servants of the most high God, which shew unto us the way of salvation.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaittada PHauloosanne nuna kaallaidda, "Hageeti inttessi attana ogiyaa yootiyaageeti, Ubbaappe Bolla Xoossaa ailleta" gaada qaalaa xoqqu oottada haasayaasu.

English Sentences: And this did she many days. But Paul, being grieved, turned and said to the spirit, I command thee in the name of Jesus Christ to come out of her. And he came out the same hour.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubba gallassi hegaadan gausu; shin PHauloosi yiillotidi guyye simmidi, he iita ayyaanaa, "Neeni ippe kiyana mala Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan nena azazais" yaagiis; sohuwaarakka iita ayyaanai ippe kiyi aggiis.

English Sentences: And when her masters saw that the hope of their gains was gone, they caught Paul and Silas, and drew them into the marketplace unto the rulers,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin i godati bantta miishshaa demmana ogee xayidoogaa be7idi, PHauloosanne Sillaasa oiqqidi, giyaa sohuwan de7iya daannatu sintti goochchidosona.

English Sentences: And brought them to the magistrates, saying, These men, being Jews, do exceedingly trouble our city,
Wolaitta Sentences: Daannatu sintti eta efiidi, "Hageeti Aihuda asa gidiiddi, nu katamaa asaa daro waissoosona.

English Sentences: And teach customs, which are not lawful for us to receive, neither to observe, being Romans.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Roome biittaa asa gidiiddi, ekkanaunne oottanau woga gidennabaa tamaarissoosona" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And the multitude rose up together against them: and the magistrates rent off their clothes, and commanded to beat them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai issi baggi gididi, PHauloosa bollinne Sillaasa bolli denddiis; daannatikka eta maayuwaa qaari ekkidi, gatiman eta shocana mala azazidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had laid many stripes upon them, they cast them into prison, charging the jailor to keep them safely:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta daro wadhdhidoogaappe guyyiyan, qasho keettan yeggidosona. Qasho keettaa naagiyaageekka eta mintti naaganaadan azazidosona.

English Sentences: Who, having received such a charge, thrust them into the inner prison, and made their feet fast in the stocks.
Wolaitta Sentences: Azazin qasho keettaa naagiyaagee he azazuwaa ekkidi, PHauloosanne Sillaasa qasho keettaassi qol77o gelissiis; eta gediyaakka mittaara gatti daraxidi qachchiis.

English Sentences: And at midnight Paul and Silas prayed, and sang praises unto God: and the prisoners heard them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qamma bilahe gidiyo heeran PHauloosinne Sillaasi Xoossaa woossiiddi, mazamuriyaa yettan Xoossaa galatoosona; galatishin qashuwaasai eti giyoobaa siyees.

English Sentences: And suddenly there was a great earthquake, so that the foundations of the prison were shaken: and immediately all the doors were opened, and every one's bands were loosed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qasho keettaassi xaphoi qaaxxana gakkanaassi akeekennan biittai daro qaaxxiis; sohuwaarakka penggee ubbai dooyetti aggin, qashettida asa ubbaa sanssalatai birshshetti wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And the keeper of the prison awaking out of his sleep, and seeing the prison doors open, he drew out his sword, and would have killed himself, supposing that the prisoners had been fled.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qasho keettaa naagiyaagee xiskkuwaappe beegottiyo wode, qasho keettaa penggee ubbai dooyettidaageeta be7idi, qashuwaasai kessi ekkidi biichchidobaa ayyo milatin, bana woranau qoppidi, bisuwaa ekkiis.

English Sentences: But Paul cried with a loud voice, saying, Do thyself no harm: for we are all here.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi qaalaa xoqqu oottidi, "Neeni nena qohoppa; aissi giikko, nuuni ubbaikka hagan de7oos" yaagiis.

English Sentences: Then he called for a light, and sprang in, and came trembling, and fell down before Paul and Silas,
Wolaitta Sentences: Qasho keettaa naagiyaagee xomppiyaa woossi ekkidi, eesuwan qol77o woxxiis; kokkoriiddi PHauloosa sinttaaninne Sillaasa sinttan gufanniis;

English Sentences: And brought them out, and said, Sirs, what must I do to be saved?
Wolaitta Sentences: eta kare kessidi, "Ta godaatoo, taani attanau ai oottana bessii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they said, Believe on the Lord Jesus Christ, and thou shalt be saved, and thy house.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Sillaasi a, "Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammana; neeni attana; ne so asaikka" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they spake unto him the word of the Lord, and to all that were in his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ayyoonne a son de7iya ubbaassi Godaa qaalaa yootidosona.

English Sentences: And he took them the same hour of the night, and washed their stripes; and was baptized, he and all his, straightway.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qammi he saatiyankka qasho keettaa naagiyaagee eta efiidi eta masunttaa meecciis; sohuwaarakka ba so asaa ubbaara xammaqetti aggiis.

English Sentences: And when he had brought them into his house, he set meat before them, and rejoiced, believing in God with all his house.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosanne Sillaasa pude ba soo efiidi, etassi qumaa aattiis; i ba so asaa ubbaara Xoossaa ammanido gishshau, ufaittiis.

English Sentences: And when it was day, the magistrates sent the serjeants, saying, Let those men go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttin daannati, "He asata birshsha" yaagidi, polise halaqata akko kiittidosona.

English Sentences: And the keeper of the prison told this saying to Paul, The magistrates have sent to let you go: now therefore depart, and go in peace.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiittin qasho keettaa naagiyaagee, "Intte birshshettana mala, daannati tau kiittidosona; simmi ha77i kiyidi sarotettan biite" yaagidi he kiitaa PHauloosassi yootiis.

English Sentences: But Paul said unto them, They have beaten us openly uncondemned, being Romans, and have cast us into prison; and now do they thrust us out privily? nay verily; but let them come themselves and fetch us out.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi he polise halaqata, "Nuuni Roome biittaa asa gidishin, eti nuna pirddi bainnan asaa sinttan wadhdhidi, qasho keettan yeggidosona. Ha77i nuna geeman kessi yeddiyoonaa? Hanenna; eti bantta huuphen yiidi, nuna kessona" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the serjeants told these words unto the magistrates: and they feared, when they heard that they were Romans.
Wolaitta Sentences: Polise halaqati daannatussi hegaa yootin, PHauloosinne Sillaasi Roome biittaa asa gididoogaa siyido wode, yayyidosona.

English Sentences: And they came and besought them, and brought them out, and desired them to depart out of the city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, daannati yiidi eta, "Nuuni inttena naaqqida" giidosona. Qasho keettaappe kare eta kessidi, katamaappe kiyidi baana mala woossidosona.

English Sentences: And they went out of the prison, and entered into the house of Lydia: and when they had seen the brethren, they comforted them, and departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Sillaasi qasho keettaappe kiyidi, Lidiyaa soo biidosona; yaani ishanttuura gaittidi, eta minttettidi hegaappe biidosona.

English Sentences: Now when they had passed through Amphipolis and Apollonia, they came to Thessalonica, where was a synagogue of the Jews:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Sillaasi, Amppipholiisaaranne Apholooniyaara aadhdhidi, Tasalonqqe yiidosona; Tasalonqqen Aihuda woosa keettai de7ees.

English Sentences: And Paul, as his manner was, went in unto them, and three sabbath days reasoned with them out of the scriptures,
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi ba meeziyaadankka yaa geliis; hegan heezzu Sambbata gallassatun Xoossaa maxaafatuppe asaara haasayiis;

English Sentences: Opening and alleging, that Christ must needs have suffered, and risen again from the dead; and that this Jesus, whom I preach unto you, is Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Kiristtoosi waayiyaa ekkanaunne haiquwaappe denddanau bessiyoogaa etassi birshshidi yootiiddinne tuma gididoogaakka eta erissiiddi, "Yesuusi ha taani intteyyo odiyoogee Kiristtoosa" yaagees.

English Sentences: And some of them believed, and consorted with Paul and Silas; and of the devout Greeks a great multitude, and of the chief women not a few.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issooti issooti yohoi tuma gididoogaa akeekidi, PHauloosaaranne Sillaaseera gaittidosona; hegaadankka, Xoossaassi goinniya daro Giriiketinne daro bonchchettida maccaasati, PHauloosaaranne Sillaaseera gaittidosona.

English Sentences: But the Jews which believed not, moved with envy, took unto them certain lewd fellows of the baser sort, and gathered a company, and set all the city on an uproar, and assaulted the house of Jason, and sought to bring them out to the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Aihudati qanaatidi, issi issi oosoi bainna iita asata qocaappe shiishshidosona; shiishshidi katamaa asaa wocamissidosona; PHauloosanne Sillaasa asaakko kessana mala koyidi, Yaasoona keettaa menttidosona.

English Sentences: And when they found them not, they drew Jason and certain brethren unto the rulers of the city, crying, These that have turned the world upside down are come hither also;
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosinne Sillaasi etassi beettennan ixxin, Yaasoonanne issi issi ishantta katamaa halaqatukko goochchidi, "Hageeti biitta ubbaa metoyidaageeti, hagaakka yiidosona.

English Sentences: Whom Jason hath received: and these all do contrary to the decrees of Caesar, saying that there is another king, one Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yin Yaasooni eta ba sooni wottiis; hageeti ubbai, Yesuusa giyo hara kawoi de7ees giidi Qeesaara azazuwaa menttoosona" yaagidi, qaalaa xoqqissidi haasayidosona.

English Sentences: And they troubled the people and the rulers of the city, when they heard these things.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiqida asainne katamaa halaqati hegaa siyidi metootidosona.

English Sentences: And when they had taken security of Jason, and of the other, they let them go.
Wolaitta Sentences: Halaqati Yaasoonanne harata waasiyan birshshidosona.

English Sentences: And the brethren immediately sent away Paul and Silas by night unto Berea: who coming thither went into the synagogue of the Jews.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniyaageeti PHauloosanne Sillaasa sa7ai qammiyoogan sohuwaara Beeriyaa yeddidosona. Beeriyaa gakkidi, Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidosona.

English Sentences: These were more noble than those in Thessalonica, in that they received the word with all readiness of mind, and searched the scriptures daily, whether those things were so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Beeriyaa asati Tasalonqqen de7iya asatuppekka aadhdhiya akeekanchcha gidido gishshau, "PHauloosi giidoogee tumakkonne" yaagidi, ubba gallassi Xoossaa maxaafata tamaariiddi, qaalaa kumetta laamotan ekkidosona.

English Sentences: Therefore many of them believed; also of honourable women which were Greeks, and of men, not a few.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, etappe daroti, Giriiketuppe bonchchettida daro maccaasatinne daro attumaasati ammanidosona.

English Sentences: But when the Jews of Thessalonica had knowledge that the word of God was preached of Paul at Berea, they came thither also, and stirred up the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Tasalonqqen de7iya Aihudati PHauloosi Xoossaa qaalaa Beeriyankka yootidoogaa siyido wode, Beeriyaa yiidi, asaa aara ooshshidosona.

English Sentences: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea: but Silas and Timotheus abode there still.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, ishantti sohuwaarakka PHauloosa abbaa mati yeddi aggidosona; shin Sillaasinne Ximootiyoosi Beeriyan attidosona.

English Sentences: And they that conducted Paul brought him unto Athens: and receiving a commandment unto Silas and Timotheus for to come to him with all speed, they departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosa moissida asati Ateena gattidosona; he asati Sillaasinne Ximootiyoosi banttau danddayettidoogaadan, eesuwan baakko yaana mala, PHauloosi kiittido kiitaa ekkidi, Beeriyaa simmidosona.

English Sentences: Now while Paul waited for them at Athens, his spirit was stirred in him, when he saw the city wholly given to idolatry.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi Ateenan Sillaasanne Ximootiyoosa naagiiddi, kataman eeqai kumidaagaa be7idi yiillotiis.

English Sentences: Therefore disputed he in the synagogue with the Jews, and with the devout persons, and in the market daily with them that met with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Aihuda woosa keettan Aihudatuuranne Xoossaassi goinniya Aihuda gidenna asatuura palamettees; qassi ubba gallassi giyan banaara gaittiya asaarakka palamettees.

English Sentences: Then certain philosophers of the Epicureans, and of the Stoicks, encountered him. And some said, What will this babbler say? other some, He seemeth to be a setter forth of strange gods: because he preached unto them Jesus, and the resurrection.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi Eppiqoroosappenne Isxxo7ikiyaappe yiida issi issi eranchchati PHauloosaara palamettidosona; etappe issoi issoi, "Ha toofiinai ai haasayanau koyii?" yaagidosona. Harati PHauloosi Yesuusabaanne haiquwaappe i denddidoogaa banttassi yootiyo gishshau, "Ooratta xoossatubaa odiyaabaa milatees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And they took him, and brought him unto Areopagus, saying, May we know what this new doctrine, whereof thou speakest, is?
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosa oiqqidi, "Ha neeni tamaarissiyo ooratta yohoi aibakkonne nuna erissarkkii?

English Sentences: For thou bringest certain strange things to our ears: we would know therefore what these things mean.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni nuuyyo oorattabaa yootaasa; simmi hagee Aibakko nuuni eranau koyoos" yaagidi PHauloosa Ariyosppaagoosa giyoosaa efiidosona.

English Sentences: (For all the Athenians and strangers which were there spent their time in nothing else, but either to tell, or to hear some new thing.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Ateena asai ubbainne hegan de7iya imattati oorattabaa haasayiiddinne siyiiddi pe7iyoogaappe attin, haraban pe7okkona.

English Sentences: Then Paul stood in the midst of Mars' hill, and said, Ye men of Athens, I perceive that in all things ye are too superstitious.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi Ariyosppaagoosa sinttan eqqidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Ateena asatoo, Xoossatussi ubbaban intte daro yayyiyoogaa taani be7ais.

English Sentences: For as I passed by, and beheld your devotions, I found an altar with this inscription, TO THE UNKNOWN GOD. Whom therefore ye ignorantly worship, him declare I unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, taani intte goinniyoogaa xeellaidda aadhdhishin, Erettenna Xoossaassi geetettidi xaafettida yarshshuwaa sohuwaa qassi demmaas; hegaa gishshau, ha intte erennan goinniyoogaa taani inttessi yootais.

English Sentences: God that made the world and all things therein, seeing that he is Lord of heaven and earth, dwelleth not in temples made with hands;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Sa7aanne sa7an de7iya ubbabaa medhdhida Xoossai saluwaanne sa7aa Godai, asi keexxido Beeta Maqidasiyan de7enna.

English Sentences: Neither is worshipped with men's hands, as though he needed any thing, seeing he giveth to all life, and breath, and all things;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aibakko paccido asadan, asa kushe i xeellenna; aissi giikko, i ba huuphen de7uwaa shemppuwaanne ubbabaa asa ubbaassi immees.

English Sentences: And hath made of one blood all nations of men for to dwell on all the face of the earth, and hath determined the times before appointed, and the bounds of their habitation;
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai asa zare ubbaa issi uraappe medhdhidi, biitta ubban wottiis; i ba huuphen eti de7ana wodiyaanne sohuwaa kase zawayiis.

English Sentences: That they should seek the Lord, if haply they might feel after him, and find him, though he be not far from every one of us:
Wolaitta Sentences: "I hegaa oottidoogee eti oiqqi oiqqi xeellidi, bana koyiiddi, geelladan demmanddonaashsha giyoogaana; gidikkonne, Xoossai nuuppe ooyyoonne haaho gidenna.

English Sentences: For in him we live, and move, and have our being; as certain also of your own poets have said, For we are also his offspring.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, intteppe issi issi eranchchati, Nuuni a naata giidoogaadan, nuuni aani paxa de7oosinne de7idi qaaxettoos.

English Sentences: Forasmuch then as we are the offspring of God, we ought not to think that the Godhead is like unto gold, or silver, or stone, graven by art and man's device.
Wolaitta Sentences: Simmi nuuni Xoossaa naata gidido gishshau, Xoossai asa cinccatettaaninne qofan worqqappe woi birappe woi shuchchappe oosettidabaa milatees yaagidi, qoppanau bessenna.

English Sentences: And the times of this ignorance God winked at; but now commandeth all men every where to repent:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Xoossai asai eribeenna wodiyaa aattiis; shin ha77i ubbasan asai ubbai nagaraappe simmana mala azazees.

English Sentences: Because he hath appointed a day, in the which he will judge the world in righteousness by that man whom he hath ordained; whereof he hath given assurance unto all men, in that he hath raised him from the dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai gallassaa keeri wottiis; he gallassan ba doorido uran sa7an de7iya asa ubbaa bolli xillo pirddaa i pirddana; asa ubbaassi haiquwaappe a denttidoogan hegaa tumayiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they heard of the resurrection of the dead, some mocked: and others said, We will hear thee again of this matter.
Wolaitta Sentences: Etappe issi issi asati haiquwaappe dendduwaabaa PHauloosappe siyidi, a bolli qilliiccidosona; shin harati a, "Nuuni hagaa neeppe gujjidi siyana koyoos" giidosona.

English Sentences: So Paul departed from among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, PHauloosi eta giddoppe kiyiis.

English Sentences: Howbeit certain men clave unto him, and believed: among the which was Dionysius the Areopagite, and a woman named Damaris, and others with them.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin issi issi attumaasati PHauloosaara gaittidi ammanidosona; eta gidduwan Ariyosppaagoosan de7iya pirdda keettaa daannai Diyoonaasiyoosi, Damaariiso giyo issi maccaasiyaanne harati de7oosona.

English Sentences: After these things Paul departed from Athens, and came to Corinth;
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, PHauloosi Ateenappe kiyidi, Qoronttoosa biis.

English Sentences: And found a certain Jew named Aquila, born in Pontus, lately come from Italy, with his wife Priscilla; (because that Claudius had commanded all Jews to depart from Rome:) and came unto them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan Aqiila giyo issi Aihuda asa demmiis; Aqiili PHanxxoosan yelettiis; Aihuda asai ubbai Roomeppe kiyana mala, Qalaudeyoosi azazido gishshau, amarida wodiyaappe kase, i ba machchee PHirisqqiliira Xaaliyaappe yiis; yin PHauloosi etaara gaittanau biis.

English Sentences: And because he was of the same craft, he abode with them, and wrought: for by their occupation they were tentmakers.
Wolaitta Sentences: A oosoinne eta oosoi issi mala dunkkaane siho gidiyo gishshau, etaara uttidi, issippe oottiis.

English Sentences: And he reasoned in the synagogue every sabbath, and persuaded the Jews and the Greeks.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi Sambbata ubban Aihudatanne Giriiketa ammanttanau Aihuda woosa keettan palamettees.

English Sentences: And when Silas and Timotheus were come from Macedonia, Paul was pressed in the spirit, and testified to the Jews that Jesus was Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Sillaasinne Ximootiyoosi Maqidooniyaappe yiido wode, PHauloosi Aihudatussi Yesuusi ba huuphen Kiristtoosa gididoogau qaalaa yootuwaa toliis.

English Sentences: And when they opposed themselves, and blasphemed, he shook his raiment, and said unto them, Your blood be upon your own heads; I am clean: from henceforth I will go unto the Gentiles.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin eti PHauloosa haasayaa phalqqiininne a cayin, PHauloosi ba maayuwaappe buhiyaa qoqqofiiddi, "Intte palai inttena oiqqo; taani hegan gelikke; hagaappe hini baggan taani Aihuda gidenna asaakko bais" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he departed thence, and entered into a certain man's house, named Justus, one that worshipped God, whose house joined hard to the synagogue.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe kiyidi, Xoossaassi goinniya Yosxxoosa giyo bitaniyaa soo biis; Yosxxoosa keettai Aihuda woosa keettaa lanqqiyan de7ees.

English Sentences: And Crispus, the chief ruler of the synagogue, believed on the Lord with all his house; and many of the Corinthians hearing believed, and were baptized.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqai Qarisphphoosi ba so asaa ubbaara Godaa ammaniis; Qoronttoosa asatuppekka daroti Xoossaa qaalaa siyido wode, ammanidi xammaqettidosona.

English Sentences: Then spake the Lord to Paul in the night by a vision, Be not afraid, but speak, and hold not thy peace:
Wolaitta Sentences: Godai issi qammi ajjuutan PHauloosa, "Yayyoppa; yoota; co77u gooppa.

English Sentences: For I am with thee, and no man shall set on thee to hurt thee: for I have much people in this city.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani nenaara de7iyo gishshau, nena qohanau iitaban yeggana asi ooninne baawa; aissi giikko, taassi ha kataman daro asai de7ees" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he continued there a year and six months, teaching the word of God among them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagin PHauloosi Xoossaa qaalaa asaa tamaarissiiddi, issi laittanne usuppun agina etaara uttiis.

English Sentences: And when Gallio was the deputy of Achaia, the Jews made insurrection with one accord against Paul, and brought him to the judgment seat,
Wolaitta Sentences: Gaaliyoosi Akaayiyaa biittaa haariyo wode, Aihudati issippe PHauloosa bolli denddidi, pirdda keettaa a efiidosona.

English Sentences: Saying, This fellow persuadeth men to worship God contrary to the law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efiidi, "Ha bitanee higgiyaa ixxidi, asai Xoossaassi goinnana mala labees" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And when Paul was now about to open his mouth, Gallio said unto the Jews, If it were a matter of wrong or wicked lewdness, O ye Jews, reason would that I should bear with you:
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi haasayana hanishin, Gaaliyoosi Aihudata, "Aihudatoo, hegee bala ooso woi iita naaqo gidiyaakko, taani inttebaa danddayada siyanau bessees.

English Sentences: But if it be a question of words and names, and of your law, look ye to it; for I will be no judge of such matters.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin qaalassi sunttassinne intte huuphe higgiyaassi intte palamettikko, intte huuphen erite; hagaa taani pirddikke" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And he drave them from the judgment seat.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi pirdda keettaappe kare eta kessiis.

English Sentences: Then all the Greeks took Sosthenes, the chief ruler of the synagogue, and beat him before the judgment seat. And Gallio cared for none of those things.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, Giriike asai ubbai Aihuda woosa keettaa halaqaa Sostteniisa oiqqidi, pirdda keettaa sinttan wadhdhidosona; shin Gaaliyoosa hegee ainne metibeenna.

English Sentences: And Paul after this tarried there yet a good while, and then took his leave of the brethren, and sailed thence into Syria, and with him Priscilla and Aquila; having shorn his head in Cenchrea: for he had a vow.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi daro gallassaa Qoronttoosan uttidoogaappe guyyiyan, ishantta sarotidi, PHirisqqiliiranne Aqiilaara markkabiyan Sooriyaa biis; baassi shiiqo gatoi de7iyo gishshau, Kinkkiriyaa kataman ba huuphiyaa meedettiis.

English Sentences: And he came to Ephesus, and left them there: but he himself entered into the synagogue, and reasoned with the Jews.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti Efisoona gakkido wode, PHauloosi PHirisqqilonne Aqiila yaani yeggiis; shin baayyo Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi, Aihudatuura palamettiis.

English Sentences: When they desired him to tarry longer time with them, he consented not;
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti banttanaara daro wodiyaa uttanau PHauloosa woossin i ixxiis.

English Sentences: But bade them farewell, saying, I must by all means keep this feast that cometh in Jerusalem: but I will return again unto you, if God will. And he sailed from Ephesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin etappe shaahettiiddi, "Taani yiya baala gallassaa Yerusalaamen bonchchanau bessees; shin Xoossai giikko, naa77anttuwaa inttekko simmana" yaagidi Efisoonappe markkabiyan biis.

English Sentences: And when he had landed at Caesarea, and gone up, and saluted the church, he went down to Antioch.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiisaariyaa gakkido wode Yerusalaame biidi, woosa keettaa asaa sarotidoogaappe guyyiyan, Anxxookiyaa wodhdhiis.

English Sentences: And after he had spent some time there, he departed, and went over all the country of Galatia and Phrygia in order, strengthening all the disciples.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaani amarida wodiyaa gam77idi biis; kaalliyaageeta ubbaa minttettiiddi, Galaatiyaaranne Pirggiyaara aadhdhiis.

English Sentences: And a certain Jew named Apollos, born at Alexandria, an eloquent man, and mighty in the scriptures, came to Ephesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iskkinddiriyan yelettida Aihuda asa issi Aphiloosa giyo yoho eranchchai Efisoona biis; Xoossaa maxaafata i daro eriya asa.

English Sentences: This man was instructed in the way of the Lord; and being fervent in the spirit, he spake and taught diligently the things of the Lord, knowing only the baptism of John.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa ogiyaakka tamaarida asa; Yohaannisa xinqqatiyaa xalaalaa eridi, ayyaanan mishettiiddi, Yesuusabaa sitti oottidi haasayeesinne tamaarissees.

English Sentences: And he began to speak boldly in the synagogue: whom when Aquila and Priscilla had heard, they took him unto them, and expounded unto him the way of God more perfectly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatidi Aihuda woosa keettan yayyennan haasayaa doommiis. PHirisqqilanne Aqiili i yootiyoogaa siyido wode, banttanaara soo a efiidi, Xoossaa ogiyaa kaseppe sittayidi, ayyo geeshshidi yootidosona.

English Sentences: And when he was disposed to pass into Achaia, the brethren wrote, exhorting the disciples to receive him: who, when he was come, helped them much which had believed through grace:
Wolaitta Sentences: Aphiloosi Akaayiyaa pinnana koyin, ishantti a minttettidi, Akaayiyan de7iya kaalliyaageeti a mokkana mala, etassi dabddaabbiyaa xaafidosona; i yaa gakkidi, Xoossaa aaro kehatettan ammaniyaageeta daro maaddiis.

English Sentences: For he mightily convinced the Jews, and that publickly, shewing by the scriptures that Jesus was Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Yesuusi ba huuphen Kiristtoosa gididoogaa Aihudatussi Xoossaa maxaafatuppe qonccissidi, deriyaa sinttan minttidi yootees.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, while Apollos was at Corinth, Paul having passed through the upper coasts came to Ephesus: and finding certain disciples,
Wolaitta Sentences: Aphiloosi Qoronttoosan de7ishin, PHauloosi qommo baggaara aadhdhidi, Efisoona yiis; yiidi issi issi kaalliyaageeta demmiis.

English Sentences: He said unto them, Have ye received the Holy Ghost since ye believed? And they said unto him, We have not so much as heard whether there be any Holy Ghost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta, "Intte ammanido wode Geeshsha Ayyaanaa ekkidetii?" yaagidi oichchiis. Oichchin eti, "CHii, ekkibookko; harai atto, Geeshsha Ayyaani de7iyoobaakka siyibookko" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: And he said unto them, Unto what then were ye baptized? And they said, Unto John's baptism.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi eta, "Yaatin, Aibin xammaqettidetii?" yaagiis. Eti, "Nuuni Yohaannisa xinqqatiyan xammaqettida" yaagidi zaaridosona.

English Sentences: Then said Paul, John verily baptized with the baptism of repentance, saying unto the people, that they should believe on him which should come after him, that is, on Christ Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi, "Yohaannisi baappe guyyiyan yiya Yesuus Kiristtoosan asai ammanana mala, asaassi yootiiddi, nagaraappe simmiyo xinqqatiyan xammaqiis" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When they heard this, they were baptized in the name of the Lord Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode, Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa sunttan xammaqettidosona.

English Sentences: And when Paul had laid his hands upon them, the Holy Ghost came on them; and they spake with tongues, and prophesied.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi ba kushiyaa eta bolli wottido wode Geeshsha Ayyaanai eta bolli wodhdhin, dumma dumma qaalan haasayidosona; qassi hananabaakka yootidosona.

English Sentences: And all the men were about twelve.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegan ubbaara tammanne naa77u asata gidiyaageeti de7oosona.

English Sentences: And he went into the synagogue, and spake boldly for the space of three months, disputing and persuading the things concerning the kingdom of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi Aihuda woosa keettaa gelidi, Xoossaa kawotettaabaa palamettiiddinne akeekissiiddi, asaara heezzu agina gidiyaagaa keenaa yayyennan haasayees.

English Sentences: But when divers were hardened, and believed not, but spake evil of that way before the multitude, he departed from them, and separated the disciples, disputing daily in the school of one Tyrannus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin etappe issoi issoi makkalidi, daro asaa sinttan Godaa ogiyaa cayiiddi ammanennan ixxin, PHauloosi etappe shaahettidi, ba kaalliyaageeta banaara efiis; Xiraanoosa giyo tamaare keettan ubba gallassi palamettees.

English Sentences: And this continued by the space of two years; so that all they which dwelt in Asia heard the word of the Lord Jesus, both Jews and Greeks.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi naa77u laitta gakkanaassi qaalaa yootiis; hegaa gishshau, Isiyan de7iya asai ubbai, Aihudatikka Aihuda gidennaageetikka Godaa qaalaa siyidosona.

English Sentences: And God wrought special miracles by the hands of Paul:
Wolaitta Sentences: Xoossai PHauloosa baggaara ooratta malaataa oottiis.

English Sentences: So that from his body were brought unto the sick handkerchiefs or aprons, and the diseases departed from them, and the evil spirits went out of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, asai a bollai bochchido maarabiyaa woi maayuwaa hargganchchatussi efees; efin hargganchchatikka paxoosona; iita ayyaanatikka etappe kiyoosona.

English Sentences: Then certain of the vagabond Jews, exorcists, took upon them to call over them which had evil spirits the name of the LORD Jesus, saying, We adjure you by Jesus whom Paul preacheth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita ayyaanata kessiiddi yuuyiya Aihudatuppe issoi issoi, "PHauloosi qaalaa yootiyo Yesuusa sunttan nuuni inttena kiyite giidi azazoos" yaagi yaagidi, iita ayyaanati de7iyo asatu bollan Godaa Yesuusa sunttaa xeesi be7idosona.

English Sentences: And there were seven sons of one Sceva, a Jew, and chief of the priests, which did so.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qeese halaqaa Asqqeewa giyo issi Aihudaassi hegaa oottida laappun naati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And the evil spirit answered and said, Jesus I know, and Paul I know; but who are ye?
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita ayyaanai etassi zaaridi, "Taani Yesuusa erais; PHauloosakka erais. SHin intte oonee?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And the man in whom the evil spirit was leaped on them, and overcame them, and prevailed against them, so that they fled out of that house naked and wounded.
Wolaitta Sentences: Iita ayyaanai de7iyo bitanee eta bolli guppi wodhdhin, eti masunxxidi, he keettaappe kallo baqatana gakkanaas, wolqqaamidi xooniis.

English Sentences: And this was known to all the Jews and Greeks also dwelling at Ephesus; and fear fell on them all, and the name of the Lord Jesus was magnified.
Wolaitta Sentences: Efisoonan de7iya Aihudatinne Aihuda gidennaageeti ubbai hegaa siyidosona; siyidi ubbaikka daro yayyidosona; Godaa Yesuusa sunttaikka daro bonchchettiis.

English Sentences: And many that believed came, and confessed, and shewed their deeds.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ammaniyaageetuppe daro asati bantta oottidobaa paaxiiddinne qoncciyan yootiiddi yoosona.

English Sentences: Many of them also which used curious arts brought their books together, and burned them before all men: and they counted the price of them, and found it fifty thousand pieces of silver.
Wolaitta Sentences: Bitiyaageetuppe daroti bantta maxaafata shiishshidi, asaa ubbaa sinttan xuuggidosona; he maxaafatu waagaa qoodiyo wode, ishatamu sha7u bira gidiis.

English Sentences: So mightily grew the word of God and prevailed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa mala wolqqaama ogiyan Xoossaa qaalai dicceesinne aakkees.

English Sentences: After these things were ended, Paul purposed in the spirit, when he had passed through Macedonia and Achaia, to go to Jerusalem, saying, After I have been there, I must also see Rome.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee polettidoogaappe guyyiyan PHauloosi, "Taani Yerusalaame baada Roomekka qassi be7anau bessees" yaagidi, Maqidooniyaaranne Akaayiyaara aadhdhidi, Yerusalaame baanau qofaa qachchiis.

English Sentences: So he sent into Macedonia two of them that ministered unto him, Timotheus and Erastus; but he himself stayed in Asia for a season.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qassi bana maaddiyaageetuppe naa77ata Ximootiyoosanne Erasxxoosa Maqidooniyaa kiittidi, bau Isiyan amarida wodiyaa takkiis.

English Sentences: And the same time there arose no small stir about that way.
Wolaitta Sentences: Godaa ogiyaa gishshau, he wode daro wocamai kiyiis.

English Sentences: For a certain man named Demetrius, a silversmith, which made silver shrines for Diana, brought no small gain unto the craftsmen;
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, biraa tigiya Dimexiroosa giyo issi bitanee Arxxemiisi Beeta Maqidasiyaa misiliyaa biraappe tigi tigidi, oosanchchatussi daro woriyaa demmees.

English Sentences: Whom he called together with the workmen of like occupation, and said, Sirs, ye know that by this craft we have our wealth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeetanne etaagaa mala oosuwaa oottiyaageeta issippe shiishshidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Asau, nu duretettai ha oosuwaana gidiyoogaa intte ereeta.

English Sentences: Moreover ye see and hear, that not alone at Ephesus, but almost throughout all Asia, this Paul hath persuaded and turned away much people, saying that they be no gods, which are made with hands:
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegee PHauloosi, Asa kushee oottidoogeeti xoossata gidokkona yaagidi, Efisoona xalaalan gidennan amarida biittatuppe attin, Isiyan ubban daro asaassi odi maizzidoogaanne balettidoogaa intte be7idetanne siyideta.

English Sentences: So that not only this our craft is in danger to be set at nought; but also that the temple of the great goddess Diana should be despised, and her magnificence should be destroyed, whom all Asia and the world worshippeth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Palabai, nu oosoi karettanaagaa xalaala gidenna; shin Isiyan de7iya ubbatinne sa7a ubban de7iyaageeti goinniyo gita Xoossee Arxxemiisi Beeta Maqidasee bonchchettennan attanaagaanne, i gitatettaikka kunddanaagaa" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when they heard these sayings, they were full of wrath, and cried out, saying, Great is Diana of the Ephesians.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai hegaa siyido wode hanqquwaa xuuqqidi, "Efisoona Arxxemiisa gita" yaagidi wocamiis.

English Sentences: And the whole city was filled with confusion: and having caught Gaius and Aristarchus, men of Macedonia, Paul's companions in travel, they rushed with one accord into the theatre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Katama ubban wocamai denddiis; PHauloosaara hemettiya Maqidooniyaa asata Gaayoosanne Arisxxirokoosa banttanaara oiqqi ekkidi, issippe kaassaa sohuwaa woxxidosona.

English Sentences: And when Paul would have entered in unto the people, the disciples suffered him not.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosikka asai shiiqidosaa gelana koyiis. SHin kaalliyaageeti a diggidosona.

English Sentences: And certain of the chief of Asia, which were his friends, sent unto him, desiring him that he would not adventure himself into the theatre.
Wolaitta Sentences: Isiyaa biittaa halaqatuppe PHauloosa lagge gidiya issoi issoi PHauloosau kiittidi, kaassaa sohuwan qoncciyaa kiyidi i beettenna mala, a woossidosona.

English Sentences: Some therefore cried one thing, and some another: for the assembly was confused; and the more part knew not wherefore they were come together.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHiiquwan wocamai denddin, dariya bagga asai harai atto aissi shiiqidaakkonne erenna gishshau, issoi issibau wocamiyo wode, hinkkoi harabau wocamees.

English Sentences: And they drew Alexander out of the multitude, the Jews putting him forward. And Alexander beckoned with the hand, and would have made his defence unto the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aihudati Iskkinddira aatti bessin, issi issi asai i haasayana mala, asaa giddoppe sinttau a aattiis; aattin asai co77u gaana mala, i ba kushiyan malaati bessidi, asaassi mootettanau koyiis.

English Sentences: But when they knew that he was a Jew, all with one voice about the space of two hours cried out, Great is Diana of the Ephesians.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin Iskkinddiri Aihuda asa gididoogaa asai erido wode, naa77u saate gidiyaagaa keenaa ubbai issi qaalan, "Efisoona Arxxemiisa gita" yaagidi wocamiis.

English Sentences: And when the townclerk had appeased the people, he said, Ye men of Ephesus, what man is there that knoweth not how that the city of the Ephesians is a worshipper of the great goddess Diana, and of the image which fell down from Jupiter?
Wolaitta Sentences: Katamaa xaafee asaa co77u oottidi, hagaadan yaagiis; "Efisoona asau, Efisoona katamai gita Arxxemiisissinne saluwaappe wodhdhida eeqa shuchchaassi eeqa keettaa naagiyaagaa gididoogaa erenna asi oonee?

English Sentences: Seeing then that these things cannot be spoken against, ye ought to be quiet, and to do nothing rashly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hagaa kashi giya asi bainnaashin, intte woppu gaanaunne dirbbennan agganau bessees.

English Sentences: For ye have brought hither these men, which are neither robbers of churches, nor yet blasphemers of your goddess.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, hageeti Beeta Maqidasiyaa miishshaa wuuqqibeennaageeta nu Xoossatakka cayibeennaageeta ehiideta.

English Sentences: Wherefore if Demetrius, and the craftsmen which are with him, have a matter against any man, the law is open, and there are deputies: let them implead one another.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, Dimexiroosinne aara de7iya oosanchchati asa mootanau koyikko, pirdda keettai dooya de7ees; qassi deriyaa haariyaageetikka de7oosona; eti bantta giddon mootettona.

English Sentences: But if ye enquire any thing concerning other matters, it shall be determined in a lawful assembly.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin intte hara yoho koyikko, higgiyaa yaa7an yohuwaa qachchana.

English Sentences: For we are in danger to be called in question for this day's uproar, there being no cause whereby we may give an account of this concourse.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, hachchi hanidabaa shabbiretta giidi, Roome biittaa asati nuna mootana; ha shiiquwaukka gaasoi bainna gishshau, nuuni gaaso odanau danddayokko"

English Sentences: And when he had thus spoken, he dismissed the assembly.
Wolaitta Sentences: yaagidi yaa7aa denttiis.

English Sentences: And after the uproar was ceased, Paul called unto him the disciples, and embraced them, and departed for to go into Macedonia.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wocamai irxxidoogaappe guyyiyan, PHauloosi kaalliyaageeta ehiissidi zoriis; eta, "Saro de7ite" giidi, Maqidooniyaa baanau kiyiis.

English Sentences: And when he had gone over those parts, and had given them much exhortation, he came into Greece,
Wolaitta Sentences: He biittaara aadhdhiiddi, qaalaa yootidi, asaa daro minttettidoogaappe guyyiyan, Giriike biittaa yiis.

English Sentences: And there abode three months. And when the Jews laid wait for him, as he was about to sail into Syria, he purposed to return through Macedonia.
Wolaitta Sentences: I hegan heezzu agina uttidi, markkabiyan Sooriyaa baanau qoppishin, Aihudati bana woranau koyiyoogaa be7idi, Maqidooniyaara guyye simmanau ba qofaa qachchiis.

English Sentences: And there accompanied him into Asia Sopater of Berea; and of the Thessalonians, Aristarchus and Secundus; and Gaius of Derbe, and Timotheus; and of Asia, Tychicus and Trophimus.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosa moissidaageeti, Beeriyaappe PHarihaasa na7aa Sosiiphaaxiroosa, Tasalonqqeppe Arisxxirokoosanne Sikonddisa, Daribeppe Gaayoosanne Isiyaappe Tikiqoosanne Xirofiimoosa, qassi Ximootiyoosa.

English Sentences: These going before tarried for us at Troas.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegeeti sinttau biidi, nuna Xiro7aadan naagoosona.

English Sentences: And we sailed away from Philippi after the days of unleavened bread, and came unto them to Troas in five days; where we abode seven days.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Oittaa Baalaa gallassaa bonchchidoogaappe guyyiyan, Piliphphisiyuusappe markkabiyan denddidi, ichchashu gallassan Xiro7aadan eta gakkidi, yaani laappun gallassaa uttida.

English Sentences: And upon the first day of the week, when the disciples came together to break bread, Paul preached unto them, ready to depart on the morrow; and continued his speech until midnight.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Woggaa gallassi oittaa menttanau shiiqidaashin, PHauloosi wonttin baanau qoppido gishshau, etassi qaalaa yootiiddi, qammi bilahe gakkanaassi yohuwaa adussiis.

English Sentences: And there were many lights in the upper chamber, where they were gathered together.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni shiiqi uttido pooqiyan daro xomppee de7ees.

English Sentences: And there sat in a window a certain young man named Eutychus, being fallen into a deep sleep: and as Paul was long preaching, he sunk down with sleep, and fell down from the third loft, and was taken up dead.
Wolaitta Sentences: Euxikoosa giyo issi wodallai maskkootiyaa bolli uttidi, keehi xiskkiis; PHauloosi haasayaa adussido wode, Euxikoosi xiskkuwan kairidaagee heezzantto pooqiyaappe sa7an kunddidi haiqqidaagaa asai denttiis.

English Sentences: And Paul went down, and fell on him, and embracing him said, Trouble not yourselves; for his life is in him.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi wodhdhidi, a bolli gufanniis; a qoommidi, "A shemppoi kiyibeenna gishshau hirggoppite" yaagiis.

English Sentences: When he therefore was come up again, and had broken bread, and eaten, and talked a long while, even till break of day, so he departed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaagidi pude pooqiyaa kiyidi, oittaa menttidi miis; sa7ai wonttana gakkanaas, daro wodiyaa haasayidoogaappe guyyiyan biis.

English Sentences: And they brought the young man alive, and were not a little comforted.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wodallai paxin, soo efiidi, daro ufaittidosona.

English Sentences: And we went before to ship, and sailed unto Assos, there intending to take in Paul: for so had he appointed, minding himself to go afoot.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi bana yaappe nuuni mokkana mala, nuussi yootido gishshau, kasetidi markkabiyaakko biidi, Asoosa baanau denddida; aissi giikko, tohuwan baanau i qoppido gishshau nuna hegaadan azaziis.

English Sentences: And when he met with us at Assos, we took him in, and came to Mitylene.
Wolaitta Sentences: I nunaara Asoosan gaittin, markkabiyan a ekkidi mixiliine yiida.

English Sentences: And we sailed thence, and came the next day over against Chios; and the next day we arrived at Samos, and tarried at Trogyllium; and the next day we came to Miletus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi yaappe markkabiyan denddidi, kiiyo sintti gakkida; qassi wonttetta gallassi Saamoosa pinnida; Tirogiliyoomen aqidi, wonttin Miliixe yiida.

English Sentences: For Paul had determined to sail by Ephesus, because he would not spend the time in Asia: for he hasted, if it were possible for him, to be at Jerusalem the day of Pentecost.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, PHauloosi Isiyan daro gam77ennan Efisoona lanqqiyaara aadhdhanau ba qofaa qachchiis; bau danddayettikko, PHenxxaqosxxe giyo gallassi Yerusalaame gakkanau eesotees.

English Sentences: And from Miletus he sent to Ephesus, and called the elders of the church.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi Miliixeppe Efisoona kiittidi, woosa keettaa cimata xeegissiis.

English Sentences: And when they were come to him, he said unto them, Ye know, from the first day that I came into Asia, after what manner I have been with you at all seasons,
Wolaitta Sentences: Woosa keettaa cimati PHauloosakko yin, eta i hagaadan yaagiis;

English Sentences: Serving the LORD with all humility of mind, and with many tears, and temptations, which befell me by the lying in wait of the Jews:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Isiyaa gelido koiro gallassaappe doommin, kaushsha ubbaaranne daro afuttaara Godaassi oottaidda, Aihudatu yaa7aappe tana gakkida paace wode ubban inttenaara waanada de7idaakko intte ereeta.

English Sentences: And how I kept back nothing that was profitable unto you, but have shewed you, and have taught you publickly, and from house to house,
Wolaitta Sentences: Nagaraappe Xoossaakko simmiyoogaanne nu Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosa ammaniyoogaa Aihudatussinne Aihuda gidennaageetussi markkattaidda,

English Sentences: Testifying both to the Jews, and also to the Greeks, repentance toward God, and faith toward our Lord Jesus Christ.
Wolaitta Sentences: yaa7ankka intte keettan keettankka inttessi yootada tamaarissidoogaappe attin, inttena go77iyaabaappe issibaanne pacissabeikke.

English Sentences: And now, behold, I go bound in the spirit unto Jerusalem, not knowing the things that shall befall me there:
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite; ha77ikka taani Geeshsha Ayyaanaassi azazettada, Yerusalaame bais; yaani tau aibi kiyanaakkonne erikke.

English Sentences: Save that the Holy Ghost witnesseth in every city, saying that bonds and afflictions abide me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Geeshsha Ayyaanai qashoinne waayee tana naagiyoogaa katama ubban tau yootees.

English Sentences: But none of these things move me, neither count I my life dear unto myself, so that I might finish my course with joy, and the ministry, which I have received of the Lord Jesus, to testify the gospel of the grace of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin ta wottaa polanaunne Godaa Yesuus Kiristtoosappe taani ekkido oosuwaa Xoossaa aaro kehatettaa wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa markkattiyoogaa polanau, ta shemppuwaa pattennabaadan qoodais.

English Sentences: And now, behold, I know that ye all, among whom I have gone preaching the kingdom of God, shall see my face no more.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Be7ite; taani ha77ikka Xoossaa kawotettaabaa yootaidda, intte ubbaa giddon yuuyaas; simmi hagaappe sinttan intteppe ooninne tana be7ennaagaa erais.

English Sentences: Wherefore I take you to record this day, that I am pure from the blood of all men.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, intteppe issi urai bayikkokka taani hegan gelennaagaa hachchi intteyyo geeshshada yootais.

English Sentences: For I have not shunned to declare unto you all the counsel of God.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, Xoossai oottanau qoppidobaa ubbaa intteyyo ainne ashshennan yootaas.

English Sentences: Take heed therefore unto yourselves, and to all the flock, over the which the Holy Ghost hath made you overseers, to feed the church of God, which he hath purchased with his own blood.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Yesuusi ba suuttan wozido Xoossaa woosa keettaa naagite; qassi Geeshsha Ayyaanai inttena halaqa oottidi sunttido wude ubbaakka intte huuphiyaakka naagite.

English Sentences: For I know this, that after my departing shall grievous wolves enter in among you, not sparing the flock.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani biidoogaappe guyyiyan, wudiyaassi qarettenna iita wanggireelloti intte giddo gelanaagaanne,

English Sentences: Also of your own selves shall men arise, speaking perverse things, to draw away disciples after them.
Wolaitta Sentences: kaalliyaageetakka bantta geeduwaa kaalettanau wordduwaa haasayiya asati intte giddoppe denddanaagaa erais.

English Sentences: Therefore watch, and remember, that by the space of three years I ceased not to warn every one night and day with tears.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaa gishshau, taani heezzu laittaa qamminne gallassi afuttan inttena huuphiyan huuphiyan minttettiyoogaa aggabeennaagaa qoppidi genccite.

English Sentences: And now, brethren, I commend you to God, and to the word of his grace, which is able to build you up, and to give you an inheritance among all them which are sanctified.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ha77ikka inttena minttanaunne geeshsha asa ubbaa giddon laatissanau danddayiya Xoossaassinne a aaro kehatettaa qaalaassi inttena hadaraa immais.

English Sentences: I have coveted no man's silver, or gold, or apparel.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani ooppenne bira woi worqqa woi afala amottabeikke;

English Sentences: Yea, ye yourselves know, that these hands have ministered unto my necessities, and to them that were with me.
Wolaitta Sentences: taani ha ta kushiyan tananne tanaara issippe de7iyaageeta koshshidabaa oottidoogaa intte intte huuphen ereeta.

English Sentences: I have shewed you all things, how that so labouring ye ought to support the weak, and to remember the words of the Lord Jesus, how he said, It is more blessed to give than to receive.
Wolaitta Sentences: Intte hagaadan daafuridi oottiiddi, daafuranchchata maaddanaassinne Godaa Yesuusi ba huuphen, Ekkiyaagaappe immiyaagee anjjettidaagaa giidoogaadan, a qaalaa intte haasayanau bessiyoogaa taani ubban inttena bessaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had thus spoken, he kneeled down, and prayed with them all.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi hegaa haasayi wurssidi, eta ubbaara issippe gulbbatidi, Xoossaa woossiis.

English Sentences: And they all wept sore, and fell on Paul's neck, and kissed him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti ubbaikka PHauloosa qoommidi, yeekkiiddi yeridosona.

English Sentences: Sorrowing most of all for the words which he spake, that they should see his face no more. And they accompanied him unto the ship.
Wolaitta Sentences: Ubbaappe i, "Tana naa77anttuwaa mulekka be7ekketa" yaagido qaalai eta daro qarettiis; qarettin markkabiyaa gakkanaassi a moissidosona.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that after we were gotten from them, and had launched, we came with a straight course unto Coos, and the day following unto Rhodes, and from thence unto Patara:
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Efisoona cimatuppe shaahettidi, sitti giidi Qoose yiida; wonttetta gallassi Rooda gakkida; hegaappe PHaaxira biida.

English Sentences: And finding a ship sailing over unto Phenicia, we went aboard, and set forth.
Wolaitta Sentences: Biidi Pinqqe pinniya markkabiyaa demmidi, aani gelidi baanau denddida.

English Sentences: Now when we had discovered Cyprus, we left it on the left hand, and sailed into Syria, and landed at Tyre: for there the ship was to unlade her burden.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Qophphiroosappe be7anau danddayiyoosaa yiidi, arshsho xeelliyo wode Qophphiroosa haddirssa baggi yeggidi, Sooriyaa biida; biidi Xiiroosa gakkida; aissi giikko, markkabee ba caanaa Xiiroosan wottees.

English Sentences: And finding disciples, we tarried there seven days: who said to Paul through the Spirit, that he should not go up to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaani kaalliyaageeta demmidi, etaara laappun gallassaa uttida; PHauloosi Yerusalaame beenna mala, eti au Ayyaanan yootidosona.

English Sentences: And when we had accomplished those days, we departed and went our way; and they all brought us on our way, with wives and children, till we were out of the city: and we kneeled down on the shore, and prayed.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni etaara uttiyo wodee wurin, kiyidi biida; eti ubbati bantta maccaasatuuranne bantta naatuura issippe katamaappe gaxi kessana gakkanaas, nuna moissidosona; moissin nuuni abbaa doonan gulbbatidi, Xoossaa woossida.

English Sentences: And when we had taken our leave one of another, we took ship; and they returned home again.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, issoi issuwaa sarotidi, markkabiyan gelida; etinne bantta soo simmidosona.

English Sentences: And when we had finished our course from Tyre, we came to Ptolemais, and saluted the brethren, and abode with them one day.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni abbaa ogiyaa wurssidi, Xiiroosappe PHexelemaise gakkida; ishantta sarotiiddi, eta matan issi gallassaa pe7ida.

English Sentences: And the next day we that were of Paul's company departed, and came unto Caesarea: and we entered into the house of Philip the evangelist, which was one of the seven; and abode with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi kiyidi, Qiisaariyaa biida; wonggeliyaa mishiraachchuwaa yootiya Piliphphoosa soo gakkidi, a matan uttida; Yerusalaamen doorettida laappunatuppe i issuwaa.

English Sentences: And the same man had four daughters, virgins, which did prophesy.
Wolaitta Sentences: Piliphphoosassi hananabaa yootiya oiddu geela7o naati de7oosona.

English Sentences: And as we tarried there many days, there came down from Judaea a certain prophet, named Agabus.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni unddenna gallassaa uttidaashin, hananabaa yootiya issi Agaaboosa giyo bitanee Yihudaappe Qiisaariyaa yiis.

English Sentences: And when he was come unto us, he took Paul's girdle, and bound his own hands and feet, and said, Thus saith the Holy Ghost, So shall the Jews at Jerusalem bind the man that owneth this girdle, and shall deliver him into the hands of the Gentiles.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuukko yiidi, PHauloosa qabattuwaa ekkinnee ba kushiyaanne ba tohuwaa qachchidi, "Geeshsha Ayyaanai giyoogee hagaa; ha qabattuwaa godaa Yerusalaamen Aihudati hagaadan qachchidi, Aihuda gidenna asatussi aattidi immana" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when we heard these things, both we, and they of that place, besought him not to go up to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni hegaa siyido wode, nuuninne yaani de7iya asati PHauloosi Yerusalaame beenna mala woossida.

English Sentences: Then Paul answered, What mean ye to weep and to break mine heart? for I am ready not to be bound only, but also to die at Jerusalem for the name of the Lord Jesus.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi zaaridi, "Intte yeekkiiddinne ta wozanaa qaretissiiddi waaneetii? Taani Godaa Yesuusa sunttaa gishshau qashettanaagaa xalaala gidennan, harai atto Yerusalaamen haiqqanaukka giiga uttaas" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he would not be persuaded, we ceased, saying, The will of the Lord be done.
Wolaitta Sentences: Zoriyaa i ekkennan ixxin, "Godai giidoogee hano" yaagidi co77u giida.

English Sentences: And after those days we took up our carriages, and went up to Jerusalem.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaani amarida wodiyaa gam77idoogaappe guyyiyan, giigettidi Yerusalaame baanau kiyida.

English Sentences: There went with us also certain of the disciples of Caesarea, and brought with them one Mnason of Cyprus, an old disciple, with whom we should lodge.
Wolaitta Sentences: Qiisaariyan de7iya kaalliyaageetuppe amaridaageeti qassi nunaara biidosona; eti nuuni aqanasaa Minaasoona giyo Qophphiroosa bitaniyaa soo nuna efiidosona; Minaasooni daro wodiyaappe doommidi kaalliyaagaa.

English Sentences: And when we were come to Jerusalem, the brethren received us gladly.
Wolaitta Sentences: Nuuni Yerusalaame gakkido wode, ishantti nuna ufaissan mokkidosona.

English Sentences: And the day following Paul went in with us unto James; and all the elders were present.
Wolaitta Sentences: Wonttetta gallassi, PHauloosinne nuuni Yaaqoobaara gaittanau biida. Woosa keettaa cimati ubbatikka de7oosona.

English Sentences: And when he had saluted them, he declared particularly what things God had wrought among the Gentiles by his ministry.
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi eta sarotidoogaappe guyyiyan, Aihuda gidenna asaa giddon ba baggaara Xoossai oottidobaa etassi wurssidi yootiis.

English Sentences: And when they heard it, they glorified the Lord, and said unto him, Thou seest, brother, how many thousands of Jews there are which believe; and they are all zealous of the law:
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti hegaa siyido wode Xoossaa galatidi, PHauloosa hagaadan yaagidosona; "Nu ishau, Aihudatu giddon Xoossaa ammanidaageetuppe aappun sha7ai de7iyaakko be7aasa; eti ubbaikka higgiyaa mintti naagoosona.

English Sentences: And they are informed of thee, that thou teachest all the Jews which are among the Gentiles to forsake Moses, saying that they ought not to circumcise their children, neither to walk after the customs.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yerusalaame Aihudati, Aihuda gidennaageetu biittan de7iya Aihuda ubbati bantta naata qaxxarenna mala, woi Aihudatu meeziyaa kaallenna mala, Muuse higgiyaakka moorana mala neeni tamaarissiyoogaa siyidosona.

English Sentences: What is it therefore? the multitude must needs come together: for they will hear that thou art come.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yaatin, aibi kehee? Neeni yiidoogaa daroti siyiyo gishshau, shiiqennan aggokkona.

English Sentences: Do therefore this that we say to thee: We have four men which have a vow on them;
Wolaitta Sentences: "Hegaa gishshau, hagaa nuuni neessi yootiyoogaa ootta; shiiqoi de7iyo oiddu asati nu matan de7oosona.

English Sentences: Them take, and purify thyself with them, and be at charges with them, that they may shave their heads: and all may know that those things, whereof they were informed concerning thee, are nothing; but that thou thyself also walkest orderly, and keepest the law.
Wolaitta Sentences: Eta ekkada etaara geeya; qassi eti bantta huuphiyaa meedettana mala, etassi miishsha imma; eti ubbai nebaa siyidoogee tuma gidennaagaanne neeni ne huuphenkka qassi higgiyaa naagaidda maaran de7iyoogaa erana.

English Sentences: As touching the Gentiles which believe, we have written and concluded that they observe no such thing, save only that they keep themselves from things offered to idols, and from blood, and from strangled, and from fornication.
Wolaitta Sentences: "SHin ammanida Aihuda gidenna asata gidikko, eti eeqassi yarshshidobaa meenna malanne suutta uyenna mala, sulettida mehe asho meenna malanne shaaramuxenna mala, nuuni yohuwaa qachchidi, etau dabddaabbiyaa xaafida" yaagidosona.

English Sentences: Then Paul took the men, and the next day purifying himself with them entered into the temple, to signify the accomplishment of the days of purification, until that an offering should be offered for every one of them.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaappe guyyiyan, PHauloosi wonttetta gallassi asata ekkidi, etaara geeyiis; i bantta geeshshaa ai gallassi poliyaakko erissanaunne qassi yarshshuwaa huuphiyan huuphiyan aude immanaakko erissanau Beeta Maqidasiyaa geliis.

English Sentences: And when the seven days were almost ended, the Jews which were of Asia, when they saw him in the temple, stirred up all the people, and laid hands on him,
Wolaitta Sentences: Laappun gallassai wurana hanishin, Isiyaappe yiida Aihudati Beeta Maqidasiyan PHauloosa be7idi, asa ubbaa hanqqetissidi, "Israa7eela asau, nuna maaddite;

English Sentences: Crying out, Men of Israel, help: This is the man, that teacheth all men every where against the people, and the law, and this place: and further brought Greeks also into the temple, and hath polluted this holy place.
Wolaitta Sentences: Israa7eela asaa, Muuse higgiyaanne ha Beeta Maqidasiyaa ixxidi, ubbasan asa ubbaa tamaarissiyaagee ha bitaniyaa; gujjidi qassi Giriiketakka Beeta Maqidasiyaa gelissidi, ha geeshsha sohuwaa tunissiis" yaagidi wocamiiddi, PHauloosa oiqqidosona.

English Sentences: (For they had seen before with him in the city Trophimus an Ephesian, whom they supposed that Paul had brought into the temple.)
Wolaitta Sentences: Eti kase Efisoonan de7iya Xirofiimoosa PHauloosaara kataman be7ido gishshau, Beeta Maqidasiyaa PHauloosi a gelissidobaa etayyo milatiis.

English Sentences: And all the city was moved, and the people ran together: and they took Paul, and drew him out of the temple: and forthwith the doors were shut.
Wolaitta Sentences: Katama ubbai shabbirettiis; asai ubbai shiiqidi PHauloosa oiqqidi, Beeta Maqidasiyaappe kare goochchiis; sohuwaarakka Beeta Maqidasiyaa penggeti gorddetti aggidosona.

English Sentences: And as they went about to kill him, tidings came unto the chief captain of the band, that all Jerusalem was in an uproar.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asai PHauloosa worana hanishin, "Yerusalaame katamai mulekka shabbirettiichchiis" giyo odoi shaalaqaakko gakkiis.

English Sentences: Who immediately took soldiers and centurions, and ran down unto them: and when they saw the chief captain and the soldiers, they left beating of Paul.
Wolaitta Sentences: Gakkin shaalaqai wotaaddaratanne mato halaqata issippe ekkidi, woxxiiddi asaa bolli kiyi wodhdhiis; asai shaalaqaanne wotaaddarata be7ido wode, PHauloosa wadhdhiyoogaa aggi bayiis.

English Sentences: Then the chief captain came near, and took him, and commanded him to be bound with two chains; and demanded who he was, and what he had done.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wode, shaalaqai shiiqidi, PHauloosa oiqqidi, naa77u sanssalatan qashettana mala azazidi, i oonakkonne qassi ai oottidaakkonne asaa oichchiis.

English Sentences: And some cried one thing, some another, among the multitude: and when he could not know the certainty for the tumult, he commanded him to be carried into the castle.
Wolaitta Sentences: Asaappe baggai issibaa wocamiyo wode, baggai harabaa wocamees; wocamai darido gishshau, shaalaqaassi tumaa eranau danddayettennan ixxin, wotaaddarati PHauloosa bantta de7iyoosaa efaana mala, eta azaziis.

English Sentences: And when he came upon the stairs, so it was, that he was borne of the soldiers for the violence of the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: Yedhdhidi kiyiyoosaa PHauloosi gakkido wode, asaa sugettaa gishshau, wotaaddarati a tookkidosona.

English Sentences: For the multitude of the people followed after, crying, Away with him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, daro asai, "A wora!" yaagiiddinne wocamiiddi kaallees.

English Sentences: And as Paul was to be led into the castle, he said unto the chief captain, May I speak unto thee? Who said, Canst thou speak Greek?
Wolaitta Sentences: Wotaaddarati PHauloosa bantta de7iyoosaa efaana hanishin PHauloosi shaalaqaa, "Taani neessi issibaa odoo?" yaagiis. Yaagin shaalaqai PHauloosa, "Neeni Giriike qaalaa erai?

English Sentences: Art not thou that Egyptian, which before these days madest an uproar, and leddest out into the wilderness four thousand men that were murderers?
Wolaitta Sentences: Neeni hagaappe kase wode, ooshshaa kessada shemppo woridaageetuppe oiddu sha7u asata bazzo kaalettida Gibxxe bitaniyaa gidikkii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: But Paul said, I am a man which am a Jew of Tarsus, a city in Cilicia, a citizen of no mean city: and, I beseech thee, suffer me to speak unto the people.
Wolaitta Sentences: SHin PHauloosi, "Taani Aihuda asa; qassi Kilqqiyan de7iya Xarsseesen yelettida waanna kataman de7iya asa. Hayyanaa tana asaassi haasayissarkkii?" yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when he had given him licence, Paul stood on the stairs, and beckoned with the hand unto the people. And when there was made a great silence, he spake unto them in the Hebrew tongue, saying,
Wolaitta Sentences: SHaalaqai a, "Haasaya" yaagin, PHauloosi yedhdhidi kiyiyoosan eqqidi, asai co77u gaana mala, ba kushiyan asaakko malaatiis. Asai co77u gin, Ibraisxxe qaalan haasayiiddi, hagaadan yaagiis.

English Sentences: Men, brethren, and fathers, hear ye my defence which I make now unto you.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta ishatoo, ta aawatoo, taani ha77i inttessi yootiyo yohuwaa siyite"

English Sentences: (And when they heard that he spake in the Hebrew tongue to them, they kept the more silence: and he saith,)
Wolaitta Sentences: PHauloosi etassi Ibraisxxe qaalan haasayiyoogaa siyidi, kaseppe keehi co77u giidosona. Gin i hagaadan yaagiis.

English Sentences: I am verily a man which am a Jew, born in Tarsus, a city in Cilicia, yet brought up in this city at the feet of Gamaliel, and taught according to the perfect manner of the law of the fathers, and was zealous toward God, as ye all are this day.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani Kilqqiyan de7iya Xarsseesen yelettada, ha kataman Gamaaliyaali tana tamaarissin diccada, nu aawatu higgiyaakka mintta tamaarada, hachchi intte ubbai haniyoogaadankka, taani Xoossaa yohuwaassi mishettiya Aihuda asa.

English Sentences: And I persecuted this way unto the death, binding and delivering into prisons both men and women.
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani maccaasaa attumaasaa oiqqa oiqqada qasho keettan yeggida asanne, ha ogiyaa kaalliya asaa worissana gakkanaas tuggayida asa.

English Sentences: As also the high priest doth bear me witness, and all the estate of the elders: from whom also I received letters unto the brethren, and went to Damascus, to bring them which were there bound unto Jerusalem, for to be punished.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hegaadankka, qassi, qeese ubbatu halaqainne cima ubbaa yaa7ai tabaa markkattanau danddayees; taani Damasqqon de7iya eta ishanttussi Aihudatussi, etappe dabddaabbiyaa ekkada, hegan de7iya asati qashettidi qaxxayettanaadan, Yerusalaame eta ehaanau yaa baas.

English Sentences: And it came to pass, that, as I made my journey, and was come nigh unto Damascus about noon, suddenly there shone from heaven a great light round about me.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani baada Damasqqo matido wode, seeta gallassa gidishin, qoppennan saluwaappe gita poo7oi ta matan yuuyi aadhdhidi poo7iis.

English Sentences: And I fell unto the ground, and heard a voice saying unto me, Saul, Saul, why persecutest thou me?
Wolaitta Sentences: Taani sa7an kundda uttada, Saa7oolaa, Saa7oolaa, tana aissi waissai? giya qaalaa siyaas.

English Sentences: And I answered, Who art thou, Lord? And he said unto me, I am Jesus of Nazareth, whom thou persecutest.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Taani zaarada, Ta Godau, neeni oonee? yaagaas. "Yaagin, Taani neeni waissiyo Naazireeta Yesuusa yaagiis.

English Sentences: And they that were with me saw indeed the light, and were afraid; but they heard not the voice of him that spake to me.
Wolaitta Sentences: Tanaara issippe de7iyaageeti poo7uwaa be7idi yayyidosona; shin taassi haasayiyaagaa qaalaa siyibookkona.

English Sentences: And I said, What shall I do, LORD? And the Lord said unto me, Arise, and go into Damascus; and there it shall be told thee of all things which are appointed for thee to do.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Ta Godau, taani ai oottoo? yaagaas. "Godai tana, Denddada Damasqqo ba. Neeni oottanau Xoossai qoppido ubbabai neeyyo yaani odettana yaagiis.

English Sentences: And when I could not see for the glory of that light, being led by the hand of them that were with me, I came into Damascus.
Wolaitta Sentences: He wolqqaama poo7uwaa gishshau, ta aifee qooqin, tanaara de7iya asati ta kushiyaa oiqqidi, tana goochchin, Damasqqo gakkaas.

English Sentences: And one Ananias, a devout man according to the law, having a good report of all the Jews which dwelt there,
Wolaitta Sentences: "Damasqqon de7iya Aihuda ubbai daro bonchchiyo issi Hanaaniyaa giyo bitanee, nu higgiyaassi azazettidi, Xoossaa minttidi woossiyaagee de7ees.

English Sentences: Came unto me, and stood, and said unto me, Brother Saul, receive thy sight. And the same hour I looked up upon him.
Wolaitta Sentences: Hanaanee taakko yiidi, ta matan eqqidi tana, Ta ishau Saa7oolaa, xeella yaagiis. Taanne he wode sohuwaarakka akko xeella aggaas.

English Sentences: And he said, The God of our fathers hath chosen thee, that thou shouldest know his will, and see that Just One, and shouldest hear the voice of his mouth.
Wolaitta Sentences: "Xeellin i tana hagaadan yaagiis; Nu aawatu Godai neeni a qofaa eranau, a xillo Na7aa be7anaunne a doonaappekka haasayaa siyanau nena kase dooriis.

English Sentences: For thou shalt be his witness unto all men of what thou hast seen and heard.
Wolaitta Sentences: Aissi giikko, neeni be7idobaanne siyidobaa asa ubbaa sinttan ayyo markkattana.
